pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Druid**\n\n**A figure stands amidst the morning mist, their face bathed in a soft, ethereal glow. Druids, guardians of nature’s secrets, draw their power from the primordial <br>rhythms of the land, sky, and sea.**\n\nDruids are spiritual guides, protectors of forests and steppes, and messengers of nature’s spirits. Their magic sings the symphony of the elements: the roar of the wind, the warmth of the sun, the whisper of streams, and the unyielding strength of stone. Whether tending to a sacred grove or standing at the heart of a storm, druids embody the delicate balance between chaos and order in the natural world.\n\n## **Circle of the Land**\n\n*“The earth is our foundation—steadfast and fertile. We are its guardians and its children.”*<br>\n\nDruids of the Circle of the Land are the sages and scholars of ancient mysteries. Every stone, every root, carries a fragment of a long-forgotten story. These druids weave spells that embrace the raw power of the land and the changing seasons, and their wisdom guides those who live in harmony with nature. Their deep connection to their environment makes them unstoppable where nature reigns.\n\n## **Circle of the Moon**\n\n*“Beneath the moonlight, I am both prey and predator, shadow and light.”*<br>\n\nDruids of the Circle of the Moon live for transformation. Beneath the silver glow of the moon, they shed their humanoid forms to become the legendary beasts of old. These druids are fierce protectors and relentless hunters, embodying the cycles of change and rebirth that the moon represents. They move between the shadows and the clearings, shifting their forms as easily as the night sky changes its face.\n\n## **Circle of the Sea**\n\n*“The tides whisper my secrets, the storms roar my fury.”*<br>\n\nThose who belong to the Circle of the Sea harness the untamed forces of the ocean and the tempest. The waves sustain them, the storms guide them, and the winds carry them. These druids embody the fluid power of water and the relentless fury of storms. They protect the shores, guide lost sailors, and punish those who dare disrupt the balance of the deep.\n\n## **Circle of the Stars**\n\n*“The night sky is an open book. The constellations are our guides.”*<br>\n\nDruids of the Circle of the Stars are mystics, reading the secrets of the cosmos in the twinkling patterns above. Their magic is a beacon of hope in the darkness, an echo of the universal forces that connect every creature and every star. These druids trace celestial patterns upon their skin and call upon the ancient wisdom of the heavens to guide and protect those who seek their aid.\n\n---\n\n# The **Druid**\n\n | Level | Proficiency      | 17             | 4  | 3  | 3  | 3  | 2  | 1  | 1  | —  | —  |\n| 15     | +5                   | Enhanced Elemental Wrath               | 3          | 4           | 18             | 4  | 3  | 3 pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Druid level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor** and **Shields** (non-metal only)\n- **Tools:** **Herbalism Kit**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Animal Handling**, **Insight**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Religion**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Druidic Spellcasting** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest** \n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (for which you have spell slots). After each **Druid level**, you can exchange **one cantrip**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast spells. This replaces non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 3** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) |  ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Prepared Spells**| ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier (Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod)**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Druidic**: You know the **secret language of druids**. You can communicate with animals using the spell **Speak with Animals** (always prepared). You can leave **hidden messages**, visible only to those who know this language or through an **Investigation DC 15** check. However, they remain indecipherable without magic.\n\n> **Primal Order**: (**Spellcaster or Guardian**)\n\n| **Specializations** | **Effects** |\n|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n| **Spellcaster** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | 1 extra **cantrip** and a bonus to **Arcana**/**Nature** (**Wisdom Mod**, **min +1**). |\n| **Guardian** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | Proficiency with **Martial Weapons** and **Medium Armor** for better defense. |\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Wild Shape**: Max Duration: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current Duration: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>>**Bonus Action**: You can transform into a **Beast** that you know. You stay transformed for a number of hours equal to **half your Druid level** (rounded up), unless you revert to your normal form using a **Bonus Action**, become **Incapacitated**, or use another **Wild Shape**. Your stats are replaced by those of the **Beast** (except for your **HP**, **hit dice**, **Intelligence**, **Wisdom**, and **Charisma** scores, as well as your **languages, skills, and feats**). If a **skill modifier** or **saving throw** of the Beast is higher than yours, use it. You **cannot cast spells** before ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 18 (only non-costly spells), but you maintain **Concentration** on spells active before your transformation. You may change a known form after a **long rest**.\n\n| Level | Known Forms | Max CR | Flight  |\n|--------|----------------|--------|--------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png) | 1/4    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 4      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1/2    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 8      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1      | Yes          |\n\n> **Wild Companion**: Spend a **spell slot** or a **Wild Shape use** to cast **Find Familiar** (Fey type) without material components. The familiar disappears at the end of a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3. Circle of the Land**\n\n> **Circle of the Land Spells**: At each **long rest**, choose a terrain type (arid, polar, temperate, or tropical). Based on this choice, you have the corresponding **Druid level** spells prepared:\n\n| **Druid Level** | **Arid Land**                                      | **Polar Land**                                         | **Temperate Land**                                      | **Tropical Land**                                  |\n|---|------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3**  | **Blur, Burning Hands, Fire Bolt**                     | **Fog Cloud, Hold Person, Ray of Frost**   | **Misty Step, Shocking Grasp, Sleep**               | **Acid Splash, Ray of Sickness, Web**       |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5**  | **Fireball**                                          | **Sleet Storm**                                          | **Lightning Bolt**                                                | **Stinking Cloud**                                     |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7**  | **Blight**                                         | **Ice Storm**                                          | **Freedom of Movement**                                  | **Polymorph**                                         |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9**  | **Wall of Stone**                                        | **Cone of Cold**                                            | **Tree Stride**                               | **Insect Plague**                                    |\n\n> **Land’s Aid**: **Magical action**, spend **1 Wild Shape use** to create a **sphere** of revitalizing flowers and thorns **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** in radius up to **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. **Enemies** in this sphere take **2d6 Necrotic Damage** (**Constitution Saving Throw** to halve the damage). One **ally creature** of your choice in the sphere regains **2d6 HP**. The dice increase to **3d6** at **level 10** and **4d6** at **level 14**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability**, or **+1 in two abilities**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Wild Resurgence**: Once per turn, spend a **spell slot** to regain **1 Wild Shape use** if you have none left.\n\n> **Spell Conversion** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, spend 1 **Wild Shape** to regain a **level 1 spell slot**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Natural Recovery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, you may **cast one Circle of the Land spell** for free.\n\n> **Spell Recovery**: During a **Short Rest**, regain spell slots whose combined levels equal **half your Druid level** (rounded up). No spell slot can be **level 6 or higher**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Elemental Fury** (choose one):\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Potent Spellcasting**: Add your **Wisdom modifier** to the damage of your **cantrips**.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: A spell with a range of **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** increases to **300' (90 m, 60 sq)**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Primal Strike**: Add **1d8 Damage** (**Cold**, **Fire**, **Lightning**, or **Thunder**) to your **Wild Shape** or Weapon attacks.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: The extra damage increases to **2d8**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Nature’s Ward**: You are **immune** to the **Poisoned** condition. Based on your active **Circle of the Land terrain**, you gain **Resistance** to associated damage (Arid=**Fire**, Polar=**Cold**, Temperate=**Lightning**, Tropical=**Poison**).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Nature’s Sanctuary**: As a **magical action**, spend **1 Wild Shape use** to create for **1 min** (or until **incapacitated**) a **15' (4.5 m, 3 sq) cube** at **120' (36 m, 24 sq)**, filled with spectral trees and vines. You and allies gain **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC, +2 Dexterity Saving Throws**) and Resistance linked to your terrain. You may move it **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** per **Bonus Action** each turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Archdruid**:\n\n>- **Infinite Wild Shape**: Regain a **Wild Shape use** when rolling Initiative if you have none left.\n\n>- **Nature’s Mage** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Convert **Wild Shape uses** into **spell slots** (each **Wild Shape** = **2 spell levels**), once per **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Timeless Nature**: You age **10 times slower**, aging one year every ten years.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Druid level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor** and **Shields** (non-metal only)\n- **Tools:** **Herbalism Kit**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Animal Handling**, **Insight**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Religion**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Druidic Spellcasting** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest** \n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (for which you have spell slots). After each **Druid level**, you can exchange **one cantrip**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast spells. This replaces non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 3** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) |  ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Prepared Spells**| ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier (Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod)**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Druidic**: You know the **secret language of druids**. You can communicate with animals using the spell **Speak with Animals** (always prepared). You can leave **hidden messages**, visible only to those who know this language or through an **Investigation DC 15** check. However, they remain indecipherable without magic.\n\n> **Primal Order**: (**Spellcaster or Guardian**)\n\n| **Specializations** | **Effects** |\n|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n| **Spellcaster** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | 1 extra **cantrip** and a bonus to **Arcana**/**Nature** (**Wisdom Mod**, **min +1**). |\n| **Guardian** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | Proficiency with **Martial Weapons** and **Medium Armor** for better defense. |\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Wild Shape**: Max Duration: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current Duration: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 	\n\n>>**Bonus Action**: You can take the form of a **Beast** you know. You remain transformed for a number of hours equal to **half your Druid level** (rounded up), unless you revert to your normal form using a **Bonus Action**, become **Incapacitated**, or use another **Wild Shape**. Your statistics are replaced by those of the **Beast** (except your **HP**, **hit dice**, **Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores**, as well as your **languages, skills, and feats**). If a **Beast's skill or saving throw modifier** is higher than yours, use it. You cannot **cast spells** before ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 18 (only non-costly spells), but you maintain your **Concentration** on active spells before transforming. You can change a known form after a **long rest**.\n\n| Level | Known Forms | Max CR | Flying  |\n|--------|----------------|--------|--------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png) | 1/4    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 4      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 8      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 2      | Yes          |\n\n> **Wild Companion**: Spend a **spell slot** or a use of **Wild Shape** to cast **Find Familiar** (*Fey type*) without material components. The familiar disappears at the end of a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3 Circle of the Moon**\n\n> **Circle Forms**: When you adopt **Wild Shape**, you channel lunar magic to gain the following benefits:\n\n>- **Challenge Rating**: The max CR of your form equals your Druid level divided by 3 (rounded down).\n\n>- **Armor Class**: Until your transformation ends, your AC can be the Beast's AC or **13 + your Wis Mod**.\n\n>- **Temporary HP**: You gain **3 × your Druid level** temporary HP.\n\n> **Circle of the Moon Spells**: You always have the following spells prepared, and you can cast them while in **Wild Shape**.\n\n| **Druid Level** | **Prepared Spells** | **Druid Level** | **Prepared Spells** |\n|------------|---------|----------|----------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | Cure Wounds, Moonbeam, Starry Wisp | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | Conjure Animals |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7** | Fountain of Moonlight | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9** | Mass Cure Wounds |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability**, or **+1 in two abilities**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Wild Resurgence**: Once per turn, spend a **spell slot** to regain **1 use** of **Wild Shape** if you have none left.\n\n> **Spell Conversion** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : Once per **long rest**, spend **1 Wild Shape use** to regain a **1st-level spell slot**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Improved Circle Forms**: While in **Wild Shape**, you gain the following benefits:\n\n>- **Lunar Radiance.** Each of your **Beast** form attacks can deal either its normal damage type **or** **Radiant Damage**.\n\n>- **Enhanced Resilience.** You can add your **Wis Mod** to your **Strength and Constitution saving throws**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Elemental Fury** (choose one):\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Potent Spellcasting**: Add your **Wis Mod** to the damage of your **cantrips**.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: A spell with at least **10' (3m, 2sq)** range has its range increased by **300' (90m, 60sq)**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Primal Strike**: Add **1d8 damage** (**Cold**, **Fire**, **Lightning**, or **Thunder**) to your **Wild Shape** or weapon attacks.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: Additional damage increases to **2d8**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Moonlight Step** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>**Bonus Action**, you teleport within a moonbeam up to **30' (9m, 6sq)** to an unoccupied space you can see, then gain **Advantage** on your next attack before the end of this turn. You can use this ability **Wis Mod** (**min 1**) times. You regain all uses after a **long rest**, or you can spend a **2nd-level or higher spell slot** to regain one use.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Lunar Form**: While in **Wild Shape**, you gain the following benefits:\n\n>- **Improved Lunar Radiance**: Once per turn, deal **2d10 Radiant Damage** to a target you hit with an attack in **Beast** form.\n\n>- **Shared Moonlight**: When you use *Moonbeam Leap*, you can teleport a willing creature within **15' (3m, 2sq)** of you to an unoccupied space within **15' (3m, 2sq)** of your destination.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20** : **Archdruid**:\n\n>- **Infinite Wild Shape**: Regain a **Wild Shape** use when rolling Initiative if you have none left. \n\n>- **Nature’s Magician** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : Convert **Wild Shape uses** into **spell slots** (each **Wild Shape** = **2 spell levels**), once per **long rest**. \n\n>- **Natural Longevity**: You age **10 times slower**, aging only one year every ten years.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Druid level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor** and **Shields** (non-metal only)\n- **Tools:** **Herbalism Kit**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Animal Handling**, **Insight**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Religion**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Druidic Spellcasting** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest** \n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (for which you have spell slots). After each **Druid level**, you can exchange **one cantrip**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast spells. This replaces non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 3** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) |  ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Prepared Spells**| ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier (Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod)**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Druidic**: You know the **secret language of druids**. You can communicate with animals using the spell **Speak with Animals** (always prepared). You can leave **hidden messages**, visible only to those who know this language or through an **Investigation DC 15** check. However, they remain indecipherable without magic.\n\n> **Primal Order**: (**Spellcaster or Guardian**)\n\n| **Specializations** | **Effects** |\n|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n| **Spellcaster** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | 1 extra **cantrip** and a bonus to **Arcana**/**Nature** (**Wisdom Mod**, **min +1**). |\n| **Guardian** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | Proficiency with **Martial Weapons** and **Medium Armor** for better defense. |\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Wild Shape**: Max Duration: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current Duration: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Total Uses: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>>**Bonus Action**: You can take the form of a **Beast** you are familiar with. You remain transformed for a number of hours equal to **half your Druid level** (rounded up), unless you revert back using a **Bonus Action**, become **Incapacitated**, or use another **Wild Shape**. Your stats are replaced by those of the **Beast** (except your **HP**, **Hit Dice**, **Intelligence**, **Wisdom**, and **Charisma** scores, as well as your **languages, skills, and feats**). If a **Beast's skill mod** or **saving throw** is higher than yours, use it. You cannot **cast spells** before reaching ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 18 (*only non-costly spells*), but you maintain **Concentration** on spells active before transforming. You can change one known form after a **long rest**.\n\n| Level | Known Forms | Max CR | Flight |\n|--------|----------------|--------|--------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png) | 1/4    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 4      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1/2    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 8      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1      | Yes          |\n\n> **Wild Companion**: Spend a **spell slot** or a **Wild Shape use** to cast **Find Familiar** (*Fey type*) without material components. The familiar disappears at the end of a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3 Circle of the Sea**\n\n> **Circle of the Sea Spells**: You always have the following spells prepared and can cast them while in **Wild Shape**.\n\n| **Druid Level** | **Prepared Spells** | **Druid Level** | **Prepared Spells** |\n|------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|----------|---------------------------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | 	Fog Cloud, Gust, Ray of Frost, Shatter, Thunderwave | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | Lightning Bolt, Water Breathing  |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7** | Control Water, Ice Storm                               | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9** | Conjure Elemental, Hold Monster |\n\n> **Wrath of the Sea**: As a **Bonus Action**, you can expend a use of **Wild Shape** to manifest a misty aura of sea spray **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around you for **10 minutes**. The effect ends early if you deactivate it (*no action required*), if you use it again, or if you become **Incapacitated**. Upon activation and with a **Bonus Action** on subsequent turns, you can target a visible creature within this aura. It must succeed on a **Constitution Saving Throw** against your **Spell DC** or take **Cold Damage** and be pushed **15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)** if it is **Large or smaller**. Damage = **Wisdom mod** (**min 1**) **d6**:   ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png)d6\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Wild Resurgence**: Once per turn, spend a **spell slot** to regain **1 use** of **Wild Shape** if you have none left.\n\n> **Spell Conversion** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, spend 1 **Wild Shape use** to regain a **1st-level spell slot**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Aquatic Affinity**: The area of your **Wrath of the Sea** now extends to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** around you. Additionally, you gain a **swim speed** equal to your **movement speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Elemental Fury** (choose one):\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Powerful Spellcasting**: Add your **Wisdom mod** to the damage of your **cantrips**.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: A spell with at least **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** range extends by **300' (90 m, 60 sq)**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Primal Strike**: Add **1d8 Damage** (**Cold**, **Fire**, **Lightning**, or **Thunder**) to your **Wild Shape** or weapon attacks.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: The additional damage increases to **2d8**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Stormborn**: While your **Wrath of the Sea** is active, you gain a **Fly Speed** equal to your **movement speed** and **resistance** to **Cold, Lightning, and Thunder Damage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Ocean’s Gift**: Instead of manifesting your **Wrath of the Sea** around yourself, you can manifest it around a willing creature **within 60' (18m, 12 sq)**. That creature gains all the benefits of the aura and uses your **Spell Save DC** and **Wisdom mod**. You can also manifest **Wrath of the Sea** for both you and this creature if you expend two **Wild Shape uses** when activating it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**: **Archdruid**:\n\n>- **Infinite Wild Shape**: Regain a **Wild Shape use** when rolling Initiative if you have none left.\n\n>- **Nature’s Mastery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Convert your **Wild Shape uses** into **spell slots** (*each Wild Shape use = 2 spell levels*), once per **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Timeless Body**: You age **10 times slower**, aging **1 year every 10 years**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Druid level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor** and **Shields** (non-metal only)\n- **Tools:** **Herbalism Kit**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Animal Handling**, **Insight**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Religion**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Druidic Spellcasting** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest** \n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (for which you have spell slots). After each **Druid level**, you can exchange **one cantrip**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast spells. This replaces non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Used<br>Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 3** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) |  ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Prepared Spells**| ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier (Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod)**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Druidic**: You know the **secret language of druids**. You can communicate with animals using the spell **Speak with Animals** (always prepared). You can leave **hidden messages**, visible only to those who know this language or through an **Investigation DC 15** check. However, they remain indecipherable without magic.\n\n> **Primal Order**: (**Spellcaster or Guardian**)\n\n| **Specializations** | **Effects** |\n|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n| **Spellcaster** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | 1 extra **cantrip** and a bonus to **Arcana**/**Nature** (**Wisdom Mod**, **min +1**). |\n| **Guardian** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) | Proficiency with **Martial Weapons** and **Medium Armor** for better defense. |\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Wild Shape**: Max duration: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current duration: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>>**Bonus Action**: You can take the form of a **Beast** you know. You remain transformed for a number of hours equal to **half your Druid level** (rounded up), unless you revert to your normal form by using a **Bonus Action**, become **Incapacitated**, or use another **Wild Shape**. Your statistics are replaced by those of the **Beast** (except your **HP**, **Hit Dice**, **Intelligence**, **Wisdom**, and **Charisma** scores, as well as your **languages, skills, and feats**). If a **Beast's skill modifier** or **Saving Throw** is higher than yours, use it. You cannot **cast spells** before ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 18 (**only non-costly spells**), but you maintain **Concentration** on spells active before your transformation. You can change a known form after a **long rest**.\n\n| Level | Known Forms | Max CR | Flying |\n|--------|----------------|--------|--------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png) | 1/4    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 4      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1/2    | No          |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 8      | ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD.png)              | 1      | Yes         |\n\n> **Wild Companion**: Spend a **spell slot** or a **Wild Shape use** to cast **Find Familiar** (*Fey type*) without material components. The familiar disappears at the end of a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Star Map**: You have created a **map of the sky** (tiny object) that you can use as a **spellcasting focus**. You always have the spells **Guidance** and **Guiding Bolt** prepared. **Guiding Bolt** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) You can cast **Guiding Bolt** without using a spell slot a number of times equal to your **Wisdom Modifier** (**min 1**). You regain these uses after a **long rest**. If the map is lost, you can recreate it in **1 hour** of ceremony (during a rest).\n\n> **Starry Form**: As a **Bonus Action**, you can expend **1 use** of **Wild Shape** to adopt a **Starry Form** instead of a **Beast** form. You emit **bright light** in a **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** radius and **dim light** for an additional **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**. The form lasts **10 minutes** or until you are **incapacitated**, dismiss it (no action required), or activate it again. Choose a **constellation**:\n\n>- **Archer**: As a **Bonus Action** on your following turns, you can make a **ranged spell attack**: range **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** dealing **1d8 + Wis Mod** **Radiant Damage**.\n\n>- **Chalice**: When you cast a healing spell, you (or another creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**) regain **1d8 + Wis Mod** **HP**.\n\n>- **Dragon**: When you make an **Intelligence** or **Wisdom check**, or a **Constitution Saving Throw** to maintain **Concentration**, treat a roll of **9 or lower** on a **d20** as a **10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 in one ability**, or **+1 in two abilities**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Wild Resurgence**: Once per turn, expend a **spell slot** to regain **1 use** of **Wild Shape** if you have none left.\n\n> **Spell Conversion** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, expend **1 Wild Shape** to regain a **1st-level spell slot**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Cosmic Omen** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). During a **long rest**, you can consult your **Star Map** and **roll 1 die** to receive an omen valid until your next **long rest**. You can use this ability **Wisdom Modifier** (**min 1**) times. You regain all uses after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Weal (even)**: Use **your reaction** and **add 1d6** to a **d20 test** of a creature you see within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n>- **Woe (odd)**: Use **your reaction** and **subtract 1d6** from a **d20 test** of a creature you see within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Elemental Fury** (choose one):\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Potent Spellcasting**: Add your **Wisdom Modifier** to the damage of your **cantrips**.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: A spell with a range of **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** or more increases by **300' (90 m, 60 sq)**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Primal Strike**: Add **1d8 Damage** (**Cold**, **Fire**, **Lightning**, or **Thunder**) to your **Wild Shape** or weapon attacks.<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: Extra Damage increases to **2d8**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Twinkling Constellations**\n\n> While in your **Starry Form**, the effects of your constellations (**Archer, Chalice, Dragon**) are enhanced.\n\n>- **Archer / Chalice**: The **1d8** increases to **2d8**.\n\n>- **Dragon**: You gain a **Flying Speed** of **20' (6 m, 4 sq)** and can **glide**. Additionally, you can **change your constellation** at the start of each of your turns.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Full of Stars**\n\n> While in **Starry Form**, you become partially intangible, granting you **resistance** to **Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing Damage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**\n\n> You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**: **Archdruid**\n\n>- **Unlimited Wild Shape**: Regain one use of **Wild Shape** when you roll **Initiative** if you have none left.\n\n>- **Nature’s Magician** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Transform your **Wild Shape uses** into **a single spell slot** (**each Wild Shape = 2 Spell Levels**). Usable **once per Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Natural Longevity**: You age **10 times slower**, meaning you experience **one year** for every **ten** that pass.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
