Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png), Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>> As a **Bonus Action**, grant a **Bardic Inspiration die** (**d6**) to a creature within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** that can see or hear you (1 max per creature). Within the next hour, if the target fails a **D20 Roll**, they can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and **add** it to the result. The die is lost after use. You can use this feature **Charisma mod.** (**min 1**) times. You regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>>**Die Progression**: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10**: **d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 15**: **d12**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Expertise** : Choose 2 proficient skills to double your **proficiency bonus**\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>> At **Level 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**, choose 2 additional skills.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Jack of All Trades** : Add half your **proficiency bonus** (rounded down) ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png) to **ability checks** you are not proficient in.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Beguiling Magic** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Charm Person** and **Mirror Image** prepared. After casting an **Enchantment** or **Illusion** spell (via a spell slot), you can force a creature you see within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** to make a **Wisdom saving throw** against your **Spell Save DC**; on a failure, it is **Charmed** or **Frightened** (your choice) for **1 min** (new **saving throw** at the end of each of its turns). Usable again after a **Long Rest** or by spending **one Bardic Inspiration die** (no action required).\n\n>- **Mantle of Inspiration**: **Bonus Action**. Spend **one Bardic Inspiration die**. Roll the die and multiply the result by **2**. A number of creatures equal to your **Charisma mod.** (**min 1**) within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** gain this amount in **temporary HP** and can use their reaction to move up to their **Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Font of Inspiration**: You regain all uses of **Bardic Inspiration** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**. You can also spend a **spell slot** (no action required) to regain **one use of Bardic Inspiration**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Mantle of Majesty** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Command** prepared. **Bonus Action**: Cast **Command** without expending a spell slot and adopt a supernatural presence (**1 min** or until your **Concentration** ends), allowing you to recast **Command** (**Bonus Action**) without a slot during this duration. **Charmed creatures** automatically fail against this spell. Usable again after a **Long Rest** or by spending a **level 3+ spell slot**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Countercharm**: If you or a creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** fail a **Saving Throw** against **Charmed** or **Frightened**, you can use a **Reaction** to reroll the save with **Advantage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Magical Secrets**: When your prepared spell count increases (by leveling up), you can choose your new spells from the **Bard, Cleric, Druid, or Wizard** spell lists (they count as **Bard spells**). Additionally, each time you replace a **prepared spell** for this class, you can replace it with a spell from these lists.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Unbreakable Majesty** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): **Bonus Action**. You take on a majestic form for **1 min** or until you are **Incapacitated**. If a creature attacks you for the first time on a turn, it must make a **Charisma saving throw** (**your Spell Save DC**): on a failure, the attack **automatically misses**. Usable again after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Inspiration**: At the start of combat (when you roll **Initiative**), if you have fewer than **two Bardic Inspiration dice**, you regain **one** up to a maximum of **two**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain **an Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Words of Creation**: You master **2 Words of Creation (Life and Death)**. You always have **Power Word Heal** and **Power Word Kill** prepared. When you cast one of these spells, you can target a **second creature** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of the first.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Dexterity** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**\n\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**\n\n- **Tools** (choose 3 musical instruments)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n- **Proficient Skills** (choose don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Bard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All your **spell slots** are regained after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells**: After each **Bard level**, you can swap one spell and one cantrip.\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Musical Instrument** to cast your spells. Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Charisma mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Bardic Inspiration** ![case!](symbole/caseD.png), Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png), Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>> As a **Bonus Action**, grant a **Bardic Inspiration die** (**d6**) to a creature within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** that can see or hear you (1 max per creature). Within the next hour, if the target fails a **D20 Roll**, they can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and **add** it to the result. The die is lost after use. You can use this feature **Charisma mod.** (**min 1**) times. You regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>>**Die Progression**: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10**: **d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 15**: **d12**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Expertise** : Choose 2 proficient skills to double your **proficiency bonus**\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>> At **Level 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**, choose 2 additional skills.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Jack of All Trades** : Add half your **proficiency bonus** (rounded down) ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png) to **ability checks** you are not proficient in.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Bonus Proficiencies**: Gain proficiency in **3 skills** of your choice.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Cutting Words**: **Reaction**. When a creature within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** makes a **damage roll**, a successful check, or attack, you can spend **a Bardic Inspiration die**: Roll it and **subtract** the result from their roll, potentially turning a **success into a failure** or **reducing damage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Font of Inspiration**: You regain all uses of **Bardic Inspiration** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**. You can also expend a **spell slot** (no action required) to regain **one use of Bardic Inspiration**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Magical Discoveries**: Learn **2 spells** from the **Cleric**, **Druid**, or **Wizard** spell lists (of a level you can cast). These spells are always prepared, and you can swap one of them at each **Bard level-up**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Countercharm**: If you or a creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** fail a **Saving Throw** against **Charmed** or **Frightened**, you can use a **Reaction** to reroll it with **Advantage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Magical Secrets**: When your number of prepared spells increases (when leveling up), you can choose new spells from the **Bard**, **Cleric**, **Druid**, or **Wizard** spell lists (they count as **Bard spells**). Additionally, whenever you replace a **prepared spell** for this class, you can replace it with a spell from these lists.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Peerless Skill**: When you make a **roll** (**ability check or attack**) and fail, you can expend **a Bardic Inspiration die**: Roll it and add the result. If the failure persists, the **Bardic Inspiration die** is not expended.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Inspiration**: At the start of combat (when you roll **Initiative**), if you have fewer than **two Bardic Inspiration dice**, you regain **one** until you have **two**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Words of Creation**: You master **2 Words of Creation (Life and Death)**. You always have **Power Word Heal** and **Power Word Kill** prepared. When you cast one of these spells, you can target a **second creature** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of the first.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Dexterity** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**\n\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**\n\n- **Tools** (choose 3 musical instruments)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n- **Proficient Skills** (choose 3):\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Bard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All your **spell slots** are regained after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells**: After each **Bard level**, you can swap one spell and one cantrip.\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Musical Instrument** to cast your spells. Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png), Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n>> As a **Bonus Action**, grant a **Bardic Inspiration die** (**d6**) to a creature within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** that can see or hear you (1 max per creature). Within the next hour, if the target fails a **D20 Roll**, they can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and **add** it to the result. The die is lost after use. You can use this feature **Charisma mod.** (**min 1**) times. You regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>>**Die Progression**: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10**: **d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 15**: **d12**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Expertise** : Choose 2 proficient skills to double your **proficiency bonus**\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>> At **Level 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**, choose 2 additional skills.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Jack of All Trades** : Add half your **proficiency bonus** (rounded down) ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png) to **ability checks** you are not proficient in.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Combat Inspiration** : Recipients of your **Bardic Inspiration die** can use the die to either boost their **damage** after a successful attack or their **AC** (as a **Reaction**) against an incoming attack, potentially negating the hit.\n\n> **Martial Training** : Gain proficiency in **Martial Weapons**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**. You can use any weapon (simple or martial) as a **focus** for casting your **Bard spells**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement** : Choose: **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Font of Inspiration** : You regain all uses of **Bardic Inspiration** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**. You can also expend a **spell slot** (no action required) to regain **one use of Bardic Inspiration**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Extra Attack** : When taking the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice** instead of once. You can replace one of these attacks with **a spell** that has a casting time of **one Action**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Countercharm** : If you or a creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** fails a **Saving Throw** against **Charmed** or **Frightened**, you can use a **Reaction** to reroll the save with **Advantage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Magical Secrets** : When the number of prepared spells increases (as you level up), you can choose your new spells from the **Bard, Cleric, Druid, or Wizard** spell lists (they count as **Bard spells**). Additionally, whenever you replace a **prepared spell** for this class, you can swap it with a spell from those lists.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Battle Magic** : After casting a spell (using an **Action**), you can make **one weapon attack** as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Inspiration** : At the start of combat (when you roll **Initiative**), if you have fewer than **two Bardic Inspiration dice**, you regain **one** up to a maximum of **two**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon** : Gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Words of Creation** : You master **2 Words of Creation (Life and Death)**. You always have **Power Word Heal** and **Power Word Kill** prepared. When you cast one of these spells, you can target a **second creature** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of the first target.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br><br> \n\n# **Wizard**\n\n**Through the prism of knowledge and incantations, wizards explore the secrets of the multiverse. They are the architects of the arcane, weaving the invisible threads <br>of magic to reshape reality.**\n\nWizards, driven by an insatiable thirst for knowledge, dedicate their lives to mastering the mystic arts. Each formula in their **spellbook** is a key unlocking the mysteries of existence: summoning storms, bending time, or calling forth beings from other planes. They are the keepers of an ancient tradition, preserving and refining magic to shape a future where the possible and the impossible merge.\n\nTheir quest leads them beyond dusty libraries and magical laboratories. Adventurers by necessity or passion, wizards delve into forgotten ruins and the depths of other dimensions to unearth lost knowledge, convinced that the secrets of past civilizations may hold the key to ultimate power.\n\n## **School of Abjuration**\n\n*“An invisible wall between you and chaos, a barrier forged by sheer will.”*<br>\n\nAbjurers dedicate their craft to protection and banishment. Their magic repels malevolent forces, seals dimensional portals, and creates unseen shields against threats. These wizards are the bulwarks against the supernatural, shielding their allies and neutralizing dark magic. They embody discipline and resilience against destructive forces.\n\n## **School of Divination**\n\n*“The veils of the future tear before my gaze. The past whispers its forgotten truths.”*<br>\n\nDiviners peer into the currents of time and space, revealing the hidden threads that weave the fabric of reality. Their magic unveils secrets and guides the uncertain, offering glimpses of the future or wisdom from ages long past. These visionaries are sought after for their foresight, able to perceive the unseen and anticipate the inevitable.\n\n## **School of Evocation**\n\n*“Let the air ignite, let the earth tremble, and let the thunder answer my call.”*<br>\n\nEvokers harness the raw power of the elements. Their magic unleashes fiery explosions, devastating storms, and crackling lightning. On the battlefield, they are forces of destruction, sculpting chaos with precise control. Their art is not only about devastation but also about protection, channeling elemental forces to shield or annihilate as they see fit.\n\n## **School of Illusion**\n\n*“See what I want you to see. Believe what I want you to believe.”*<br>\n\nIllusionists craft alternate realities with their magic. Their spells distort senses and deceive minds, making the unreal tangible. They manipulate appearance, alter perception, and turn impossibilities into possibilities. These masters of deception transform imagination into a weapon, confounding their foes and reinventing the world with every spell.\n\n---\n\n# **The Wizard**\n\n|Level|Proficiency<br>Bonus|Class<br>Features|Cantrips<br>Known|Spells<br>Prepared|1st|2nd|3rd|4th|5th|6th|7th|8th|9th|\n|----|------|------|------|------|-----|-----|-----|-----|-----|-----|-----|-----|-----|\n|1|+2|Spellcasting, Ritual Adept, Arcane Recovery|3|4|2|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|\n|2|+2|Scholar|3|5|3|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|\n|3|+2|Arcane Tradition|3|6|4|2|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|\n|4|+2|Ability Score Improvement|4|7|4|3|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|\n|5|+3|Memorize Spell|4|9|4|3|2|-|-|-|-|-|-|\n|6|+3|Tradition Feature|4|10|4|3|3|-|-|-|-|-|-|\n|7|+3|—|4|11|4|3|3|1|-|-|-|-|-|\n|8|+3|Ability Score Improvement|4|12|4|3|3|2|-|-|-|-|-|\n|9|+4|—|4|14|4|3|3|3|1|-|-|-|-|\n|10|+4|Tradition Feature|5|15|4|3|3|3|2|-|-|-|-|\n|11|+4|—|5|16|4|3|3|3|2|1|-|-|-|\n|12|+4|Ability Score Improvement|5|16|4|3|3|3|2|1|-|-|-|\n|13|+5|—|5|17|4|3|3|3|2|1|1|-|-|\n|14|+5|Tradition Feature|5|18|4|3|3|3|2|1|1|-|-|\n|15|+5|—|5|19|4|3|3|3|2|1|1|1|-|\n|16|+5|Ability Score Improvement|5|21|4|3|3|3|2|1|1|1|-|\n|17|+6|—|5|22|4|3|3|3|2|1|1|1|1|\n|18|+6|Spell Mastery|5|23|4|3|3|3|3|1|1|1|1|\n|19|+6|Epic Boon|5|24|4|3|3|3|3|2|1|1|1|\n|20|+6|Signature Spells|5|25|4|3|3|3|3|2|2|1|1|

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Intelligence**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Wizard level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**\n\n**Proficient Skills** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **History**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Wizard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All your **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Intelligence**.\n\n>- **Spellbook**: You possess a **Spellbook** containing your known **Wizard spells**. Your **Spellbook** holds **Wizard spells of level 1+**. It begins with **6 level 1 spells**. Each time you level up, add **2 spells** (of a level you can cast). You can copy additional spells found during your journey, requiring **2 hours** and **50 gp** per spell level. You may also copy your **own spellbook** (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells). If you lose your **Spellbook**, you can rewrite it, but only with the spells you had prepared (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells).\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can replace or adjust your **prepared spells** from those written in your **Spellbook**. You may swap out one of your **cantrips** from the Wizard list after each **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** or your **Spellbook** as a spellcasting focus. This replaces the need for material components that have no cost.\n\n|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n|**Lvl 1**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 2**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Current Spellcasting Values**||||\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8** + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Ritual Adept**: You can cast a spell with the **Ritual** tag written in your **Spellbook** **even if it is not prepared**, as long as you read from your **Spellbook**. Casting a spell as a **Ritual** takes **10 minutes** longer than normal. It does not consume a spell slot, meaning a **Ritual** version of a spell **cannot** be cast at a higher level.\n\n> **Arcane Recovery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, you can recover **expended spell slots** with a total level equal to **half your Wizard level** (rounded up) during a **short rest**, but you **cannot** regain **6th-level or higher spell slots**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Scholar** : Choose **one skill** you are proficient in among **Arcana**, **History**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion** to double your **proficiency bonus**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Abjuration Savant** : Add **2 Abjuration spells (level 1 or 2)** for free to your **Spellbook**. Each time you gain access to a new **spell level**, add **one Abjuration spell** for free.\n\n> **Arcane Ward** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): When you cast an **Abjuration spell** using a spell slot, you create (or recharge) a magical shield ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) (**Max HP = 2 × Wizard level + Int Mod**). It absorbs **damage** for you (apply your resistances first). As long as it has at least 1 HP, it protects you. You can heal it by casting an **Abjuration spell** or using a **Bonus Action** by spending a **spell slot** (regaining **2 × spell slot level HP**). You cannot create it again until you finish a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement** : Choose **+2 to one ability score**, **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Memorize Spell** : After a **short rest**, you can replace a **prepared spell** with another spell from your **Spellbook**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Projected Ward** : As a **Reaction**, you can redirect **damage** from a visible creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** to your **Magical Ward**. If this damage reduces the **Magical Ward** to **0 HP**, the protected creature takes any leftover damage. If the protected creature has **resistances** or **vulnerabilities**, they apply before reducing the **Magical Ward** HP.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Spell Breaker** : You always have **Counterspell** and **Dispel Magic** prepared. You can cast **Dispel Magic** as a **Bonus Action** (add your **Proficiency Bonus** to the roll). If **Counterspell** or **Dispel Magic** fails to stop a spell, you do not expend the spell slot.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Spell Resistance** : You have **Advantage** on **saving throws against spells**, and you gain **Resistance** to **damage from spells**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Spell Mastery**: Choose **one 1st-level spell** and **one 2nd-level spell** (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**. You can cast them at will **without expending a spell slot** (at their base level). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot. After a **long rest**, you can swap one of these spells for another spell of the same level (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Signature Spells**: Choose **two 3rd-level spells** from your **Spellbook**. They are always prepared. You can cast each of them **once at 3rd level without expending a spell slot** (regained after a **short or long rest**). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Intelligence**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Wizard level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**\n\n**Proficient Skills** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **History**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Wizard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All your **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Intelligence**.\n\n>- **Spellbook**: You possess a **Spellbook** containing your known **Wizard spells**. Your **Spellbook** holds **Wizard spells of level 1+**. It begins with **6 level 1 spells**. Each time you level up, add **2 spells** (of a level you can cast). You can copy additional spells found during your journey, requiring **2 hours** and **50 gp** per spell level. You may also copy your **own spellbook** (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells). If you lose your **Spellbook**, you can rewrite it, but only with the spells you had prepared (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells).\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can replace or adjust your **prepared spells** from those written in your **Spellbook**. You may swap out one of your **cantrips** from the Wizard list after each **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** or your **Spellbook** as a spellcasting focus. This replaces the need for material components that have no cost.\n\n|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n|**Lvl 1**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 2**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Current Spellcasting Values**||||\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8** + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Ritual Adept**: You can cast a spell with the **Ritual** tag written in your **Spellbook** **even if it is not prepared**, as long as you read from your **Spellbook**. Casting a spell as a **Ritual** takes **10 minutes** longer than normal. It does not consume a spell slot, meaning a **Ritual** version of a spell **cannot** be cast at a higher level.\n\n> **Arcane Recovery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, you can recover **expended spell slots** with a total level equal to **half your Wizard level** (rounded up) during a **short rest**, but you **cannot** regain **6th-level or higher spell slots**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Scholar** : Choose **one skill** you are proficient in among **Arcana**, **History**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion** to double your **proficiency bonus**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Divination Savant**: Add **2 Divination spells (level 1 or 2)** to your **spellbook** for free. Each time you unlock a **new spell level**, add **one free Divination spell**.\n\n> **Portent** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : After each **long rest**, roll **2d20** and record the results. You can replace any **d20 roll** (yours or a visible creature’s) with one of these foreseen results before the roll is made. Each result can only be used once and any unused results disappear after your next **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose between **+2 to one ability**, **+1 to two abilities**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Memorize Spell**: After a **short rest**, you can swap **one prepared spell** for another spell in your **spellbook**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Expert Divination**: When you cast a **Divination spell** using a **level 2+ slot**, you regain an **expended spell slot** of a lower level (max level 5).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **The Third Eye**: As a **Bonus Action**, activate one of the following effects until your next **short or long rest**, or until you dismiss it:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Darkvision**: You see in dim light within **120' (36 m, 24 sq)** as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You see in shades of gray.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Read Any Language**: You can read any written language.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **See the Invisible**: You can cast **See Invisibility** without expending a spell slot.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Greater Portent** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Instead of rolling **2d20**, you roll **3d20** and keep these results for **Portent** in the same way.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Spell Mastery**: Choose **one 1st-level spell** and **one 2nd-level spell** (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**. You can cast them at will **without expending a spell slot** (at their base level). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot. After a **long rest**, you can swap one of these spells for another spell of the same level (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Signature Spells**: Choose **two 3rd-level spells** from your **Spellbook**. They are always prepared. You can cast each of them **once at 3rd level without expending a spell slot** (regained after a **short or long rest**). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
