caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Intelligence**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Wizard level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**\n\n**Proficient Skills** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **History**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Wizard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All your **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Intelligence**.\n\n>- **Spellbook**: You possess a **Spellbook** containing your known **Wizard spells**. Your **Spellbook** holds **Wizard spells of level 1+**. It begins with **6 level 1 spells**. Each time you level up, add **2 spells** (of a level you can cast). You can copy additional spells found during your journey, requiring **2 hours** and **50 gp** per spell level. You may also copy your **own spellbook** (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells). If you lose your **Spellbook**, you can rewrite it, but only with the spells you had prepared (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells).\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can replace or adjust your **prepared spells** from those written in your **Spellbook**. You may swap out one of your **cantrips** from the Wizard list after each **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** or your **Spellbook** as a spellcasting focus. This replaces the need for material components that have no cost.\n\n|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n|**Lvl 1**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 2**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Current Spellcasting Values**||||\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8** + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Ritual Adept**: You can cast a spell with the **Ritual** tag written in your **Spellbook** **even if it is not prepared**, as long as you read from your **Spellbook**. Casting a spell as a **Ritual** takes **10 minutes** longer than normal. It does not consume a spell slot, meaning a **Ritual** version of a spell **cannot** be cast at a higher level.\n\n> **Arcane Recovery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, you can recover **expended spell slots** with a total level equal to **half your Wizard level** (rounded up) during a **short rest**, but you **cannot** regain **6th-level or higher spell slots**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Scholar** : Choose **one skill** you are proficient in among **Arcana**, **History**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion** to double your **proficiency bonus**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Evocation Savant**: Add **2 Evocation spells (level 1 or 2)** to your **spellbook** for free. Each time you unlock a **new spell level**, add **one free Evocation spell**.\n\n> **Potent Cantrip**: When you cast an **offensive Evocation cantrip**, if the target succeeds its **Saving Throw** or if you miss your attack, it still takes half damage (but no additional effects).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose between **+2 to one ability**, **+1 to two abilities**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Memorize Spell**: After a **short rest**, you can swap **one prepared spell** for another spell in your **spellbook**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Sculpt Spells**: When casting a **Evocation spell** affecting other visible creatures, you can exclude **1 + spell level creatures**. They automatically succeed their saving throw and take no damage if the spell normally deals half damage on a success.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Empowered Evocation**: Add your **Intelligence modifier** to one of the **damage rolls** of a **Evocation spell** you cast.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Overchannel** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you cast a **level 1-5 Evocation spell** that deals damage, you automatically deal **maximum damage**. The first use is safe, but if you use this feature again before a **long rest**, you take **2d12 necrotic damage per spell level used** (ignoring resistance/immunity). Each subsequent use before a long rest increases this damage by **1d12 per spell level**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Spell Mastery**: Choose **one 1st-level spell** and **one 2nd-level spell** (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**. You can cast them at will **without expending a spell slot** (at their base level). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot. After a **long rest**, you can swap one of these spells for another spell of the same level (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Signature Spells**: Choose **two 3rd-level spells** from your **Spellbook**. They are always prepared. You can cast each of them **once at 3rd level without expending a spell slot** (regained after a **short or long rest**). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Intelligence**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Wizard level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Intelligence** and **Wisdom**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**\n\n**Proficient Skills** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **History**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Wizard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All your **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Intelligence**.\n\n>- **Spellbook**: You possess a **Spellbook** containing your known **Wizard spells**. Your **Spellbook** holds **Wizard spells of level 1+**. It begins with **6 level 1 spells**. Each time you level up, add **2 spells** (of a level you can cast). You can copy additional spells found during your journey, requiring **2 hours** and **50 gp** per spell level. You may also copy your **own spellbook** (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells). If you lose your **Spellbook**, you can rewrite it, but only with the spells you had prepared (**1 hour** and **10 gp** per spell level for your known spells).\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, you can replace or adjust your **prepared spells** from those written in your **Spellbook**. You may swap out one of your **cantrips** from the Wizard list after each **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** or your **Spellbook** as a spellcasting focus. This replaces the need for material components that have no cost.\n\n|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|Spell Level|Total Slots|**Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n|**Lvl 1**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 7**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 2**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 8**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 9**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n\n|**Current Spellcasting Values**||||\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Cantrips Known**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Save DC** (**8** + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Intelligence Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Ritual Adept**: You can cast a spell with the **Ritual** tag written in your **Spellbook** **even if it is not prepared**, as long as you read from your **Spellbook**. Casting a spell as a **Ritual** takes **10 minutes** longer than normal. It does not consume a spell slot, meaning a **Ritual** version of a spell **cannot** be cast at a higher level.\n\n> **Arcane Recovery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): Once per **long rest**, you can recover **expended spell slots** with a total level equal to **half your Wizard level** (rounded up) during a **short rest**, but you **cannot** regain **6th-level or higher spell slots**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Scholar** : Choose **one skill** you are proficient in among **Arcana**, **History**, **Investigation**, **Medicine**, **Nature**, or **Religion** to double your **proficiency bonus**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Illusion Savant**: Add **2 Illusion spells (level 1 or 2)** to your **Spellbook** for free. Each time you gain access to a **new spell slot level**, you add **one free Illusion spell** to your **Spellbook**.\n\n> **Improved Illusions**: You cast your **Illusion spells** without verbal components. If an **Illusion spell** has a range of at least **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**, its range increases by **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. You also learn the **Minor Illusion** cantrip, which does not count against the number of **cantrips** you know (if you already knew it, choose another **Wizard cantrip**). When you cast **Minor Illusion**, you can create both a visual and an auditory effect simultaneously, and you can cast it using a **Bonus Action**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose either **+2 in one ability score**, **+1 in two ability scores**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Memorize Spell**: After a **short rest**, you can swap one of your **prepared spells** with another spell from your **Spellbook**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Phantasmal Creatures**: You always have two spells prepared: **Summon Beast** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) and **Summon Fey** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), and you can choose to transform them into **Illusion spells** (the summoned creature appears spectral). You can cast the **Illusion version** of each spell **once without using a spell slot**, but the summoned creature only has half its **HP**. After doing so for either spell, you must complete a **long rest** before doing it again.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Illusory Self** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): When a creature attacks you, you can use a **Reaction** to create an illusory duplicate that causes the attack to miss. The illusion then vanishes. You regain this ability after a **short or long rest**, or by expending a **2nd-level or higher spell slot** (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Illusory Reality**: When you cast an **Illusion spell** using a **spell slot**, you can make one inanimate object of the **Illusion real** for **1 minute** (it cannot deal damage or impose conditions).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Spell Mastery**: Choose **one 1st-level spell** and **one 2nd-level spell** (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**. You can cast them at will **without expending a spell slot** (at their base level). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot. After a **long rest**, you can swap one of these spells for another spell of the same level (casting time: action) from your **Spellbook**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Signature Spells**: Choose **two 3rd-level spells** from your **Spellbook**. They are always prepared. You can cast each of them **once at 3rd level without expending a spell slot** (regained after a **short or long rest**). To cast them at a higher level, you must use a spell slot.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

nom: **Sorcerer**
nom 1: **Sorcerer**
type: Class
recto: arriere_plan/classe.png
symbole 1: symbole/vide.png
symbole 2: symbole/vide.png
symbole 3: symbole/vide.png
symbole 4: symbole/vide.png

dvimage: symbole/vide.png

charge:
niveau:
DD5: 5e 2024 Compatible
DD5-2: 5e 2024 Compatible
sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Sorcerer**\n\n**Magic flows through their veins, raw, untamed, and unstoppable. Sorcerers are arcane prodigies,<br> living conduits of mystical power in its purest form.**\n\nA sorcerer does not choose their magic—it chooses them. Whether through an ancient draconic lineage, a fey blessing, or a wild surge of arcane energy, their gift manifests spontaneously. Unlike scholars who study and refine their craft, sorcerers shape magic instinctively, bending its rules rather than following them.\n\nFueled by a power they barely control, sorcerers act as living conduits of chaos or order. Their very presence disturbs the balance, as their magic demands release. Some embrace their nature with pride, others struggle to master or conceal it, but all understand that their gift is both a blessing and a burden.\n\n## **Aberrant Sorcerer**\n\n*“The whispers of dead stars echo in my mind, their power coursing through me.”*<br>\n\nAn Aberrant Sorcerer is marked by forces beyond mortal understanding. Whether influenced by an alien realm, a psionic surge from the Astral Plane, or an unfinished transformation, their magic bends reality in eerie ways. Capable of twisting minds and summoning cosmic anomalies, this sorcerer exists at the edge of humanity and the unknown.\n\n## **Clockwork Soul Sorcerer**\n\n*“The unyielding order of celestial gears flows through me, shaping my fate.”*<br>\n\nInfused with the forces of cosmic order, the Clockwork Soul Sorcerer channels the perfect balance of Mechanus and other structured planes. Every spell, every movement reflects the precision of the universe’s grand design. These sorcerers stand as paragons of harmony, stabilizing chaos and shielding their allies with meticulously woven magic.\n\n## **Draconic Bloodline Sorcerer**\n\n*“The breath of dragons pulses within me, an eternal flame that seeks to claim the sky.”*<br>\n\nDraconic Bloodline Sorcerers inherit the power of an ancient draconic lineage. Their physical traits and magic reveal their ancestry—gleaming scales, majestic wings, and elemental might that rivals the **Great Wyrms**. Proud and commanding, these sorcerers embody the grandeur and strength of their ancestors.\n\n## **Wild Magic Sorcerer**\n\n*“Chaos dances around me, unpredictable and beautiful.”*<br>\n\nMarked by an untamed, unpredictable magic, the Wild Magic Sorcerer is a living storm of arcane energy. Their spells are powerful but erratic, as likely to backfire as to unleash devastation. They are the embodiment of chance, raw beauty, and pure danger, a reminder that magic is as alive as the universe itself.\n\n---\n\n# The **Sorcerer**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Sorcerer level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Constitution** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Sorcerer)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are restored after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: You can replace a **prepared spell** when you gain a **Sorcerer level**. You can replace **a cantrip** when you gain a **Sorcerer level**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to cast **your Sorcerer spells**.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Charisma Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Innate Sorcery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, unleash your latent magic for **1 min**. You can use this feature **twice** and regain all expended uses after a **long rest**. While active:\n\n>- The **DC** of **your Sorcerer spells** increases by **+1**.\n\n>- You have **Advantage** on **attack rolls** with **your Sorcerer spells**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Font of Magic** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png). You have a number of **Sorcery Points** equal to your **Sorcerer level**. You regain all expended points after a **long rest**.\n\n> **Spellcasting Flexibility**: You can convert a **spell slot** into **sorcery points** (equal to its level) without an action. As a **Bonus Action**, you can use **sorcery points** to create a **spell slot** (up to 5th level). These slots disappear after a **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: | Spell Slot Level | Sorcery Point Cost | Minimum Sorcerer Level |\n|-----------------------|----------------|----------------|\n| 1                    | 2              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2              |\n| 2                    | 3              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3              |\n| 3                    | 5              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5              |\n| 4                    | 6              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 7              |\n| 5                    | 7              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9              |\n\n> **Metamagic**: You can modify your spells by spending **sorcery points**. Choose **2 options** at **level 2** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **2 more** at **level 10** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), and **2 additional ones** at **level 17** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can replace one option whenever you gain a level. Only one option can be used per spell, unless stated otherwise.\n\n| Metamagic Option         | Sorcery Point Cost | Effect                                                                                   |\n|------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Careful Spell           | 1                            | Protects a number of creatures equal to your **Charisma mod.** They automatically succeed their save. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Distant Spell            | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s range or turns a touch spell into **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.                      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Empowered Spell         | 1                            | Reroll up to your **Charisma mod.** of **damage dice**.                               |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Extended Spell          | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s duration up to 24h. **Advantage** to maintain **Concentration**.     |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Heightened Spell        | 2                            | Gives a **disadvantage** to a target’s **saving throw** against your spell.             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Quickened Spell         | 2                            | Changes a **1 action spell** into a **bonus action spell**. Restrictions on **1st-level+ spells**. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Seeking Spell           | 1                            | Reroll a **missed spell attack roll**.                                             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Subtle Spell            | 1                            | Cast a spell without verbal, somatic, or material components (except costly ones).    |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Transmuted Spell        | 1                            | Change one **damage type** to another (**Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Thunder**).  |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Twinned Spell           | 1                            | Adds an additional target to a spell that can be upcast for more targets.           |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3.** **Psionic Spells**: You automatically learn the following spells at the specified levels.\n\n| **Sorcerer Level** | Spells                                                                                     |\n|-------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3                 | **Arms of Hadar, Calm Emotions, Detect Thoughts, Dissonant Whispers, Mind Sliver** |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5                 | **Hunger of Hadar, Sending**                                                                     |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 7                 | **Evard's Black Tentacles, Summon Aberration**                                       |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9                 | **Rary's Telepathic Bond, Telekinesis**                                                   |\n\n> **Telepathic Speech**: As a **Bonus Action**, establish a **telepathic link** with a visible creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**. As long as you are within **your Charisma modifier** (**min 1**) x **1 mile (1.5 km)**, you can communicate mentally if you share a language. The link lasts ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **a number of minutes equal to your Sorcerer level** and ends if you establish another link.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Sorcerous Restoration ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: After a **Short Rest**, you can regain expended **sorcery points**, up to a maximum equal to **half your Sorcerer level** (rounded down). You can only use this feature **once per Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6. Psionic Sorcery**: You can cast your **Psionic Spells** by spending **sorcery points** equal to the spell's level. These spells require **no verbal, somatic, or material components** (except costly or consumed ones).\n\n> **Psychic Defenses**: You gain **Resistance** to **Psychic Damage** and **Advantage** on **saving throws** against the **Charmed** or **Frightened** conditions.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7. Sorcery Incarnate**: If you have no remaining uses of **Innate Sorcerer**, you can activate it by spending **2 sorcery points** as a **Bonus Action**. While **Innate Sorcerer** is active, you can use **up to two Metamagic options** on each spell you cast.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10. Aberrant Resilience**: When you take **Psychic Damage**, you can use your **Reaction** to halve the damage. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your **Charisma modifier** (min 1) and regain all expended uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14. Revelation in Flesh**: As a **Bonus Action**, spend **1 sorcery point** to magically alter your body for **10 minutes**. Choose one **benefit** per point spent:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Aquatic Adaptation**: You gain a **swim speed equal to double your walking speed**, and you can **breathe underwater**. Gills form on your neck or behind your ears, and your fingers become webbed.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Luminous Flight**: You gain a **flying speed equal to your walking speed** and can **hover**. Your skin glows with a mucus-like sheen or an eerie otherworldly light.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **See the Unseen**: You can see **any invisible creature within 60' (18 m, 12 sq)**, as long as it is not **fully obscured**. Your eyes turn black.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Wormlike Movement**: Your body and all worn or carried equipment become **viscous and malleable**. You can squeeze through **any narrow space at least 1" (2.5 cm) wide**, and you can spend **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) of movement** to escape **nonmagical restraints** or the **Grappled** condition.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18. Warping Implosion**: As a **Magical Action**, teleport to an unoccupied space within **120' (36 m, 24 sq)**. Creatures within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** must make a **Strength saving throw (spell DC)** or take **3d10 Force Damage** and be pulled to the space you left (on success, they take half damage and are not pulled). Recharge this ability after a **Long Rest** or by spending **5 sorcery points**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19. Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20. Arcane Apotheosis**: When **Innate Sorcerer** is active, **one Metamagic option** per turn costs **0 sorcery points**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Sorcerer level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Constitution** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)

donsuite: | Spell Slot Level | Sorcery Point Cost | Minimum Sorcerer Level |\n|-----------------------|----------------|----------------|\n| 1                    | 2              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2              |\n| 2                    | 3              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3              |\n| 3                    | 5              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5              |\n| 4                    | 6              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 7              |\n| 5                    | 7              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9              |\n\n> **Metamagic**: You can modify your spells by spending **sorcery points**. Choose **2 options** at **level 2** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **2 more** at **level 10** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), and **2 additional ones** at **level 17** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can replace one option whenever you gain a level. Only one option can be used per spell, unless stated otherwise.\n\n| Metamagic Option         | Sorcery Point Cost | Effect                                                                                   |\n|------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Careful Spell           | 1                            | Protects a number of creatures equal to your **Charisma mod.** They automatically succeed their save. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Distant Spell            | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s range or turns a touch spell into **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.                      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Empowered Spell         | 1                            | Reroll up to your **Charisma mod.** of **damage dice**.                               |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Extended Spell          | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s duration up to 24h. **Advantage** to maintain **Concentration**.     |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Heightened Spell        | 2                            | Gives a **disadvantage** to a target’s **saving throw** against your spell.             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Quickened Spell         | 2                            | Changes a **1 action spell** into a **bonus action spell**. Restrictions on **1st-level+ spells**. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Seeking Spell           | 1                            | Reroll a **missed spell attack roll**.                                             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Subtle Spell            | 1                            | Cast a spell without verbal, somatic, or material components (except costly ones).    |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Transmuted Spell        | 1                            | Change one **damage type** to another (**Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Thunder**).  |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Twinned Spell           | 1                            | Adds an additional target to a spell that can be upcast for more targets.           |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Mechanical Magic**: You automatically prepare the following spells at each specified level.\n\n| **Sorcerer Level** | Spells                                                                                 |\n|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3                 | **Aid, Alarm, Lesser Restoration, Protection from Evil and Good**              |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5                 | **Dispel Magic, Protection from Energy**                                |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 7                 | **Freedom of Movement, Summon Construct**                                      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9                 | **Greater Restoration, Wall of Force**                                                  |\n\n> **Manifestations of Order**: When you cast a **Sorcerer spell**, choose or randomly determine a manifestation linked to your connection to order.\n\n| **1d6** | **Manifestation** |\n|------|-----------------------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **1** | Spectral cogwheels hover behind you. |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **2** | The hands of a clock spin in your eyes. |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | Your skin glows with a brassy sheen. |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **4** | Floating equations and geometric objects overlay your body. |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | Your Spellcasting Focus temporarily takes the form of a Tiny clockwork mechanism. |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **6** | The ticking of gears or ringing of a clock can be heard by you and those affected by your magic. |\n\n>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Restore Balance**: As a **reaction**, when you see a creature within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** rolling a **d20** with **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, you can neutralize the effect. Usable a number of times equal to your **Charisma mod.** (minimum 1), recovered after a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Sorcerous Restoration ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: After a **Short Rest**, you can regain expended **sorcery points**, up to a maximum equal to **half your Sorcerer level** (rounded down). You can only use this feature **once per Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Bastion of Law** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): As a **Magical Action**, spend **1 to 5 sorcery points** to create a protective barrier around yourself or a creature you can see within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**. The protection grants a number of **d8s** equal to the points spent. The dice can be used to reduce incoming damage. The protection lasts until a **long rest** or until you use this feature again.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Sorcery Incarnate**: If you have no more uses of **Innate Sorcery**, you can activate it by spending **2 sorcery points** as a **Bonus Action**. When **Innate Sorcery** is active, you can use **two Metamagic options** per spell cast.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Trance of Order ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: As a **Bonus Action**, enter a trance for **1 min**. Usable once per **long rest**, or rechargeable with **5 sorcery points**. During this time:\n\n>- Attacks against you **cannot gain Advantage**.\n\n>- Any **d20 roll of 9 or lower** is treated as a **10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Clockwork Cavalcade ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: As a **Magical Action**, summon artificial spirits in a **30' (9 m, 6 sq) cube** around you. Usable once per **long rest**, or rechargeable with **7 sorcery points**. The spirits are intangible and invulnerable. They create the following effects within the cube:\n\n>- **Healing**: Restore **100 hit points** split among creatures of your choice in the cube.\n\n>- **Repair**: Instantly repair any damaged object in the cube.\n\n>- **Dispel**: End **spells of level 6 or lower** on chosen targets in the cube.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Arcane Apotheosis**: While **Innate Sorcery** is active, **one Metamagic option per turn** does not cost **sorcery points**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Sorcerer level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Constitution** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Sorcerer)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are restored after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: You can replace a **prepared spell** when you gain a **Sorcerer level**. You can replace **a cantrip** when you gain a **Sorcerer level**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to cast **your Sorcerer spells**.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lv 6**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | Values**||||\n|------|-----|------|------|\n|**Known Cantrips** |![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Saving Throw DC** (**8** + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Charisma Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Charisma Mod.**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Innate Sorcery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, unleash your latent magic for **1 min**. You can use this feature **twice** and regain all expended uses after a **long rest**. While active:\n\n>- The **DC** of **your Sorcerer spells** increases by **+1**.\n\n>- You have **Advantage** on **attack rolls** with **your Sorcerer spells**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Font of Magic** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png). You have a number of **Sorcery Points** equal to your **Sorcerer level**. You regain all expended points after a **long rest**.\n\n> **Spellcasting Flexibility**: You can convert a **spell slot** into **sorcery points** (equal to its level) without an action. As a **Bonus Action**, you can use **sorcery points** to create a **spell slot** (up to 5th level). These slots disappear after a **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: | Spell Slot Level | Sorcery Point Cost | Minimum Sorcerer Level |\n|-----------------------|----------------|----------------|\n| 1                    | 2              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2              |\n| 2                    | 3              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3              |\n| 3                    | 5              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5              |\n| 4                    | 6              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 7              |\n| 5                    | 7              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9              |\n\n> **Metamagic**: You can modify your spells by spending **sorcery points**. Choose **2 options** at **level 2** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **2 more** at **level 10** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), and **2 additional ones** at **level 17** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can replace one option whenever you gain a level. Only one option can be used per spell, unless stated otherwise.\n\n| Metamagic Option         | Sorcery Point Cost | Effect                                                                                   |\n|------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Careful Spell           | 1                            | Protects a number of creatures equal to your **Charisma mod.** They automatically succeed their save. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Distant Spell            | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s range or turns a touch spell into **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.                      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Empowered Spell         | 1                            | Reroll up to your **Charisma mod.** of **damage dice**.                               |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Extended Spell          | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s duration up to 24h. **Advantage** to maintain **Concentration**.     |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Heightened Spell        | 2                            | Gives a **disadvantage** to a target’s **saving throw** against your spell.             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Quickened Spell         | 2                            | Changes a **1 action spell** into a **bonus action spell**. Restrictions on **1st-level+ spells**. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Seeking Spell           | 1                            | Reroll a **missed spell attack roll**.                                             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Subtle Spell            | 1                            | Cast a spell without verbal, somatic, or material components (except costly ones).    |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Transmuted Spell        | 1                            | Change one **damage type** to another (**Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Thunder**).  |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Twinned Spell           | 1                            | Adds an additional target to a spell that can be upcast for more targets.           |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Draconic Resilience**: Your draconic magic enhances your body.\n\n>- Your maximum hit points increase by 3, plus 1 for every **Sorcerer level** you gain.\n\n>- Dragon-like scales appear on your skin. While **not wearing armor**, your **base AC equals 10 + Dexterity mod. + Charisma mod.**.\n\n> **Draconic Spells**: You automatically prepare the following spells at the specified levels.\n\n| **Sorcerer Level** | Spells                                                                                   |\n|-------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n| 3                 | Alter Self, Chromatic Orb, Command, Dragon’s Breath                         |\n| 5                 | Fear, Fly                                                                              |\n| 7                 | Arcane Eye, Charm Monster                                                   |\n| 9                 | Legend Lore, Summon Dragon                                                         |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose between **+2 to one ability**, **+1 to two abilities**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Sorcerous Restoration ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: After a **Short Rest**, you can regain expended **sorcery points**, up to a maximum equal to **half your Sorcerer level** (rounded down). You can only use this feature **once per Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Elemental Affinity**: Choose a damage type associated with dragons: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Acid**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Cold**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Fire**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Lightning**, or ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Poison**.\n\n>- You gain **Resistance** to this damage type.\n\n>- When you cast a spell dealing this damage type, **add your Charisma mod. to the damage roll**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Sorcery Incarnate**: If you have no remaining uses of **Innate Sorcery**, you can activate it by spending **2 Sorcery Points** as a **Bonus Action**. When **Innate Sorcery** is active, you can apply up to **two Metamagic options** to each spell you cast.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Draconic Wings ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: As a **Bonus Action**, sprout draconic wings for 1 hour or until dismissed (**no action required**). While active, you have a **flying speed of 60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. Useable **once per long rest**, or you may **spend 3 Sorcery Points** to recharge it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Dragon Companion ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**:\n\n>- Cast **Summon Draconic Spirit** without material components. Once per **long rest**, you may **cast it without expending a spell slot**.\n\n>- If you modify the spell to **not require Concentration**, its duration changes to **1 minute**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: Gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Arcane Apotheosis**: While **Innate Sorcery** is active, **one Metamagic option per turn does not consume Sorcery Points**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
