pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d6** per **Sorcerer level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Constitution** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Sorcerer)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are restored after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: You can replace a **prepared spell** when you gain a **Sorcerer level**. You can replace **a cantrip** when you gain a **Sorcerer level**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to cast **your Sorcerer spells**.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Max<br>Slots | **Innate Sorcery** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, unleash your latent magic for **1 min**. You can use this feature **twice** and regain all expended uses after a **long rest**. While active:\n\n>- The **DC** of **your Sorcerer spells** increases by **+1**.\n\n>- You have **Advantage** on **attack rolls** with **your Sorcerer spells**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Font of Magic** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Current: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png). You have a number of **Sorcery Points** equal to your **Sorcerer level**. You regain all expended points after a **long rest**.\n\n> **Spellcasting Flexibility**: You can convert a **spell slot** into **sorcery points** (equal to its level) without an action. As a **Bonus Action**, you can use **sorcery points** to create a **spell slot** (up to 5th level). These slots disappear after a **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: | Spell Slot Level | Sorcery Point Cost | Minimum Sorcerer Level |\n|-----------------------|----------------|----------------|\n| 1                    | 2              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 2              |\n| 2                    | 3              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3              |\n| 3                    | 5              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5              |\n| 4                    | 6              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 7              |\n| 5                    | 7              |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9              |\n\n> **Metamagic**: You can modify your spells by spending **sorcery points**. Choose **2 options** at **level 2** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **2 more** at **level 10** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), and **2 additional ones** at **level 17** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can replace one option whenever you gain a level. Only one option can be used per spell, unless stated otherwise.\n\n| Metamagic Option         | Sorcery Point Cost | Effect                                                                                   |\n|------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Careful Spell           | 1                            | Protects a number of creatures equal to your **Charisma mod.** They automatically succeed their save. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Distant Spell            | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s range or turns a touch spell into **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.                      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Empowered Spell         | 1                            | Reroll up to your **Charisma mod.** of **damage dice**.                               |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Extended Spell          | 1                            | Doubles a spell’s duration up to 24h. **Advantage** to maintain **Concentration**.     |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Heightened Spell        | 2                            | Gives a **disadvantage** to a target’s **saving throw** against your spell.             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Quickened Spell         | 2                            | Changes a **1 action spell** into a **bonus action spell**. Restrictions on **1st-level+ spells**. |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Seeking Spell           | 1                            | Reroll a **missed spell attack roll**.                                             |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Subtle Spell            | 1                            | Cast a spell without verbal, somatic, or material components (except costly ones).    |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Transmuted Spell        | 1                            | Change one **damage type** to another (**Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Thunder**).  |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Twinned Spell           | 1                            | Adds an additional target to a spell that can be upcast for more targets.           |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Wild Magic Surge**: After casting a **Sorcerer spell** with a spell slot, roll **1d20**. On a **20**, roll a **d100** on the **Wild Magic Surge Table** for a random magical effect. Spells triggered by this table **cannot** be altered by **Metamagic**.\n\n> **Tides of Chaos ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: Gain **Advantage** on a **D20 test** before rolling. This feature recharges after a **long rest** or after casting a **Sorcerer spell** with a spell slot (if done, you automatically roll on the **Wild Magic Surge Table**).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Sorcerous Restoration ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: After a **Short Rest**, you can regain expended **sorcery points**, up to a maximum equal to **half your Sorcerer level** (rounded down). You can only use this feature **once per Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Bend Luck**: As a **Reaction**, spend **1 Sorcery Point** to roll **1d4** and apply **±1d4** to a visible creature’s **D20 test**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Sorcery Incarnate**: If you have no remaining uses of **Innate Sorcerer**, you can activate it by spending **2 Sorcery Points** as a **Bonus Action**. While **Innate Sorcerer** is active, you can use **two Metamagic options** on each spell you cast.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Controlled Chaos**: When rolling on the **Wild Magic Surge Table**, roll twice and choose which result to apply.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Tamed Surge ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: After casting a **Sorcerer spell** with a spell slot, **choose** an effect from the **Wild Magic Surge Table** (except the last row). If the chosen effect requires a roll, you must roll. This feature recharges after a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Arcane Apotheosis**: While **Innate Sorcerer** is active, **one Metamagic option** per turn does not consume **Sorcery Points**.\n\n| **1d100** | &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Effect**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;                                                                                     | **1d100** | **Effect**                                                                                     |\n|------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|\n| 01–04 | Roll on this table at the start of each turn for **1 min**. | 49-52 | Resistance to all damage for **1 min**. |\n| 05–08 | You emit **Bright Light** in a **9 m (30', 6c)** radius for **1 min**. Creatures within **1.5 m (5', 1c)** are **Blinded** until the end of their next turn. | 53-56 | For **1 min**, any flammable, nonmagical object you touch that isn’t worn or carried bursts into flames, takes **1d4 Fire Damage**, and burns. |\n| 09–12 | For **1 min**, regain **5 HP** at the start of each turn. | 57-60 | This turn, you can take **one additional action**. |\n| 13–16 | For **1 min**, creatures have **Disadvantage** on **saving throws** against your next **spell requiring a saving throw**. | 61-64 | If you die within the next hour, you immediately reincarnate as per the **Reincarnate** spell. |\n| 17–20 | You experience an effect lasting **1 min** (unless stated otherwise). Roll **1d8** to determine the effect: 1 – Ethereal music audible within **1.5 m (5', 1c)**; 2 – Your size increases by one category; 3 – You grow a beard of feathers that explodes when you sneeze; 4 – You must shout when speaking; 5 – Illusory butterflies flutter around you within **3 m (10', 2c)**; 6 – An eye appears on your forehead (**Advantage on Wisdom [Perception] checks**); 7 – Pink bubbles float from your mouth when you speak; <br>8 – Your skin turns blue for **24 hours** or until **Remove Curse** is cast. | 65-68 | You cast a **random spell** without requiring **Concentration**. The spell lasts its full duration. Roll **1d10** to determine the spell: 1 – Confusion, 2 – Fireball, 3 – Fog Cloud, <br>4 – Fly (random target within **18 m (60', 12c)**), 5 – Grease, <br>6 – Levitate (self), 7 – Magic Missile (**5th level**), <br>8 – Mirror Image, 9 – Polymorph (**failed save turns you into a Goat**), 10 – See Invisibility. |\n| 21–24 | For **1 min**, your **spells requiring an Action** become **Bonus Actions**. | 69-72 | Teleport up to **18 m (60', 12c)** to a visible space. |\n| 25–28 | Transported to the **Astral Plane** until the end of your next turn. | 73-76 | A **random creature** within **18 m (60', 12c)** is **Poisoned** for **1d4 hours**. |\n| 29–32 | You turn into a **potted plant** until the start of your next turn. You are **Incapacitated**, have **Vulnerability** to all damage, and return to normal if you drop to **0 HP** (the pot breaks). | 77-80 | A friendly creature appears in a random space within **18 m (60', 12c)**, controlled by the DM, and disappears after **1 min**. Roll **1d4** to determine the creature: 1 – Duodrone, 2 – Flumph, 3 – Monodrone, 4 – Unicorn. |\n| 33–36 | You are **Frightened** until the end of your next turn. The DM determines the source of your fear. | 81-84 | Up to **3 creatures** within **9 m (30', 6c)** take **1d10 Necrotic Damage**, and you regain the **HP** equivalent. |\n| 37–40 | **1 min**: Your **next damaging spell** deals **maximum damage**. | 85-88 | Up to **3 creatures** within **9 m (30', 6c)** take **4d10 Lightning Damage**. |\n| 41–44 | **Bonus Action** teleport up to **6m (20', 4c)** each turn for **1 min**. | 89-92 | **+2 AC** and **Immunity to Magic Missile** for **1 min**. |\n| 45–48 | You and **3 allies** within **9 m (30', 6c)** become **Invisible** for **1 min** or until attacking or casting a spell. | 93-96 | You and **all creatures** within **9 m (30', 6c)** become **Vulnerable to Piercing Damage** for **1 min**. |\n| 97-00 | Roll **1d6**: 1 – Regain **2d10 HP**; 2 – One ally within **90m (300', 60c)** regains **2d10 HP**; 3 – Regain your **lowest-level expended spell slot**; |→|4 – One ally within **90m (300', 60c)** regains their **lowest-level expended spell slot**; 5 – Regain **all expended Sorcery Points**; 6 – **All effects from rows 17 to 20 affect you simultaneously**. |

nom: **Warlock**
nom 1: **Warlock**
type: Class
recto: arriere_plan/classe.png
symbole 1: symbole/vide.png
symbole 2: symbole/vide.png
symbole 3: symbole/vide.png
symbole 4: symbole/vide.png
image: image/Classe/Warlocke/vide.png
nivimage: symbole/vide.png
dvimage: symbole/vide.png
dv:
charge:
niveau:
DD5: 5e 2024 Compatible
DD5-2: 5e 2024 Compatible
sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n# **Warlock**\n\n**Bound to dark and unfathomable forces, the Warlock is a living conduit for powers beyond the veil of reality.**\n\nWarlocks, driven by an insatiable thirst for forbidden knowledge, venture where few dare to gaze. Seeking secrets hidden deep within the multiverse, they forge pacts with entities both mighty and terrifying: capricious Fey, infernal demons, celestial beings, or forgotten abominations from the edges of existence. These contracts grant them terrifying powers, often at the cost of their freedom or sanity.\n\nOnce a pact is sealed, the Warlock is thrust into a world of mysteries and dangers. Whether their motivations are vengeance, ambition, or sheer curiosity, these pacts shape their fate and lead them into adventures where each uncovered secret hides another, even more disturbing.\n\n## **Archfey Patron**\n\n*“The mists of the Feywild are my allies, and its mysteries sing within me.”*<br>\n\nA pact with an Archfey binds the Warlock to the whimsical and arcane magic of the Feywild. Their ethereal presence is both inspiring and unsettling, and their magic reflects the beauty and terror of their patron. These Warlocks manipulate the minds of their enemies and dance between worlds with supernatural grace.\n\n## **Celestial Patron**\n\n*“The stars themselves have etched their light into me, and I shall carry this flame to protect and purify.”*<br>\n\nThe Celestial Warlock channels the benevolent power of the upper planes. Bound to a luminous entity, this Warlock offers healing and hope even in the darkest of times. Their magic, imbued with sacred light, inspires and protects those who fight alongside them.\n\n## **Infernal Patron**\n\n*“I have signed the pact, and the flames of the Lower Planes now burn in my veins.”*<br>\n\nThe Infernal Warlock draws power from demons and devils of the lower planes. As an emissary of darkness, they wield devastating magic and use their powers to corrupt or annihilate. Constantly torn between ambition and servitude, this Warlock is a walking paradox, both predator and prey.\n\n## **Great Old One Patron**\n\n*“The whispers of the void have chosen me, and their unfathomable truth guides my magic.”*<br>\n\nThe Warlock of the Great Old Ones is chosen by alien and incomprehensible forces from the Far Realm. Their mind is permanently connected to entities beyond reason, allowing them to manipulate thoughts, summon nightmare visions, and bend reality itself to their will. They inspire both fascination and dread.\n\n---\n\n# The **Warlock**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class Features                  | Eldritch<br>Invocations | Spell<br>Slots | Spells<br>Prepared | Pact<br>Magic Slots | Slot<br>Level                  | 2            | 3              | 2              | 1              |\n| 3      | +2                 | Warlock Subclass            | 3                     | 2            | 4              | 2              | 2              |\n| 4      | +2                 | Ability Score Improvement        | 3                     | 3            | 5              | 2              | 2              |\n| 5      | +3                 | —                                 | 5                     | 3            | 6              | 2              | 3              |\n| 6      | +3                 | Subclass | 4              |\n| 9      | +4                 | Contact Patron               | 7                     | 3            | 10             | 2              | 5              |\n| 10     | +4                 | Subclass feature    | 7                     | 4            | 10             | 2              | 5              |\n| 11     | +4                 | Mystic Arcanum (6th-level spell) | 7   |\n| 18     | +6                 | —                                 | 10                    | 4            | 14             | 4              | 5              |\n| 19     | +6                 | Epic caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Warlock level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**.\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **History**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Pact Magic (Warlock)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. You regain all your **Pact Spell Slots** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Your Prepared Spells**: When you gain an **Warlock level**, you can replace one **prepared spell**, one **cantrip**, and one **Mystic Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to replace non-costly material components.\n\n| Level | Spell<br>Level | **Expended Slots** | Spell<br>Level | **Mystic Arcanum** | **Cantrips Known** | **Save DC** (8 + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) |               |                             |        |                                                    |\n\n> **Eldritch Invocations**: You tap into **fragments of forbidden knowledge**, granting you **unique magical abilities**. You gain **1** at **level 1**. You can swap one of your **Eldritch Invocations** for another available one whenever you level up.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 2 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 5 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 12 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
donsuite:  <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 18\n\n<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Magical Cunning ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : In **1 minute** as a **Ritual**, you can regain up to half (rounded up) of your **expended Pact Spell Slots**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Archfey Spells** (always prepared):\n\n| **Warlock Level** | **Spell** |\n|---|---|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | **Calm Emotions**, **Faerie Fire**, **Misty Step**, **Phantasmal Force**, **Sleep** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | **Blink**, **Plant Growth** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7** | **Dominate Beast**, **Greater Invisibility** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9** | **Dominate Person**, **Seeming** |\n\n> **Steps of the Fey** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). Your patron grants you the ability to slip between the planes. You can cast **Misty Step** without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to your **Charisma mod.** (minimum 1), recharging after a **Long Rest**. Each time you use this feature, choose one of the following effects:\n\n>- **Healing Leap**: After teleporting, you or a visible creature within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** gain **1d10 temporary HP**.\n\n>- **Mocking Leap**: Creatures within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of the space you left must succeed on a **Wisdom saving throw** (**Your Spell Save DC**) or have **Disadvantage** on attacks against creatures other than you until your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability**, **+1 in two abilities**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Misty Escape**: You can cast **Misty Step** as a **Reaction** when you **take damage**.\n\nAdditionally, the following options are added to your **Misty Escape** choices:\n\n>- **Vanishing Step**: You become **Invisible** until the start of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or cast a spell.\n\n>- **Dread Step**: Creatures within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of your starting or destination space (your choice) must make a **Wisdom saving throw** (**Your Spell Save DC**) or take **2d10 Psychic Damage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Contact Patron ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : You always have **Contact Other Plane** prepared. You can cast it **once** without using a spell slot to directly communicate with your Archfey and automatically succeed on the **saving throw**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Beguiling Defenses ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : Your patron teaches you how to guard your mind and body. You are **immune** to the **Charmed** condition. Additionally, when a visible creature hits you with an attack, you can use a **Reaction** to reduce the **damage taken** by half (rounded down) and force the attacker to make a **Wisdom saving throw** (**Your Spell Save DC**). On a failure, the attacker takes **Psychic Damage** equal to the **damage you took**. You can use this **Reaction** once per **Long Rest**, or restore it by expending a **Pact Spell Slot** (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Mystic Arcanum**: You learn a **6th-level Warlock spell**, which you can cast **once without a spell slot**, recharging after a **Long Rest**. At **Levels 13, 15, and 17**, you learn a **new Warlock spell** of **7th, 8th, and 9th level**, castable in the same way. At each **Warlock level**, you can replace one **Mystic Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Bewitching Magic**: Your patron grants you the power to weave your magic into teleportation. Immediately after casting an **Enchantment** or **Illusion** spell using an action and a **spell slot**, you can cast **Misty Step** in the same action without expending a spell slot.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Eldritch Master**: When you use your **Occult Cunning** (**Level 2**), you regain **all** your expended Pact Spell Slots instead of half.\n\n---\n\n**Eldritch Invocations**\n\n- **Armor of Shadows**: You can cast **Mage Armor** on yourself without expending a spell slot.\n\n- **Lifedrinker** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit with your **Pact Weapon**, deal **1d6 additional damage** (**Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant**, your choice) and spend a hit die to regain **HP** equal to the die roll + your **Constitution modifier** (**min 1**).\n\n- **Gift of the Depths** (*Level 5+*): You can **breathe underwater** and gain a **swim speed** equal to your **speed**. You can also cast **Water Breathing** once without expending a spell slot, recharging after a **Long Rest**.\n\n- **Gift of the Protectors** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Tome*): A new page appears in your **Book of Shadows**. A creature can write its name on it, up to a number of names equal to your **Charisma modifier** (**min 1**). If a listed creature drops to **0 HP** without dying outright, it instead drops to **1 HP**. Once triggered, no creature can benefit from this again until a **Long Rest**. As an **Action**, you can erase a name.\n\n- **Eldritch Mind**: You have **Advantage** on **Strength and Constitution Saving Throws** to maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Eldritch Smite** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit a creature with your **Pact Weapon**, you can expend a **spell slot** to deal **+1d8 per level of the slot**, and knock the target **Prone** if it is **Huge or smaller**.\n\n- **Investment of the Chain Master** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Chain*): When you cast **Find Familiar**, your familiar gains the following benefits. It gains a **fly or swim speed** (your choice) of **40 ft (12 m, 8c)**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can command the familiar to attack. When it deals **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, you can change it to **Necrotic or Radiant Damage**. If it forces a creature to make a **Saving Throw**, it uses your **Spell Save DC**. When it takes damage, you can use a **Reaction** to grant it **Resistance to that damage**.\n\n- **Thirsting Blade** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): You can attack **twice** with your **Pact Weapon** when taking the **Attack action**.\n\n- **Lessons of the Ancients** (*Level 2+*): You gain knowledge, allowing you to choose an **Origin Feat** of your choice.\n\n- **Devouring Blade** (*Level 12+, Thirsting Blade*): The extra attack from **Thirsting Blade** grants **two additional attacks** instead of one.\n\n- **Mask of Many Faces** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Disguise Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Master of Myriad Forms** (*Level 5+*): You can cast **Alter Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Whispers of the Grave** (*Level 7+*): You can cast **Speak with Dead** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Pact of the Chain**: You can cast **Find Familiar** without expending a **spell slot**. Your familiar can take a standard or special form. You can sacrifice one of your attacks to let the familiar attack with its **Reaction**.\n\n- **Pact of the Blade**: As a **Bonus Action**, summon a melee weapon or bond with an unattuned magical weapon. You are proficient with the weapon, can use it as a **spellcasting focus**, and use **Charisma** for **attack rolls** and **damage rolls**. The weapon can deal **Necrotic, Psychic, Radiant Damage**, or its normal damage type. The bond ends if the weapon is more than **5 ft (1.5 m, 1c)** away for **1 minute**, if you use this feature again, or if you die. A summoned weapon disappears when the bond ends.\n\n- **Pact of the Tome**: At the end of a **Short or Long Rest**, summon a **Book of Shadows** containing **three cantrips** and **two 1st-level spells** with the **Ritual** tag from any spell list, even if they are not prepared. While the book is on you, these spells count as **Warlock spells**. You can also use the book as a **spellcasting focus**. The book disappears if you summon a new one or if you die.\n\n- **Agonizing Blast** (*Level 2+*): Add your **Charisma modifier** to the **damage** of **one Eldritch Blast**.\n\n- **Repelling Blast** (*Level 2+*): When you hit a creature with **Eldritch Blast**, push it **10 ft (3 m, 2c)** away.\n\n- **Eyes of the Rune Keeper** (*Level 5+*): You can perceive through the senses of a willing creature as a **Bonus Action**. Maintain the link with a **Bonus Action** each turn.\n\n- **Otherworldly Leap** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Jump** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Eldritch Sphere** (*Level 2+*): Increase the range of **one damaging cantrip** with a range of **30 ft (9 m, 6c)** or more by **100 ft (30 m, 20c)** × your **Warlock level**.\n\n- **Fiendish Vigor** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **False Life** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**, gaining **8 temporary HP**.\n\n- **Misty Visions** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Silent Image** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Visions of Distant Realms** (*Level 9+*): You can cast **Arcane Eye** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Witch Sight** (*Level 15+*): You gain **Truesight** up to **30 ft (9 m, 6c)**.\n\n- **Devil’s Sight** (*Level 2+*): You can see normally in **dim light and darkness** (magical or non-magical) up to **120 ft (36 m, 24c)**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Warlock level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**.\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **History**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Pact Magic (Warlock)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. You regain all your **Pact Spell Slots** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Your Prepared Spells**: When you gain an **Warlock level**, you can replace one **prepared spell**, one **cantrip**, and one **Mystic Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to replace non-costly material components.\n\n| Level | Spell<br>Level | **Expended Slots** | Spell<br>Level | **Mystic Arcanum** | **Cantrips Known** | **Save DC** (8 + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha Mod**) | **Prepared Spells** | **Spell Attack Bonus** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha Mod**) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) |               |                             |        |                                                    |\n\n> **Eldritch Invocations**: You tap into **fragments of forbidden knowledge**, granting you **unique magical abilities**. You gain **1** at **level 1**. You can swap one of your **Eldritch Invocations** for another available one whenever you level up.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 2 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 5 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 12 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
donsuite: <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 18\n\n<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Magical Cunning ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : In **1 minute** as a **Ritual**, you can regain up to half (rounded up) of your **expended Pact Spell Slots**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Celestial Patron Spells** (always prepared):\n\n| **Warlock Level** | **Spell** |\n|---|---|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | **Aid**, **Cure Wounds**, **Guiding Bolt**, **Lesser Restoration**, **Light**, **Sacred Flame** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | **Daylight**, **Revivify** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7** | **Guardian of Faith**, **Wall of Fire** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9** | **Greater Restoration**, **Summon Celestial** |\n\n> **Healing Light** Pool: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You can channel **celestial energy** to heal. You have a pool of **d6 dice** equal to **1 + your Warlock level**. As a **Bonus Action**, heal yourself or a visible creature within **60' (18m, 12sq)** by spending up to a number of dice equal to your **Charisma mod.** (minimum 1). Roll the spent dice and restore **HP** equal to the total. The pool fully replenishes after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement** : Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Radiant Soul** : You gain **Resistance to Radiant Damage**. Once per turn, when a spell you cast deals **Radiant or Fire Damage**, add your **Charisma mod.** to the damage dealt to one target of the spell.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Contact Patron ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : You always have **Contact Other Plane** prepared. You can cast it **once** without expending a spell slot to directly contact your **Celestial Patron** and automatically succeed the **saving throw**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Celestial Resilience** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Half: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you use **Eldritch Cunning** or finish a **Short or Long Rest**, you gain **Temporary HP** equal to your **Warlock level** + your **Charisma mod.**. Additionally, up to five visible creatures gain **Temporary HP** equal to half your **Warlock level** + your **Charisma mod.**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Mystic Arcanum** : You learn a **6th-level Warlock spell** that you can cast **once without expending a slot**, recovering it after a **Long Rest**. At **Levels 13, 15, and 17**, you learn a **7th, 8th, and 9th-level Warlock spell** in the same way. At each **Warlock level**, you can replace a **Mystic Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Searing Vengeance ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : When you or an ally within **60' (18m, 12sq)** make a **Death Saving Throw**, you can release radiant energy to restore **HP** equal to half the target’s maximum **HP**. They can also stand up if they were **Prone**. Each chosen creature within **30' (9m, 6sq)** of the target takes **2d8 Radiant Damage** + your **Charisma mod.** and is **Blinded** until the end of your turn. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon** : You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Eldritch Master** : When you use your **Eldritch Cunning** (**Level 2**), you recover **all** expended spell slots instead of half.\n\n---\n\n**Eldritch Invocations**\n\n- **Armor of Shadows**: You can cast **Mage Armor** on yourself without expending a spell slot.\n\n- **Lifedrinker** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit with your **Pact Weapon**, deal **1d6 additional damage** (**Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant**, your choice) and spend a hit die to regain **HP** equal to the die roll + your **Constitution modifier** (**min 1**).\n\n- **Gift of the Depths** (*Level 5+*): You can **breathe underwater** and gain a **swim speed** equal to your **speed**. You can also cast **Water Breathing** once without expending a spell slot, recharging after a **Long Rest**.\n\n- **Gift of the Protectors** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Tome*): A new page appears in your **Book of Shadows**. A creature can write its name on it, up to a number of names equal to your **Charisma modifier** (**min 1**). If a listed creature drops to **0 HP** without dying outright, it instead drops to **1 HP**. Once triggered, no creature can benefit from this again until a **Long Rest**. As an **Action**, you can erase a name.\n\n- **Eldritch Mind**: You have **Advantage** on **Strength and Constitution Saving Throws** to maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Eldritch Smite** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit a creature with your **Pact Weapon**, you can expend a **spell slot** to deal **+1d8 per level of the slot**, and knock the target **Prone** if it is **Huge or smaller**.\n\n- **Investment of the Chain Master** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Chain*): When you cast **Find Familiar**, your familiar gains the following benefits. It gains a **fly or swim speed** (your choice) of **40 ft (12 m, 8c)**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can command the familiar to attack. When it deals **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, you can change it to **Necrotic or Radiant Damage**. If it forces a creature to make a **Saving Throw**, it uses your **Spell Save DC**. When it takes damage, you can use a **Reaction** to grant it **Resistance to that damage**.\n\n- **Thirsting Blade** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): You can attack **twice** with your **Pact Weapon** when taking the **Attack action**.\n\n- **Lessons of the Ancients** (*Level 2+*): You gain knowledge, allowing you to choose an **Origin Feat** of your choice.\n\n- **Devouring Blade** (*Level 12+, Thirsting Blade*): The extra attack from **Thirsting Blade** grants **two additional attacks** instead of one.\n\n- **Mask of Many Faces** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Disguise Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Master of Myriad Forms** (*Level 5+*): You can cast **Alter Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Whispers of the Grave** (*Level 7+*): You can cast **Speak with Dead** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Pact of the Chain**: You can cast **Find Familiar** without expending a **spell slot**. Your familiar can take a standard or special form. You can sacrifice one of your attacks to let the familiar attack with its **Reaction**.\n\n- **Pact of the Blade**: As a **Bonus Action**, summon a melee weapon or bond with an unattuned magical weapon. You are proficient with the weapon, can use it as a **spellcasting focus**, and use **Charisma** for **attack rolls** and **damage rolls**. The weapon can deal **Necrotic, Psychic, Radiant Damage**, or its normal damage type. The bond ends if the weapon is more than **5 ft (1.5 m, 1c)** away for **1 minute**, if you use this feature again, or if you die. A summoned weapon disappears when the bond ends.\n\n- **Pact of the Tome**: At the end of a **Short or Long Rest**, summon a **Book of Shadows** containing **three cantrips** and **two 1st-level spells** with the **Ritual** tag from any spell list, even if they are not prepared. While the book is on you, these spells count as **Warlock spells**. You can also use the book as a **spellcasting focus**. The book disappears if you summon a new one or if you die.\n\n- **Agonizing Blast** (*Level 2+*): Add your **Charisma modifier** to the **damage** of **one Eldritch Blast**.\n\n- **Repelling Blast** (*Level 2+*): When you hit a creature with **Eldritch Blast**, push it **10 ft (3 m, 2c)** away.\n\n- **Eyes of the Rune Keeper** (*Level 5+*): You can perceive through the senses of a willing creature as a **Bonus Action**. Maintain the link with a **Bonus Action** each turn.\n\n- **Otherworldly Leap** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Jump** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Eldritch Sphere** (*Level 2+*): Increase the range of **one damaging cantrip** with a range of **30 ft (9 m, 6c)** or more by **100 ft (30 m, 20c)** × your **Warlock level**.\n\n- **Fiendish Vigor** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **False Life** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**, gaining **8 temporary HP**.\n\n- **Misty Visions** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Silent Image** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Visions of Distant Realms** (*Level 9+*): You can cast **Arcane Eye** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Witch Sight** (*Level 15+*): You gain **Truesight** up to **30 ft (9 m, 6c)**.\n\n- **Devil’s Sight** (*Level 2+*): You can see normally in **dim light and darkness** (magical or non-magical) up to **120 ft (36 m, 24c)**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Warlock level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**.\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **History**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Pact Magic (Warlock)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. You regain all your **Pact Spell Slots** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Your Prepared Spells**: When you gain an **Warlock level**, you can replace one **prepared spell**, one **cantrip**, and one **Mystic Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to replace non-costly material components.\n\n| Level | Spell<br>Level | **Expended Slots** | Spell<br>Level | **Mystic Arcanum** | **Cantrips Known** | **Save DC** (8 + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha Mod**) | **Prepared Spells** | **Spell Attack Bonus** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha Mod**)
