![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) |               |                             |        |                                                    |\n\n> **Eldritch Invocations**: You tap into **fragments of forbidden knowledge**, granting you **unique magical abilities**. You gain **1** at **level 1**. You can swap one of your **Eldritch Invocations** for another available one whenever you level up.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 2 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 5 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 12 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
donsuite:  <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 18\n\n<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Magical Cunning ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : In **1 minute** as a **Ritual**, you can regain up to half (rounded up) of your **expended Pact Spell Slots**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Fiendish Spells** (always prepared):\n\n| **Warlock Level** | **Spell** |\n|---|---|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | **Burning Hands**, **Command**, **Scorching Ray**, **Suggestion** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | **Fireball**, **Stinking Cloud** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7** | **Fire Shield**, **Wall of Fire** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9** | **Geas**, **Insect Plague** |\n\n> **Dark One’s Blessing** **Temp HP**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you reduce an enemy to **0 HP**, or an enemy within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of you is reduced to **0 HP** by another, you gain **Temporary HP** equal to your **Charisma mod.** + your **Warlock level** (minimum 1).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Dark One’s Own Luck** Total uses: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You can call upon your fiendish patron to add **1d10 to an ability check** or a **Saving Throw**, after seeing the result but before knowing its effects. Usable a number of times equal to your **Charisma mod.** (minimum 1), but only once per roll. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Contact Patron ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: You always have **Contact Other Plane** prepared. You can cast it **once** without expending a spell slot to contact your **Fiend** patron and automatically succeed on the **Saving Throw**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Fiendish Resilience**: At each **Short or Long Rest**, choose one **Damage Type** other than **Force**: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png). You gain **Resistance** to that **Damage Type** until you choose a new one through this feature.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Mystic Arcanum**: You learn a **6th-level Warlock spell**, which you can cast **once without expending a slot**, regained after a **Long Rest**. At **Levels 13, 15, and 17**, you learn a **new Warlock spell** of **7th, 8th, and 9th level**, used the same way. At each **Warlock level**, you can replace an **Eldritch Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Hurl Through Hell ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an **attack roll**, it must succeed a **Charisma Saving Throw** (**Your Spell Save DC**) or be banished through the **Lower Planes**. It takes **8d10 Psychic Damage** (unless it’s a Fiend) and is **Incapacitated** until the end of your next turn, before reappearing in its original location or the nearest unoccupied space.\n\nRecharge after a **Long Rest**, or by expending a **Pact Magic spell slot**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Eldritch Master**: When you use **Eldritch Cunning** (**Level 2**), you recover **all** your expended spell slots instead of half.\n\n---\n\n**Eldritch Invocations**\n\n- **Armor of Shadows**: You can cast **Mage Armor** on yourself without expending a spell slot.\n\n- **Lifedrinker** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit with your **Pact Weapon**, deal **1d6 additional damage** (**Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant**, your choice) and spend a hit die to regain **HP** equal to the die roll + your **Constitution modifier** (**min 1**).\n\n- **Gift of the Depths** (*Level 5+*): You can **breathe underwater** and gain a **swim speed** equal to your **speed**. You can also cast **Water Breathing** once without expending a spell slot, recharging after a **Long Rest**.\n\n- **Gift of the Protectors** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Tome*): A new page appears in your **Book of Shadows**. A creature can write its name on it, up to a number of names equal to your **Charisma modifier** (**min 1**). If a listed creature drops to **0 HP** without dying outright, it instead drops to **1 HP**. Once triggered, no creature can benefit from this again until a **Long Rest**. As an **Action**, you can erase a name.\n\n- **Eldritch Mind**: You have **Advantage** on **Strength and Constitution Saving Throws** to maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Eldritch Smite** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit a creature with your **Pact Weapon**, you can expend a **spell slot** to deal **+1d8 per level of the slot**, and knock the target **Prone** if it is **Huge or smaller**.\n\n- **Investment of the Chain Master** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Chain*): When you cast **Find Familiar**, your familiar gains the following benefits. It gains a **fly or swim speed** (your choice) of **40 ft (12 m, 8c)**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can command the familiar to attack. When it deals **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, you can change it to **Necrotic or Radiant Damage**. If it forces a creature to make a **Saving Throw**, it uses your **Spell Save DC**. When it takes damage, you can use a **Reaction** to grant it **Resistance to that damage**.\n\n- **Thirsting Blade** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): You can attack **twice** with your **Pact Weapon** when taking the **Attack action**.\n\n- **Lessons of the Ancients** (*Level 2+*): You gain knowledge, allowing you to choose an **Origin Feat** of your choice.\n\n- **Devouring Blade** (*Level 12+, Thirsting Blade*): The extra attack from **Thirsting Blade** grants **two additional attacks** instead of one.\n\n- **Mask of Many Faces** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Disguise Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Master of Myriad Forms** (*Level 5+*): You can cast **Alter Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Whispers of the Grave** (*Level 7+*): You can cast **Speak with Dead** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Pact of the Chain**: You can cast **Find Familiar** without expending a **spell slot**. Your familiar can take a standard or special form. You can sacrifice one of your attacks to let the familiar attack with its **Reaction**.\n\n- **Pact of the Blade**: As a **Bonus Action**, summon a melee weapon or bond with an unattuned magical weapon. You are proficient with the weapon, can use it as a **spellcasting focus**, and use **Charisma** for **attack rolls** and **damage rolls**. The weapon can deal **Necrotic, Psychic, Radiant Damage**, or its normal damage type. The bond ends if the weapon is more than **5 ft (1.5 m, 1c)** away for **1 minute**, if you use this feature again, or if you die. A summoned weapon disappears when the bond ends.\n\n- **Pact of the Tome**: At the end of a **Short or Long Rest**, summon a **Book of Shadows** containing **three cantrips** and **two 1st-level spells** with the **Ritual** tag from any spell list, even if they are not prepared. While the book is on you, these spells count as **Warlock spells**. You can also use the book as a **spellcasting focus**. The book disappears if you summon a new one or if you die.\n\n- **Agonizing Blast** (*Level 2+*): Add your **Charisma modifier** to the **damage** of **one Eldritch Blast**.\n\n- **Repelling Blast** (*Level 2+*): When you hit a creature with **Eldritch Blast**, push it **10 ft (3 m, 2c)** away.\n\n- **Eyes of the Rune Keeper** (*Level 5+*): You can perceive through the senses of a willing creature as a **Bonus Action**. Maintain the link with a **Bonus Action** each turn.\n\n- **Otherworldly Leap** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Jump** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Eldritch Sphere** (*Level 2+*): Increase the range of **one damaging cantrip** with a range of **30 ft (9 m, 6c)** or more by **100 ft (30 m, 20c)** × your **Warlock level**.\n\n- **Fiendish Vigor** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **False Life** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**, gaining **8 temporary HP**.\n\n- **Misty Visions** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Silent Image** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Visions of Distant Realms** (*Level 9+*): You can cast **Arcane Eye** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Witch Sight** (*Level 15+*): You gain **Truesight** up to **30 ft (9 m, 6c)**.\n\n- **Devil’s Sight** (*Level 2+*): You can see normally in **dim light and darkness** (magical or non-magical) up to **120 ft (36 m, 24c)**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Charisma** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Warlock level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons**.\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Arcana**, **Deception**, **History**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Feature**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Pact Magic (Warlock)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. You regain all your **Pact Spell Slots** after a **Short Rest** or **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Replacing Your Prepared Spells**: When you gain an **Warlock level**, you can replace one **prepared spell**, one **cantrip**, and one **Mystic Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** to replace non-costly material components.\n\n| Level | Spell<br>Level | **Expended Slots** | Spell<br>Level | **Mystic Arcanum** | **Cantrips Known** | **Save DC** (8 + **Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha Mod**) | **Prepared Spells** | **Spell Attack Bonus** (**Proficiency Bonus** + **Cha Mod**) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) |               |                             |        |                                                    |\n\n> **Eldritch Invocations**: You tap into **fragments of forbidden knowledge**, granting you **unique magical abilities**. You gain **1** at **level 1**. You can swap one of your **Eldritch Invocations** for another available one whenever you level up.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 2 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 5 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 9 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) 12 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
donsuite:  <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 18\n\n<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Magical Cunning ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)** : In **1 minute** as a **Ritual**, you can regain up to half (rounded up) of your **expended Pact Spell Slots**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Great Old One Spells** (always prepared):\n\n| **Warlock Level** | **Spell** |\n|---|---|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3** | **Detect Thoughts**, **Dissonant Whispers**, **Phantasmal Force**, **Tasha’s Hideous Laughter** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5** | **Clairvoyance**, **Hunger of Hadar** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7** | **Confusion**, **Summon Aberration** |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9** | **Modify Memory**, **Telekinesis** |\n\n> **Psychic Spells**: When you cast an Warlock spell that deals Damage, you can change its **Damage Type to Psychic**. Additionally, when you cast an **Enchantment** or **Illusion** Warlock spell, you can do so **without verbal or somatic components**.\n\n> **Awakened Mind**: You can establish a telepathic connection between your mind and another creature. As a **Bonus Action**, choose one creature you can see within **30 feet (9 m, 6c)**. You and the chosen creature can **communicate telepathically** as long as you remain within a number of **miles equal to your Charisma modifier** (**minimum of 1 mile**). To understand each other, you must both **mentally use a language** that the other knows. This telepathic connection lasts for a number of **minutes equal to your Warlock level**. It ends early if you use this feature to connect with a different creature.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6** **Clairvoyant Combatant** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): When you form a telepathic link with a creature via **Awakened Mind**, you can force it to make a **Wisdom Saving Throw** against your **Spell Save DC**. On a failure, the creature has **Disadvantage** on attack rolls against you, and you have **Advantage** on attack rolls against it for the duration of the link. You can use this ability **once** before a **Short or Long Rest**, unless you **expend a Pact Magic spell slot** to restore it (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Contact Patron ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)**: You always have **Contact Other Plane** prepared. You can cast it **once** without expending a spell slot to contact your **Great Old One** and automatically succeed on the **Saving Throw**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Thought Shield**: Your thoughts are shielded against telepathy or other forms of reading, unless you allow it. You gain **Resistance to Psychic Damage**, and whenever a creature deals **Psychic Damage** to you, it takes the same amount of damage.\n\n> **Eldritch Hex**: Your **Great Old One** grants you a powerful curse. You always have the **Hex** spell prepared. When you cast **Hex** and choose an ability score, the target also has **Disadvantage** on **Saving Throws** using that ability for the duration of the spell: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Mystic Arcanum**: You learn a **6th-level Warlock spell**, which you can cast **once without expending a slot**, regained after a **Long Rest**. At **Levels 13, 15, and 17**, you learn a **new Warlock spell** of **7th, 8th, and 9th level**, used the same way. At each **Warlock level**, you can replace an **Eldritch Arcanum** with another spell of the same level.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Create Thrall**: When you cast **Summon Aberration**, you can remove the need for **Concentration**. If you do, the duration becomes **1 minute**, and the **aberration** gains **Temporary HP** equal to your **Warlock level** + your **Charisma mod.**\n\nAdditionally, the first time per turn that the **aberration** hits a creature affected by your **Hex**, it deals **extra Psychic Damage** equal to the spell’s bonus damage.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Eldritch Master**: When you use **Eldritch Cunning** (**Level 2**), you recover **all** your expended spell slots instead of half.\n\n---\n\n**Eldritch Invocations**\n\n- **Armor of Shadows**: You can cast **Mage Armor** on yourself without expending a spell slot.\n\n- **Lifedrinker** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit with your **Pact Weapon**, deal **1d6 additional damage** (**Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant**, your choice) and spend a hit die to regain **HP** equal to the die roll + your **Constitution modifier** (**min 1**).\n\n- **Gift of the Depths** (*Level 5+*): You can **breathe underwater** and gain a **swim speed** equal to your **speed**. You can also cast **Water Breathing** once without expending a spell slot, recharging after a **Long Rest**.\n\n- **Gift of the Protectors** (*Level 9+, Pact of the Tome*): A new page appears in your **Book of Shadows**. A creature can write its name on it, up to a number of names equal to your **Charisma modifier** (**min 1**). If a listed creature drops to **0 HP** without dying outright, it instead drops to **1 HP**. Once triggered, no creature can benefit from this again until a **Long Rest**. As an **Action**, you can erase a name.\n\n- **Eldritch Mind**: You have **Advantage** on **Strength and Constitution Saving Throws** to maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Eldritch Smite** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): Once per turn, when you hit a creature with your **Pact Weapon**, you can expend a **spell slot** to deal **+1d8 per level of the slot**, and knock the target **Prone** if it is **Huge or smaller**.\n\n- **Investment of the Chain Master** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Chain*): When you cast **Find Familiar**, your familiar gains the following benefits. It gains a **fly or swim speed** (your choice) of **40 ft (12 m, 8c)**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can command the familiar to attack. When it deals **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, you can change it to **Necrotic or Radiant Damage**. If it forces a creature to make a **Saving Throw**, it uses your **Spell Save DC**. When it takes damage, you can use a **Reaction** to grant it **Resistance to that damage**.\n\n- **Thirsting Blade** (*Level 5+, Pact of the Blade*): You can attack **twice** with your **Pact Weapon** when taking the **Attack action**.\n\n- **Lessons of the Ancients** (*Level 2+*): You gain knowledge, allowing you to choose an **Origin Feat** of your choice.\n\n- **Devouring Blade** (*Level 12+, Thirsting Blade*): The extra attack from **Thirsting Blade** grants **two additional attacks** instead of one.\n\n- **Mask of Many Faces** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Disguise Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Master of Myriad Forms** (*Level 5+*): You can cast **Alter Self** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Whispers of the Grave** (*Level 7+*): You can cast **Speak with Dead** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Pact of the Chain**: You can cast **Find Familiar** without expending a **spell slot**. Your familiar can take a standard or special form. You can sacrifice one of your attacks to let the familiar attack with its **Reaction**.\n\n- **Pact of the Blade**: As a **Bonus Action**, summon a melee weapon or bond with an unattuned magical weapon. You are proficient with the weapon, can use it as a **spellcasting focus**, and use **Charisma** for **attack rolls** and **damage rolls**. The weapon can deal **Necrotic, Psychic, Radiant Damage**, or its normal damage type. The bond ends if the weapon is more than **5 ft (1.5 m, 1c)** away for **1 minute**, if you use this feature again, or if you die. A summoned weapon disappears when the bond ends.\n\n- **Pact of the Tome**: At the end of a **Short or Long Rest**, summon a **Book of Shadows** containing **three cantrips** and **two 1st-level spells** with the **Ritual** tag from any spell list, even if they are not prepared. While the book is on you, these spells count as **Warlock spells**. You can also use the book as a **spellcasting focus**. The book disappears if you summon a new one or if you die.\n\n- **Agonizing Blast** (*Level 2+*): Add your **Charisma modifier** to the **damage** of **one Eldritch Blast**.\n\n- **Repelling Blast** (*Level 2+*): When you hit a creature with **Eldritch Blast**, push it **10 ft (3 m, 2c)** away.\n\n- **Eyes of the Rune Keeper** (*Level 5+*): You can perceive through the senses of a willing creature as a **Bonus Action**. Maintain the link with a **Bonus Action** each turn.\n\n- **Otherworldly Leap** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Jump** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Eldritch Sphere** (*Level 2+*): Increase the range of **one damaging cantrip** with a range of **30 ft (9 m, 6c)** or more by **100 ft (30 m, 20c)** × your **Warlock level**.\n\n- **Fiendish Vigor** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **False Life** on yourself without expending a **spell slot**, gaining **8 temporary HP**.\n\n- **Misty Visions** (*Level 2+*): You can cast **Silent Image** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Visions of Distant Realms** (*Level 9+*): You can cast **Arcane Eye** without expending a **spell slot**.\n\n- **Witch Sight** (*Level 15+*): You gain **Truesight** up to **30 ft (9 m, 6c)**.\n\n- **Devil’s Sight** (*Level 2+*): You can see normally in **dim light and darkness** (magical or non-magical) up to **120 ft (36 m, 24c)**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

nom: **Paladin**
nom 1: **Paladin**
type: Class

sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Paladin**\n\n**A devoted warrior bound by a sacred oath, bringing light into darkness and protecting the innocent.**\n\nPaladins embody the ideal of a virtuous champion, guided by sacred principles and unwavering devotion. Their power comes from solemn oaths sworn before divine entities, spirits of nature, or transcendent ideals. At the crossroads of faith and combat, they wield radiant magic to heal, protect, and strike down their foes with relentless justice.\n\nAs a paladin, every battle is a holy struggle against the forces of evil, and every victory strengthens their oath. But every oath carries a burden, and paladins must constantly prove their worth and resist temptations that could lead them astray from their divine mission.\n\n## **Oath of Devotion**\n\n*“Justice, truth, and light are my weapons; I will defend the innocent and smite the darkness.”*<br>\n\nPaladins of the Oath of Devotion embody the ideals of the shining knight. Their sacred oath is a commitment to protect the weak, live with honor, and defend the light against the shadows. These champions inspire hope and respect wherever they go, standing as beacons of virtue.\n\n## **Oath of Glory**\n\n*“Through heroic deeds, I shall ascend to the heights of legend.”*<br>\n\nPaladins of the Oath of Glory are born heroes, always seeking epic challenges and righteous causes. Their presence galvanizes their allies, and their shining exploits are sung in taverns and etched into history. These warriors inspire their comrades to surpass themselves and embrace the glory of victory.\n\n## **Oath of the Ancients**\n\n*“I am the guardian of life, the defender of light, and the protector of the eternal wilds.”*<br>\n\nPaladins of the Oath of the Ancients are champions of life and light. Deeply connected to nature, they cherish beauty and growth while fighting against forces of destruction. These warriors embody harmony and protection, blending fierce power with ancient wisdom.\n\n## **Oath of Vengeance**\n\n*“I shall hunt down the corrupt and bring them to justice, no matter the cost.”*<br>\n\nPaladins of the Oath of Vengeance are relentless hunters of oppressors and wrongdoers. Driven by cold fury and unshakable determination, they are willing to sacrifice everything to bring down the forces of evil. Their oaths push them to act without rest, guided by a harsh and unwavering sense of justice.\n\n---\n\n# The **Paladin**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class Features                                  | Divine<br>Channeling | Spells<br>Prepared | 1  | 2  | 3  | 4  | 5       | 2  | —  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 3      | +2                 | Channel Divinity, Sacred Oath            | 2              | 4              | 3  | —  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 4      | +2                 |  | +4                 | Aura of Courage                              | 2              | 9              | 4  | 3  | 2  | —  | —  |\n| 11     | +4                 | Radiant Strike caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Strength** & **Charisma**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Paladin level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, **Heavy Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Medicine**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Lay on Hands** Total pool: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You have a **healing pool** equal to **5 × your Paladin level**, replenished after a **long rest**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can touch a creature and expend **HP** from this pool to heal them. Alternatively, you can spend **5 HP** to cure the **Poisoned** condition.\n\n> **Spellcasting (Paladin)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells** : After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have the slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability** : **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus** : You can use a **Holy Symbol** to cast spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**) |![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)| \n\n> **Weapon Mastery** : Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **long rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Paladin's Smite** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Divine Smite** prepared and can cast it **once** for free per **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style** : You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *Ranged Weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *Light, Medium, or Heavy Armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling **damage dice** with a two-handed weapon, rolls of **1** or **2** become **3**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce the damage taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *Shield or a Simple/Martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack targeting a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** while you wield a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** with ranged attacks using weapons with the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **Ability Modifier** to the damage of your additional attack with a *Light Weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength mod.** in **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if no weapon or shield is wielded). At the start of your turn, deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **Grappled** creature.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blessed Warrior**: Instead of a Fighting Style, learn two **Cleric cantrips**. These count as **Paladin spells**, using **Charisma** as the casting ability. You can swap these spells at each level.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Channel Divinity** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can channel divine energy from the **Outer Planes** to create magical effects. You begin with one effect: **Divine Sense**. More effects become available over time. Each use of this feature, you choose which effect to activate. You can use **Channel Divinity** twice. You regain one use after a **Short Rest** and all uses after a **Long Rest**. You gain an additional use at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Paladin level 11**. If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** is your **Paladin Spell Save DC**.\n\n>- **Divine Sense**: As a **Bonus Action**, detect *Celestials*, *Fiends*, and *Undead* within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** for **10 minutes** or until **Incapacitated**. You know their location and type. You also sense **Consecrated or Desecrated** areas/objects (like with **Hallow** spell).\n\n> **Oath of Devotion Spells**: Your oath grants you certain spells that are always prepared. When you reach a **specified Paladin level**, you automatically have these spells prepared.\n\n>**Oath of Devotion Spells**\n\n| **Paladin Level** | **Spell**                                   |\n|-------------------|---------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3       | Protection from Evil and Good, Shield of Faith |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5       | Aid, Zone of Truth                       |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9       | Beacon of Hope, Dispel Magic    |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13      | Freedom of Movement, Guardian of Faith  |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17      | Commune, Flame Strike                 |\n\n> **Sacred Weapon**: When using the **Attack action**, you can expend a use of **Channel Divinity** to imbue a melee weapon with divine energy. This effect lasts **10 minutes** or until reactivation. You add your **Charisma mod** to **attack rolls** with the weapon (**min +1**), and its attacks deal either **normal or radiant damage**, your choice. The weapon emits bright light for **20' (6 m, 4 sq)** and dim light for another **20' (6 m, 4 sq)**. The effect ends if you drop the weapon or dismiss it (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or a **Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**. \n\n> **Faithful Steed** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You always have **Find Steed** prepared and can cast it **once** for free per **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Aura of Protection**: **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** radius (Inactive if **Incapacitated**). You and allies gain a **bonus to Saving Throws** equal to your **Charisma Mod** (**min +1**). Does not stack with another **Aura of Protection**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Aura of Devotion**: You and allies in your **Aura of Protection** are **immune** to the **Charmed** condition. If an already **Charmed** ally enters the aura, the condition has no effect on them while inside it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Abjure Foes**: **Magical Action**. Use **Channel Divinity**. Targets (**Charisma mod**, **min 1**) within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** must make a **Wisdom Saving Throw** or be **Frightened** for **1 minute** (or until they take damage). While **Frightened**, they have **Disadvantage** on **attack rolls and ability checks** if their fear source is in **line of sight** and cannot move toward it voluntarily.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Aura of Courage**: You and allies are **immune** to the **Frightened** condition while in your **Aura of Protection**. If a **Frightened** ally enters, the condition has no effect on them while inside.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Radiant Strikes**: Your melee and unarmed attacks deal **+1d8 Radiant Damage** on a hit.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Restoring Touch**: When you use **Lay on Hands** on a creature, you may also remove one or more of the following conditions: **Blinded**, **Charmed**, **Deafened**, **Frightened**, **Paralyzed**, or **Stunned**. Each condition removed costs 5 points from your pool (not stackable with **HP restored**).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Smite of Protection**: When you cast **Divine Smite**, a protective energy radiates from you. You and allies in your **Aura of Protection** gain **half cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity saving throws**) until the start of your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Aura Enhancement**: Your **Aura of Protection** extends to **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Holy Nimbus** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, imbue your **Aura of Protection** with **divine power** for **10 minutes** or until dismissed (no action required). Recharge after a **Long Rest** or by expending a **5th-level spell slot**. It grants the following benefits:\n\n- **Sacred Protection**: You gain **Advantage** on all **Saving Throws** imposed by fiends or undead.\n\n- **Radiant Damage**: Each enemy that starts its turn within your aura takes **Radiant Damage** equal to your **Charisma mod + your Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n- **Sunlight**: The aura emits bright light, considered **sunlight**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Strength** & **Charisma**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Paladin level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, **Heavy Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Medicine**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Lay on Hands** Total pool: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You have a **healing pool** equal to **5 × your Paladin level**, replenished after a **long rest**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can touch a creature and expend **HP** from this pool to heal them. Alternatively, you can spend **5 HP** to cure the **Poisoned** condition.\n\n> **Spellcasting (Paladin)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells** : After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have the slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability** : **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus** : You can use a **Holy Symbol** to cast spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**) |![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)| \n\n> **Weapon Mastery** : Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **long rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Paladin's Smite** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Divine Smite** prepared and can cast it **once** for free per **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style** : You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *Ranged Weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *Light, Medium, or Heavy Armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling **damage dice** with a two-handed weapon, rolls of **1** or **2** become **3**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce the damage taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *Shield or a Simple/Martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack targeting a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** while you wield a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** with ranged attacks using weapons with the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **Ability Modifier** to the damage of your additional attack with a *Light Weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength mod.** in **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if no weapon or shield is wielded). At the start of your turn, deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **Grappled** creature.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blessed Warrior**: Instead of a Fighting Style, learn two **Cleric cantrips**. These count as **Paladin spells**, using **Charisma** as the casting ability. You can swap these spells at each level.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Channel Divinity** Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can channel divine energy from the **Outer Planes** to create magical effects. You start with one effect: **Divine Sense**. More become available over time. Each time you use this ability, you choose the effect to activate. You can use **Channel Divinity** twice. You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**. You gain an extra use at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Paladin level 11**. If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** equals your **Paladin Spell Save DC**.\n\n>- **Divine Sense**: As a **Bonus Action**, detect *Celestials*, *Fiends*, and *Undead* within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** for **10 minutes** or until **Incapacitated**. You know their location and type. You also detect consecrated or desecrated places or objects (as per the **Hallow** spell).\n\n> **Inspiring Smite**: After using **Divine Smite**, you can spend a **Channel Divinity** use to distribute **Temporary HP** to creatures of your choice within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**, including yourself. The total **Temporary HP** is equal to **2d8 + your Paladin level**, split as you see fit.\n\n> **Oath of Glory Spells**: The following spells are always prepared when you reach the indicated level:\n\n| **Paladin Level** | **Spell**                                   |\n|------------------|---------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3                     | Guiding Bolt, Heroism                 |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5                     | Enhance Ability, Magic Weapon   |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9                     | Haste, Protection from Energy      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13                    | Compulsion, Freedom of Movement           |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17                    | 	Legend Lore, Yolande’s Regal Presence       |\n\n> **Peerless Athlete**: As a **Bonus Action**, spend a **Channel Divinity** use to enhance your physical prowess for 1 hour:\n\n>- You have **Advantage** on **Strength (Athletics)** and **Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks**.\n\n>- Your jump distance increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** (consuming movement as normal).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**. \n\n> **Faithful Steed** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Find Steed** prepared and can cast it **once** without expending a spell slot per **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Aura of Protection**: **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** radius (Inactive if **Incapacitated**). You and allies gain a **Saving Throw bonus** equal to your **Charisma Mod.** (**min +1**). Doesn't stack with another **Aura of Protection**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Aura of Alacrity**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**. Also, when an ally enters your **Aura of Protection** for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, their **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** until the end of their next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Abjure Foes**: **Magical Action**. Spend **Channel Divinity**. Targets (**up to Cha Mod.**, **min 1**) within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** must make a **Wisdom Save** or be **Frightened** for **1 min** (or until damaged). While **Frightened**, they have **Disadvantage** on **ability checks and attack rolls** if they can see you, and can’t willingly move closer.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Aura of Courage**: You and allies within your **Aura of Protection** are **immune** to the **Frightened** condition. If a **Frightened** ally enters your aura, the condition has no effect as long as they remain inside.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Radiant Strikes**: Your attacks deal **+1d8 Radiant Damage** when you hit with a melee weapon or unarmed strike.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Restoring Touch**: When you use **Lay on Hands** on a creature, you can also remove one or more conditions: **Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, or Stunned**. Each removed condition costs **5 HP** from your pool (not stackable with HP restoration).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Glorious Defense** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You can turn defense into a counterattack. When you or a visible creature within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** is hit by an attack, you can use a **Reaction** to grant a **bonus to AC** against that attack. The bonus equals your **Charisma mod.** (**min +1**). If the attack misses, you can make a weapon attack against the attacker, if they are within range, as part of the same **Reaction**. Usable **a number of times equal to your Charisma mod.** (**min 1**). Recharges after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Aura Expansions**: Your **Aura of Protection** extends to **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Living Legend** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Bonus Action**, you embody the legends of your exploits for **10 minutes**. Recharges after a **Long Rest** or by expending a **5th-level spell slot**. Effects:\n\n>- **Supernatural Charisma**: You have **Advantage** on all **Charisma checks**.\n\n>- **Saving Throw Reroll**: If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can use a **Reaction** to reroll it. You must use the new result.\n\n>- **Unerring Strike**: Once per turn, when you miss a weapon attack, you can turn it into a hit.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
