pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Strength** & **Charisma**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Paladin level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, **Heavy Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Medicine**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Lay on Hands** Total pool: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You have a **healing pool** equal to **5 × your Paladin level**, replenished after a **long rest**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can touch a creature and expend **HP** from this pool to heal them. Alternatively, you can spend **5 HP** to cure the **Poisoned** condition.\n\n> **Spellcasting (Paladin)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells** : After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have the slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability** : **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus** : You can use a **Holy Symbol** to cast spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**) |![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)| \n\n> **Weapon Mastery** : Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **long rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Paladin's Smite** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Divine Smite** prepared and can cast it **once** for free per **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style** : You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *Ranged Weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *Light, Medium, or Heavy Armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling **damage dice** with a two-handed weapon, rolls of **1** or **2** become **3**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce the damage taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *Shield or a Simple/Martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack targeting a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** while you wield a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** with ranged attacks using weapons with the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **Ability Modifier** to the damage of your additional attack with a *Light Weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength mod.** in **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if no weapon or shield is wielded). At the start of your turn, deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **Grappled** creature.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blessed Warrior**: Instead of a Fighting Style, learn two **Cleric cantrips**. These count as **Paladin spells**, using **Charisma** as the casting ability. You can swap these spells at each level.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Channel Divinity** Total Uses: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can channel divine energy from the **Outer Planes** to create magical effects. You start with **Divine Sense**, and more options become available over time. Each time you use this feature, choose the effect to activate. You can use **Channel Divinity** twice. You regain one use after a **Short Rest** and all uses after a **Long Rest**. You gain an additional use at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Paladin Level 11**. If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** is your **Paladin Spell Save DC**.\n\n>- **Divine Sense**: As a **Bonus Action**, detect *Celestials*, *Fiends*, and *Undead* within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** for **10 minutes** or until **Incapacitated**. You know their location and type. You also sense consecrated or desecrated places or objects (as per the **Hallow** spell).\n\n> **Nature’s Wrath**: As a **Magical Action**, expend one use of your **Divine Channeling** to summon **spectral vines** around nearby creatures. Each chosen creature within **4.5 m (15', 3c)** must succeed on a **Strength saving throw** or become **Restrained** for **1 minute**. A **Restrained** creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.\n\n> **Oath Spells**: Your oath grants you spells that are always prepared. When you reach the specified **Paladin Level**, you automatically prepare these spells.\n\n>**Oath of the Ancients Spells**\n\n| **Paladin Level** | **Spell**                                   |\n|------------------|---------------------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3                     | Ensnaring Strike, Speak with Animals  |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5                     | Misty Step, Moonbeam                |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9                     | Plant Growth, Protection from Energy |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13                    | Ice Storm, Stoneskin          |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17                    | Commune with Nature, Tree Stride |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Faithful Steed** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Find Steed** prepared and can cast it **once** without expending a spell slot per **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Aura of Protection**: **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** radius around you (Inactive if **Incapacitated**). You and allies gain a bonus to **Saving Throws** equal to your **Charisma Modifier** (**min +1**). Does not stack with another **Aura of Protection**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Aura of Warding**: **Ancient magic** shields you and your allies in your **Aura of Protection**, granting **Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant damage**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Abjure Foes**: **Magic Action**. Spend a use of **Channel Divinity**. Targets (**up to your Charisma mod, min 1**) within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** must make a **Wisdom Save** or be **Frightened** for **1 minute** (or until they take damage). While **Frightened**, they suffer **Disadvantage** on **Ability Checks and Attack Rolls** if they can see the source of their fear and cannot willingly move closer to it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Aura of Courage**: You and allies in your **Aura of Protection** are **Immune to the Frightened Condition**. If a **Frightened** ally enters the aura, the condition has no effect while inside.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Divine Smite**: Your melee weapon or unarmed attacks deal **+1d8 Radiant damage** on a hit.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Restoring Touch**: When using **Lay on Hands**, you can also remove one or more of the following conditions: **Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, or Stunned**. Each removed condition costs 5 points from your pool (not stackable with **HP** restoration).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Undying Sentinel** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): When reduced to **0 HP** without being killed, you can drop to **1 HP** instead and regain **HP equal to 3 × your Paladin level**. Recharge after a **Long Rest**. Additionally, you cannot age magically and cease to age visibly.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Aura Expansion**: Your **Aura of Protection** extends to **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Elder Champion** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): By using a **Bonus Action**, infuse your **Aura of Protection** with primal energy for **1 minute**. Recharge after a **Long Rest** or by expending a **5th-level spell slot**. Effects:\n\n>- **Weakened Foes**: Enemies in the aura suffer **Disadvantage** on **Saves** against your spells and **Channel Divinity** options.\n\n>- **Regeneration**: At the start of each turn, regain **10 HP**.\n\n>- **Quickened Spells**: When casting a spell with a casting time of **1 Action**, you can instead cast it as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Strength** & **Charisma**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Paladin level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Wisdom** and **Charisma**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, **Heavy Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Medicine**, **Persuasion**, or **Religion**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Lay on Hands** Total pool: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You have a **healing pool** equal to **5 × your Paladin level**, replenished after a **long rest**. As a **Bonus Action**, you can touch a creature and expend **HP** from this pool to heal them. Alternatively, you can spend **5 HP** to cure the **Poisoned** condition.\n\n> **Spellcasting (Paladin)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Replace Prepared Spells** : After a **long rest**, you can swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have the slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability** : **Charisma**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus** : You can use a **Holy Symbol** to cast spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Expended Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**) |![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)| \n\n> **Weapon Mastery** : Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **long rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Paladin's Smite** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Divine Smite** prepared and can cast it **once** for free per **long rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style** : You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *Ranged Weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *Light, Medium, or Heavy Armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling **damage dice** with a two-handed weapon, rolls of **1** or **2** become **3**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce the damage taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *Shield or a Simple/Martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack targeting a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** while you wield a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** with ranged attacks using weapons with the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **Ability Modifier** to the damage of your additional attack with a *Light Weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength mod.** in **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if no weapon or shield is wielded). At the start of your turn, deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **Grappled** creature.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blessed Warrior**: Instead of a Fighting Style, learn two **Cleric cantrips**. These count as **Paladin spells**, using **Charisma** as the casting ability. You can swap these spells at each level.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Channel Divinity** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You can channel **divine power** from the **Outer Planes** to create magical effects. You start with **one effect: Divine Sense**. More effects become available as you level up. Each time you use this ability, you choose which effect to activate.\n\nYou can use **Channel Divinity** twice. You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**. You gain **one additional use** at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Paladin Level 11**. If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** equals your **Paladin Spell Save DC**.\n\n­­>- **Divine Sense**: As a **Bonus Action**, detect *Celestials*, *Fiends*, and *Undead* within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** for **10 mins** or until **Incapacitated**. You learn their location and type. You also detect places or objects that are consecrated or desecrated (as with the **Hallow** spell).\n\n> **Vow of Enmity**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can expend a **Channel Divinity** use to swear a **Vow of Enmity** against a creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**. You gain **Advantage** on **attack rolls** against that creature for **1 min** or until you use this ability again. If the creature reaches **0 HP** before the vow ends, you can transfer it to another creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** (no action required).\n\n> **Oath Spells – Oath of Vengeance**: The following spells are always prepared when you reach the indicated level:\n\n| **Paladin Level** | **Spell**                     |\n|------------------|-------------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3 | Bane, Hunter's Mark |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5 | Hold Person, Misty Step |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9 | Haste, Protection from Energy |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13 | Banishment, Dimension Door |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17 | Hold Monster, Scrying |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability**, **+1 to two abilities**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Steadfast Steed** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Find Steed** prepared and can cast it **once** for free per **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Aura of Protection**: **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** around you (inactive if **Incapacitated**). You and allies gain a bonus to **Saving Throws** equal to your **Charisma Mod** (**min +1**). Does not stack with another **Aura of Protection**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Relentless Avenger**: Your supernatural focus hinders your foes' retreat. When you hit a creature with an **Opportunity Attack**, its **Speed is reduced to 0** until the end of the current turn. You can then move up to **half your Speed** as part of the same **Reaction**, without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Abjure Foes**: **Magical Action**. Spend a **Channel Divinity** use. Targets (**up to Charisma Mod**, **min 1**) within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** must make a **Wisdom Save** or be **Frightened** for **1 min** (or until they take damage). While **Frightened**, they suffer **Disadvantage** on **ability checks and attack rolls** if the source of fear is within **line of sight** and cannot move willingly towards it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Aura of Courage**: You and allies within your **Aura of Protection** are **immune** to the **Frightened** condition. If an ally already **Frightened** enters your aura, the condition has no effect on them while inside it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Divine Smite**: Your attacks deal **+1d8 Radiant Damage** when you hit with a melee weapon or unarmed strike.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Restoring Touch**: When you use **Lay on Hands** on a creature, you can also remove one or more conditions: **Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, or Stunned**. Each condition removed costs **5 HP** from your pool (not stackable with HP restored).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Soul of Vengeance**: When a creature affected by your **Vow of Enmity** succeeds or fails an **attack roll**, you can use a **Reaction** to make a melee attack against it if it's within range.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Aura Expansion**: Your **Aura of Protection** extends to **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Avenging Angel**: As a **Bonus Action**, gain the following effects for **10 mins** or until you choose to end them (no action required). Recharges after a **Long Rest** or by expending a **5th-level spell slot**.\n\n- **Flight**: Spectral **wings emerge**, granting you a **Flying Speed of 60' (18 m, 12 sq)** and the ability to **hover**.\n\n- **Terrifying Aura**: Enemies starting their turn within your **Aura of Protection** must succeed on a **Wisdom Save** or be **Frightened** for **1 min** or until they take damage. You have **Advantage** on **attack rolls** against these creatures.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Ranger**\n\n**A tracker and guardian of the wilds, guided by instinct and the harmony of nature.**\n\nRangers are explorers who traverse the untamed frontiers, protectors of lands where civilization fades. They combine instinct, cunning, and a unique affinity with nature to survive and defend. These solitary adventurers master the art of hunting, tracking, and combat in the harshest environments, whether dense forests or arid deserts.\n\nA ranger's role extends far beyond that of a mere scout: they stand as protectors, whether defending villages from monsters or maintaining the delicate balance of ecosystems. Their connection to nature often manifests in spells and abilities that reflect the raw power and harmony of the elements.\n\n## **Beast Master**\n\n*“Nature has granted me an ally, a companion whose strength and loyalty are unshakable.”*<br>\n\nBeast Master rangers forge a mystical bond with a wild creature, forming an unbreakable partnership. This connection transcends words, relying on mutual understanding and instinctive magic. Together, they face dangers and guard the secrets of the lands they cherish.\n\n## **Fey Wanderer**\n\n*“The mists of the Feywild surround me, and its secrets guide my steps.”*<br>\n\nFey Wanderer rangers draw strength from the magic of the Feywild. Their mysterious presence and affinity with fey forces allow them to enchant enemies and defend nature with an almost supernatural grace. These rangers move between worlds, borrowing the trickery and beauty of the Fey.\n\n## **Gloom Stalker**\n\n*“I am the unseen eye in the night, the shadow that hunts the monsters lurking in darkness.”*<br>\n\nGloom Stalker rangers master the darkness, tracking their prey where light does not reach. Experts in ambush and stealth, they protect the innocent from threats that hide in the shadows. Their magic and skills make them as elusive as they are dangerous.\n\n## **Hunter**\n\n*“I hunt and strike, not out of cruelty, but to preserve the balance of the world.”*<br>\n\nHunter rangers refine their tracking and combat techniques to take on the most powerful enemies. They adapt their tactics to their foes, whether giant monsters or hordes of adversaries. These rangers embody precision and resilience.\n\n---\n\n# The **Ranger**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class Features | Favored<br>Enemy | Spells<br>Prepared | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 |\n|--------|--------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------|----------------|----|----|----|----|----|\n| 1      | +2                 | Spellcasting, Favored Enemy, Weapon Mastery | 2 | 2 | 2  | —  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 2      | +2                 | Deft Explorer, Fighting Style | 2 | 3 | 2  | —  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 3      | +2                 | Ranger Archetype Feature | 2 | 4 | 3  | —  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 4      | +2                 | Ability Score Improvement | 2 | 5 | 3  | —  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 5      | +3                 | Extra Attack | 3 | 6 | 4  | 2  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 6      | +3                 | Roving | 3 | 6 | 4  | 2  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 7      | +3                 | Ranger Archetype Feature | 3 | 7 | 4  | 3  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 8      | +3                 | Ability Score Improvement | 3 | 7 | 4  | 3  | —  | —  | —  |\n| 9      | +4                 | Expertise | 4 | 9 | 4  | 3  | 2  | —  | —  |\n| 10     | +4                 | Tireless | 4 | 9 | 4  | 3  | 2  | —  | —  |\n| 11     | +4                 | Ranger Archetype Feature | 4 | 10 | 4  | 3  | 3  | —  | —  |\n| 12     | +4                 | Ability Score Improvement | 4 | 10 | 4  | 3  | 3  | —  | —  |\n| 13     | +5                 | Relentless Hunter | 5 | 11 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 1  | —  |\n| 14     | +5                 | Nature's Veil | 5 | 11 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 1  | —  |\n| 15     | +5                 | Ranger Archetype Feature | 5 | 12 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 2  | —  |\n| 16     | +5                 | Ability Score Improvement | 5 | 12 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 2  | —  |\n| 17     | +6                 | Precise Hunter | 6 | 14 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 3  | 1  |\n| 18     | +6                 | Feral Senses | 6 | 14 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 3  | 1  |\n| 19     | +6                 | Epic Boon | 6 | 15 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 3  | 2  |\n| 20     | +6                 | Foe Slayer | 6 | 15 | 4  | 3  | 3  | 3  | 2  |

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Ranger Level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 3): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Ranger)**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**\n\n>- **Replace Your Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have spell slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast your spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Favored Enemy** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Hunter’s Mark** prepared. You can cast it **twice** without expending a spell slot, and regain all uses after a **long rest**. Free casts increase at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5** to **3**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9** to **4**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13** to **5**, and ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17** to **6**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **two types** of *Simple or Martial Weapons* you are **proficient with** to benefit from **Weapon Mastery**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Deft Explorer**: You gain the following benefits.\n\n>- **Expertise**: Choose **one skill** you are proficient in to **double** your **proficiency bonus** ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png).\n\n>- **Languages**: You learn two languages of your choice:\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *Light, Medium, or Heavy Armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a *one-handed melee weapon* without another weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When making a **damage roll** with a two-handed weapon, **1s and 2s** on the dice become **3s**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce damage taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield or a simple or martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack targeting a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you while wielding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** with thrown weapons.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of your **off-hand attack** when fighting with *Light Weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Your **unarmed strikes** deal **1d6 + Strength mod** **Bludgeoning Damage** (**1d8** if wielding no weapon or shield). You deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **Grappled** creature at the start of your turn.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Druidic Warrior**: Learn **2 druid cantrips**. These count as **Ranger spells**, using **Wisdom** as the casting ability. You can swap these cantrips when you level up.<br>![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Primal Companion**: You summon a **primal beast** bound to your connection with nature. Choose a stat block: **Land Beast**, **Sea Beast**, or **Sky Beast**, and determine its appearance. The **beast** is Friendly, obeys your commands, and disappears if you die. In combat, it acts during your turn, can move and use its **Reaction** on its own, but only takes the **Dodge** action unless you use a **Bonus Action** to command it or sacrifice an attack from your **Attack action** for it to take the **Strike action**. If you are **Incapacitated**, it acts freely. To restore or replace the **beast**, if it has been dead for less than an hour, use a **Magical Action**, touch it, and expend a **spell slot** to revive it after one minute with all **HP** restored. After a **Long Rest**, you can summon a new **beast**, causing the previous one to vanish automatically.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 in one ability**, or **+1 in two abilities**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Roving**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** while not wearing *Heavy Armor*. You gain a **Climb Speed** and a **Swim Speed** equal to your **walking Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Exceptional Training**: When you use a **Bonus Action** to command your primal beast to take an action, you can also order it to use its **Bonus Action** to **Dash**, **Disengage**, **Dodge**, or **Help**. Additionally, when it hits with an attack, it deals **Force Damage** or its normal damage type (your choice).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.<br>![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Tireless**: **Primal forces** bolster your journeys, granting the following benefits.\n\n>- **Temporary Hit Points** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Magical Action**, gain **temp HP** equal to **1d8 + your Wisdom mod** (**min 1**). You can use this a number of times equal to your **Wisdom mod** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Reduced Exhaustion**: Whenever you finish a **Short Rest**, reduce your exhaustion level by 1, if applicable.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Bestial Fury**: When you command your beast to take the **Strike action**, it can attack **twice**. The first time it hits a creature affected by your **Hunter’s Mark** per turn, it deals **Force Damage** equal to the spell’s bonus damage.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Relentless Hunter**: Taking damage does not break your **Concentration** on **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Nature's Veil** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, invoke nature’s spirits to become **Invisible** until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your **Wisdom mod** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Shared Spells**: When you cast a spell that targets only yourself, it also affects your **primal beast** if it is within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** of you.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Precise Hunter**: You have **Advantage** on **attack rolls** against the target marked by your **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Feral Senses**: You gain **Blindsight** within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Foe Slayer**: The **damage die** of your **Hunter’s Mark** becomes a **d10** instead of a **d6**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

nom: **Ranger** Fey Wanderer

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Ranger Level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 3): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Ranger)**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**\n\n>- **Replace Your Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have spell slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast your spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Favored Enemy** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Hunter’s Mark** prepared. You can cast it **twice** without expending a spell slot, and regain all uses after a **long rest**. Free casts increase at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5** to **3**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9** to **4**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13** to **5**, and ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17** to **6**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **two types** of *Simple or Martial Weapons* you are **proficient with** to benefit from **Weapon Mastery**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Deft Explorer**: You gain the following benefits.\n\n>- **Expertise**: Choose **one skill** you are proficient in to **double** your **proficiency bonus** ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png).\n\n>- **Languages**: You learn two languages of your choice:\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 to AC** while wearing *Light, Medium, or Heavy Armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** with a *one-handed melee weapon*, if no other weapon is held.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling for **damage** with a two-handed weapon, reroll **1s and 2s** (new roll must be used). The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce damage taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield, simple weapon, or martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on attacks against a target within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you while holding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage** with weapons that have the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of your *Light Weapon* off-hand attack.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Your **unarmed strikes** deal **1d6 + Strength modifier** **Bludgeoning Damage** (**1d8** if you are not wielding a weapon or shield). A **Grappled** creature takes **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** at the start of your turn.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Druidic Warrior**: Instead of a combat style, learn **two Druid cantrips** of your choice. They count as **Ranger spells**, and **Wisdom** is your spellcasting ability. You can replace them at any level.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Dreadful Strikes**: When you hit a creature with a weapon, deal **1d4 extra Psychic Damage** (once per turn). The damage increases to **1d6** at **Level 11** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png).\n\n> **Fey Wanderer Spells**: You always have the following spells prepared at the levels shown:\n\n| **Ranger Level** | **Spell**            |\n|-----------------|----------------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3   | **Charm Person**      |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5   | **Misty Step**     |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9   | **Summon Fey** |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13  | **Dimension Door**|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17  | **Mislead**             |\n\n> **Fey Gift**: Choose one **Fey Gift Trait** from the table below or determine it randomly.\n\n> | **1d6** | **Trait**                                                        || **1d6** | **Trait**                                                             |\n |----------|---------------------------------------|-----|----------|------------------------------------------------|\n | 1      | Illusory butterflies follow you during rests. | | 2      | Flowers bloom in your hair at dawn. |\n | 3      | You smell faintly of comforting spices. | | 4      | Your shadow dances when unobserved. |\n | 5      | Small antlers or horns grow on your head. | | 6      | Your skin and hair change color at dawn. |\n\n> **Otherworldly Glamour**: Add your **Wisdom modifier** (**min +1**) to **Charisma checks**. Gain proficiency in **Deception, Performance, or Persuasion** (your choice): ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability**, or **+1 in two abilities**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Roving**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** while not wearing *Heavy Armor*. You gain a **Climb Speed** and **Swim Speed** equal to your normal **Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Beguiling Twist**: You have **Advantage** on **Saving Throws** against the **Charmed** or **Frightened** conditions. When a creature within **120' (36 m, 24 sq)** succeeds on such a save, use your **Reaction** to force another visible creature within the same range to make a **Wisdom Save** against your **Spell Save DC**. On failure, it is **Charmed** or **Frightened** (your choice) for **1 minute**. It may repeat the save at the end of each turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Tireless**: The **primal forces** empower your journeys, granting the following benefits.\n\n>- **Temporary Hit Points** Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Magical Action**, gain **Temporary HP** equal to **1d8 + your Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**). You can use this a number of times equal to your **Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Exhaustion Reduction**: Each time you complete a **Short Rest**, reduce your **Exhaustion level** by 1, if applicable.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Fey Reinforcements**: You can cast **Summon Fey** without **Material Components**. You can cast **Summon Fey** once per **Long Rest** without **expending a spell slot**. You may modify the spell to **not require Concentration**, but its duration is then reduced to **1 minute**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Relentless Hunter**: Taking **damage** does not break your **Concentration** on **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Nature's Veil** Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, call upon nature spirits to become **Invisible** until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your **Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Misty Wanderer** Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You can cast **Misty Step** without **expending a spell slot** a number of times equal to your **Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**). You regain all uses after a **Long Rest**. Each time you cast **Misty Step**, you can teleport one **willing creature** you can see within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** to an **unoccupied space** within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of your destination.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Precise Hunter**: You have **Advantage** on **Attack Rolls** against the target marked by your **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Feral Senses**: You gain **Blindsight** within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Foe Slayer**: The **damage die** of your **Hunter’s Mark** increases to **d10** instead of **d6**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
