pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Abilities:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Ranger Level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 3): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Insight**, **Investigation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Ranger)**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**\n\n>- **Replace Your Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have spell slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast your spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Favored Enemy** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Hunter’s Mark** prepared. You can cast it **twice** without expending a spell slot, and regain all uses after a **long rest**. Free casts increase at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5** to **3**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9** to **4**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13** to **5**, and ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17** to **6**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **two types** of *Simple or Martial Weapons* you are **proficient with** to benefit from **Weapon Mastery**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Deft Explorer**: You gain the following benefits.\n\n>- **Expertise**: Choose **one skill** you are proficient in to **double** your **proficiency bonus** ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png).\n\n>- **Languages**: You learn two languages of your choice:\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *light, medium, or heavy armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 damage** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When you roll a **1** or **2** on a damage die with a two-handed weapon, reroll and use the new result. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: When a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you is hit, use a **Reaction** to reduce the damage by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield or melee weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: When a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you is attacked, use a **Reaction** to impose **Disadvantage** on the attack roll if you're wielding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 damage** with thrown weapon attacks.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of the off-hand attack when dual-wielding *Light weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Your unarmed strikes deal **1d6 + Strength modifier** **Bludgeoning Damage** (**1d8** if you aren’t wielding a weapon or shield). You deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **Grappled** creature at the start of your turn.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Druidic Warrior**: Instead of a Fighting Style, learn **2 Druid cantrips**. These count as **Ranger spells** using **Wisdom** as the spellcasting ability. You can replace one cantrip whenever you gain a Ranger level.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Dread Ambusher**: You excel at ambushes, gaining the following benefits.\n\n>- **Ambusher's Leap**: At the start of the first round of combat, your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** until the end of your turn.\n\n>- **Dreadful Strike** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, deal **2d6 Psychic Damage** (once per turn). You can use this effect **a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**), regaining all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Initiative Bonus**: Add your **Wisdom modifier** to **Initiative rolls**.\n\n> **Gloom Stalker Spells**: You always have the following spells prepared at the indicated levels:\n\n| **Ranger Level** | **Spell**                 |\n|------------------|---------------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3 | **Disguise Self**              |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5 | **Rope Trick**                |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9 | **Fear**                       |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13 | **Greater Invisibility**       |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17 | **Seeming**                    |\n\n> **Umbral Sight**: You gain **Darkvision** up to **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. If you already have it, its range increases by **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. While in **total darkness**, you are **Invisible** to creatures that rely only on Darkvision to see.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose one: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Roving**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** while not wearing *Heavy Armor*. You gain a **Climb Speed** and **Swim Speed** equal to your normal Speed.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Iron Mind**: You gain proficiency in **Wisdom Saving Throws**. If you already have it, choose between Intelligence or Charisma Saving Throws instead.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Tireless**: The **primordial forces** sustain your journeys, granting the following benefits.\n\n>- **Temporary HP** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Magical Action**, gain **Temp HP** equal to **1d8 + your Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**). You can use this **a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Exhaustion Reduction**: Whenever you finish a **Short Rest**, reduce your exhaustion level by 1 (if applicable).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Stalker’s Flurry**: Your **Dread Strike Psychic Damage** increases to **2d8**. When using this feature, choose one of the following effects:\n\n>- **Sudden Strike**: Make another weapon attack against a different creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of the original target and within weapon reach.\n\n>- **Mass Fear**: The target and each creature within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** must succeed a **Wisdom Saving Throw** against your **Spell Save DC**, or be **Frightened** until the start of your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Relentless Hunter**: Taking **damage** no longer breaks your **Concentration** on **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Nature's Veil** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, call upon the spirits of nature to become **Invisible** until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability **a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Shadowy Dodge**: When a creature makes an **attack roll** against you, use a **Reaction** to impose **Disadvantage** on the roll. Regardless of whether the attack hits or misses, you can teleport up to **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** to an unoccupied space you can see.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Precise Hunter**: You gain **Advantage** on **attack rolls** against the target marked by your **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Feral Senses**: You gain **Blindsight** within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain **an Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Foe Slayer**: The **damage die** of your **Hunter’s Mark** increases from **d6 to d10**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

**Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Ranger Level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Spellcasting (Ranger)**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **long rest**\n\n>- **Replace Your Prepared Spells**: After a **long rest**, swap prepared spells for others (as long as you have spell slots for them).\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Wisdom**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use a **Druidic Focus** to cast your spells, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots** |Spell Level| Max Slots | **Used Slots**|\n|----|---|-------|-------|--------|-----|------|------|------|\n| **Lvl 1** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 3**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 5**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|\n| **Lvl 2** |![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|**Lvl 4**|![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)|||\n\n|**Prepared Spells**|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|**Save DC** (**8+Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n|------|-----|------|------|\n| | |**Spell Attack Modifier** (**Proficiency Bonus+Wis Mod**)|![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)|\n\n> **Favored Enemy** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): You always have **Hunter’s Mark** prepared. You can cast it **twice** without expending a spell slot, and regain all uses after a **long rest**. Free casts increase at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5** to **3**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9** to **4**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13** to **5**, and ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17** to **6**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **two types** of *Simple or Martial Weapons* you are **proficient with** to benefit from **Weapon Mastery**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Deft Explorer**: You gain the following benefits.\n\n>- **Expertise**: Choose **one skill** you are proficient in to **double** your **proficiency bonus** ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png).\n\n>- **Languages**: You learn two languages of your choice:\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>**Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat** from the following options:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 AC** while wearing *light, medium, or heavy armor*.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** with a *melee weapon* wielded in one hand, while the other hand is empty.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling for **damage** with a two-handed weapon, **1s and 2s** on the die become **3s**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce the **damage** taken by a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your proficiency bonus**. Requires a *shield, simple, or martial weapon*.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack targeting an ally within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** if you are wielding a *shield*.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** with weapons that have the **Thrown** property.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of the **extra attack** when wielding a *Light Weapon* in each hand.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength mod** **Bludgeoning Damage** with **unarmed strikes** (**1d8** if holding no weapons or shields). At the start of your turn, deal **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage** to a **grappled** creature.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Druidic Warrior**: Learn **two Druid cantrips** of your choice (see the Druid spell list). These count as **Ranger spells** and use **Wisdom** as their casting ability. At every Ranger level-up, you can replace one cantrip with another Druid cantrip.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Hunter’s Lore**: While a creature is marked by your **Hunter’s Mark**, you learn its **Immunities, Resistances, or Vulnerabilities**, as well as their exact nature.\n\n> **Hunter’s Prey**: Choose one of the following options. You can change this choice after a **short or long rest**.\n\n>>-![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Colossus Slayer**: When you hit a creature with a weapon, deal **1d8 extra damage** if the target has lost **HP**. This effect applies **once per turn**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Horde Breaker**: Once per turn, after attacking with a weapon, make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature **within 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of the original target, within weapon range, and not yet attacked this turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Roving**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** when not wearing *Heavy Armor*. You gain a **Climbing Speed** and a **Swimming Speed** equal to your **Walking Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Defensive Tactics**: Choose one of the following options. You can change this choice after a **short or long rest**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Escape the Horde**: Opportunity attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Multiattack Defense**: When a creature hits you with an attack, it has **Disadvantage** on all remaining attacks against you for the rest of the turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Expertise**: Choose **two skills** you are proficient in. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check using those skills.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Tireless**: The **primal forces** strengthen your journeys, granting the following benefits.\n\n>- **Temporary HP** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **magical action**, gain **temporary HP** equal to **1d8 + your Wisdom mod** (**min 1**). You can use this action a number of times equal to your **Wisdom mod** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **long rest**.\n\n>- **Reduced Exhaustion**: Each time you finish a **short rest**, reduce your exhaustion level, if any, by 1.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Superior Hunter’s Prey**: Once per turn, when you deal the **extra damage** from your **Hunter’s Mark** to a target, apply the same damage to another visible creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** of the first target.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Relentless Hunter**: Taking **damage** does not break your **concentration** on **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Nature's Veil** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, call upon nature’s spirits to become **Invisible** until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your **Wisdom mod** (**min 1**) and regain all uses after a **long rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Superior Hunter’s Defense**: When you take **damage**, use a **Reaction** to gain **Resistance** to that damage and all other damage of the same type until the end of the turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Precise Hunter**: You have **Advantage** on **attack rolls** against the target marked by your **Hunter’s Mark**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Feral Senses**: You gain **Blindsight** within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Foe Slayer**: The **damage die** of your **Hunter’s Mark** increases to **d10** instead of **d6**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Monk**\n\n**Masters of martial arts, monks combine discipline and supernatural power to transcend the limits of body and mind.**\n\nMonks harness an inner energy known as ki, aligning their being with the forces of the multiverse. Through years of rigorous training and meditation, they channel this energy into physical and spiritual prowess. They perform incredible martial feats, moving with agility, speed, and endurance that defy natural laws.\n\nUnarmored and relying solely on discipline, monks excel in close combat, mastering their environment and body as deadly weapons. They often follow ascetic or philosophical paths, striving for perfect harmony between body and mind. To them, adventuring is a trial meant to refine their art and strengthen their spirit. Their quest goes beyond wealth or fame—they seek to become living weapons in service of their ideals.\n\n## **Warrior of Mercy**\n\n*“Life and death are two sides of the same coin, and I hold the key to their balance.”*\n\nMonks who follow the Warrior of Mercy manipulate vital energy to heal or harm at will. Often masked, they see themselves as anonymous protectors, offering aid to the weak while eliminating threats with ruthless precision.\n\n## **Warrior of Shadow**\n\n*“In darkness, I am a shadow among shadows—unseen and unstoppable.”*\n\nTied to the power of the Shadowfell, Shadow Monks master stealth and illusion. They wield darkness as a weapon, teleporting and striking with spectral efficiency, spreading confusion and fear among their foes.\n\n## **Way of the Elements**\n\n*“Air, earth, fire, and water heed my call—I forge my destiny through their chaos.”*\n\nMonks of the Elements draw strength from the elemental planes, manipulating these forces to unleash devastating attacks and move with supernatural fluidity. Every strike blends martial grace with raw elemental power.\n\n## **Way Warrior of the Open Hand**\n\n*“Every movement is precise, every strike a lesson. My art is perfection itself.”*\n\nOpen Hand Monks are masters of unarmed combat, using subtle techniques to disarm, knock down, and control their enemies. Their discipline and mastery of martial arts make them elite warriors capable of defeating foes with effortless skill.\n\n---\n\n# **The Monk**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class<br>Features                           | Martial<br>Arts | Focus<br>Points | Unarmored<br>Movement |\n|--------|--------------------|-------------------------------------------|---------------|-----------------|-----------------------|\n| 1      | +2                 | Martial Arts, Unarmored Defense         | 1d6           | —               | —                     |\n| 2      | +2                 | Monk's Focus, Unarmored Movement, Uncanny Metabolism | 1d6     | 2               | +10' (3 m, 2 sq)         |\n| 3      | +2                 | Deflect Attacks, Monastic Tradition    | 1d6           | 3               | +10' (3 m, 2 sq)         |\n| 4      | +2                 | Ability Score Improvement, Slow Fall    | 1d6           | 4               | +10' (3 m, 2 sq)         |\n| 5      | +3                 | Extra Attack, Stunning Strike           | 1d8           | 5               | +10' (3 m, 2 sq)         |\n| 6      | +3                 | Empowered Strikes, Monastic Feature  | 1d8           | 6               | +15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)       |\n| 7      | +3                 | Evasion                                 | 1d8           | 7               | +15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)       |\n| 8      | +3                 | Ability Score Improvement               | 1d8           | 8               | +15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)       |\n| 9      | +4                 | Acrobatic Movement             | 1d8           | 9               | +15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)       |\n| 10     | +4                 | Heightened Focus, Self-Restoration                | 1d8           | 10              | +20' (6 m, 4 sq)         |\n| 11     | +4                 | Monastic Feature                        | 1d10          | 11              | +20' (6 m, 4 sq)         |\n| 12     | +4                 | Ability Score Improvement               | 1d10          | 12              | +20' (6 m, 4 sq)         |\n| 13     | +5                 | Deflect Energy                          | 1d10          | 13              | +20' (6 m, 4 sq)         |\n| 14     | +5                 | Disciplined Survivor                            | 1d10          | 14              | +25' (7.5 m, 5 sq)       |\n| 15     | +5                 | Perfect Focus                              | 1d10          | 15              | +25' (7.5 m, 5 sq)       |\n| 16     | +5                 | Ability Score Improvement               | 1d10          | 16              | +25' (7.5 m, 5 sq)       |\n| 17     | +6                 | Monastic Feature                        | 1d12          | 17              | +25' (7.5 m, 5 sq)       |\n| 18     | +6                 | Superior Defense                        | 1d12          | 18              | +30' (9 m, 6 sq)         |\n| 19     | +6                 | Epic Boon                               | 1d12          | 19              | +30' (9 m, 6 sq)         |\n| 20     | +6                 | Body and Mind                        | 1d12          | 20              | +30' (9 m, 6 sq)         |\n\n

nom: **Monk** Warrior of Mercy
nom 1: **Monk**
type: Class

dv: ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)d8
charge: <br><br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)
niveau: ![Ligne!](symbole/caseD.png)
DD5: 5e 2024 Compatible
DD5-2: 5e 2024 Compatible
sauv: Death Saving Throw
pv: symbole/pv.png
nivimage: symbole/niveau.png
pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Attributes:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Monk level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons** with the *Light* property\n- **Tools:** Choose **one artisan tool or musical instrument**: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Religion**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Martial Arts**: Master combat with your **unarmed strikes** and **Monk weapons**, which include:\n\n>>- *Simple melee weapons*\n\n>>- *Martial melee weapons* with the *Light* property.\n\n>>**Benefits** (only if you are unarmed or using only Monk Weapons without armor or shield):\n\n>>- **Bonus Unarmed Strike**: Perform an unarmed strike as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>>- **Martial Arts Die** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): Replace the normal damage of your unarmed strikes and Monk Weapons with a **scaling die** starting at **1d6**. This improves at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **1d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 11**: **1d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17**: **1d12**.\n\n>>- **Dexterous Attacks**: You may use your **Dexterity modifier** instead of **Strength** for **attack rolls** and damage rolls. For **Grapple** and **Shove**, you may use **Dexterity** to determine the **save DC**.\n\n>>**Unarmed Strike Options.** **Damage**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png):\n\n>>- **Damage**: Make an **attack roll (Dexterity + Proficiency Bonus)**. On a hit, deal **Bludgeoning Damage** equal to **Martial Arts Die + Dexterity modifier**.\n\n>>- **Grapple**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is **Grappled** (requires a free hand).\n\n>>- **Shove**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is either pushed **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away or knocked **Prone**.\n\n>>**Special Properties of Light Weapons**:\n\n>>- **Dual Attack**: Perform an additional attack with another *Light weapon* as a **Bonus Action**, without adding your modifier to the damage roll (unless negative).\n\n>>**Grappling Rules**:\n\n>>- **Grappled Condition**: A **Grappled** creature cannot move unless it breaks free.\n\n>>- **Breaking Free**: A creature may make a **Strength (Athletics) check** or **Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against the **Escape DC** (**8 + Dexterity Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). The **Grapple** also ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated** or the target moves out of reach.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are not wearing armor and are not using a shield, your **base AC** is equal to **10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Monk’s Focus** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **Focus Save DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You harness an extraordinary energy called **Focus**, fueling your martial techniques. You <br>have a number of **Focus points** equal to your **Monk level**. You regain all expended **Focus points** after a **Short or Long Rest**. Some **Focus features** require a **Saving Throw**, with a <br>**Focus Save DC = 8 + Wisdom Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n> **Focus Techniques** :\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows** : Spend **1 Focus point** to perform **2 Unarmed Strikes** as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense** : You can use the **Disengage** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to use both **Disengage** and **Dodge** with a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Disengage** : Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n>- **Dodge** : Until the start of your next turn, **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage** if you can see the attacker, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** gain **Advantage**. These effects end if you are **Incapacitated** or if your **Speed** drops to **0**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind** : Use the **Dash** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to take both **Disengage** and **Dash** with a **Bonus Action**, and double your jump distance for this turn.\n\n>- **Dash** : This action doubles your **current Speed** for the turn. If you have other movement types (fly, swim, etc.), you can choose which to use.\n\n> **Uncanny Metabolism** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain all spent **Focus points** and roll your **Martial Arts Die**. You recover a number of **HP** equal to your **monk level + the die result**. You can use this feature once before finishing a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Unarmored Movement** : Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** when you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus improves at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **20' (6 m, 4 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10** : **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 14** : **40' (12 m, 8 sq)** and at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 18** : **50' (15 m, 10 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Deflect Attacks** : When an attack hits you and deals **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, use a **Reaction** to reduce the damage taken by **1d10 + your Dexterity mod + your Monk level**. If the damage is reduced to **0**, you can spend **1 Focus point** to redirect part of the attack at another target. Choose a visible creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** if the attack was melee, or within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** with no total cover if the attack was ranged; the target takes **2 Martial Arts dice + your Dexterity mod** in Damage of the same type as the attack, unless they succeed on a **Dexterity Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**.\n\n> **Hand of Harm** : Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an **Unarmed Strike** and deal damage, spend **1 Focus point** to deal **extra Necrotic Damage** equal to one roll of your **Martial Arts die** + your **Wisdom mod**.\n\n> **Hand of Healing** : As a **Magic Action**, spend **1 Focus point** to touch a creature and restore a number of **Hit Points** equal to one roll of your **Martial Arts die** + your **Wisdom mod**. If you use **Flurry of Blows**, you can replace one **Unarmed Strike** with this ability without spending a **Focus point** for the healing.\n\n> **Implements of Mercy** : You gain proficiency in **Insight**, **Medicine**, and the **herbalism kit**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement** : Choose: **+2 in one ability score**, or **+1 in two ability scores**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4**. **Slow Fall** : reduction: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Use a **Reaction** when falling to reduce damage taken by **5 × your Monk level**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack** : When you take the **Attack Action**, you can attack **2 times**.\n\n> **Stunning Strike**: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a **Monk weapon** or an unarmed strike, spend **1 Focus point** to attempt to stun it. The target must succeed on a **Constitution Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**, or be **Stunned** until the start of your next turn. \n\n>- **Stunned**: You are **Incapacitated** and automatically fail **Strength and Dexterity saving throws**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n>- **Incapacitated**: You cannot take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**. Any **Concentration** is broken. You cannot speak.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Empowered Strikes** : When you deal damage with an unarmed strike, you can choose to deal **Force Damage** instead of its normal type.\n\n> **Physician’s Touch** : Your **Hand of Harm** and **Hand of Healing** improve, as detailed below.\n\n> **Hand of Harm**: When you use **Hand of Harm** on a creature, you can also give that creature the **Poisoned** condition until the end of your next turn.\n\n> **Hand of Healing**: When you use **Hand of Healing**, you can also end one of the following conditions on the creature you heal: **Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Stunned**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion** : When an effect calls for a **Dexterity Saving Throw** to reduce damage by half, you **take no damage** on a success, and **only half damage** on a failure. This feature does not apply if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Acrobatic Movement** : While you are not wearing armor and not using a shield, you can run across vertical surfaces and traverse liquids without falling, but only during your movement.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Heightened Focus** : Your **Flurry of Blows**, **Patient Defense**, and **Step of the Wind** techniques are improved.\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows** : Spend **1 Focus point** to perform **3 Unarmed Strikes** instead of **2**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense** : When you spend **1 Focus point** for this feature, gain **temporary hit points** equal to two rolls of your **Martial Arts die**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind** : When you use **Step of the Wind**, you can carry a **willing creature** within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** (of **Large size or smaller**). The carried creature does not provoke opportunity attacks.\n\n> **Self-Restoration** : At the end of each of your turns, you can remove one of the following conditions affecting you: **Charmed**, **Frightened**, or **Poisoned**. Additionally, you do not suffer from **exhaustion** when deprived of food or water.\n\n> **Physician’s Touch** : Your **Hand of Harm** and **Hand of Healing** abilities improve.\n\n>- **Hand of Harm** : When you use it, the target is also **Poisoned** until the end of your next turn.\n\n>- **Hand of Healing** : You can also end one of the following conditions on the healed creature: **Blinded**, **Deafened**, **Paralyzed**, **Poisoned**, or **Stunned**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Flurry of Healing and Harm** Total: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you use **Flurry of Blows**, you can replace each **Unarmed Strike** with **Hand of Healing** without spending a **Focus point** for the healing. Additionally, when an **Unarmed Strike** deals damage, you can apply **Hand of Harm** without spending a **Focus point**. You can only use **Hand of Harm** once per turn. This ability can be used a number of times equal to your **Wisdom mod** (**min 1**), and you regain all uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Deflect Energy** : You can now use **Deflect Attacks** against attacks dealing **any type of damage**, not just **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Disciplined Survivor** : You gain proficiency in **all Saving Throws**. If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can spend **1 Focus point** to reroll it (you must use the new result).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Perfect Focus** : If you do not use **Uncanny Metabolism** on your **Initiative roll** and have **3 or fewer Focus points**, you regain **1 Focus point up to a maximum of 4 Focus points**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Hand of Ultimate Mercy** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Magic Action**, touch the **corpse** of a creature that died within the **last 24 hours** and spend **5 Focus points** to bring it back to life with **Hit Points** equal to **4d10 + your Wisdom mod**. If the creature was affected by any of the following conditions before its death, they are removed: **Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Stunned**. This ability can be used once per **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Defense** : At the start of your turn, you can spend **3 Focus points** to gain **Resistance to all damage**, except **Force Damage**, for **1 minute** or until you become **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon** : You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Body and Mind** : Your **Dexterity** and **Wisdom** scores each increase by **4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
