nivimage: symbole/niveau.png
pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Attributes:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Monk level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons** with the *Light* property\n- **Tools:** Choose **one artisan tool or musical instrument**: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Religion**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Martial Arts**: Master combat with your **unarmed strikes** and **Monk weapons**, which include:\n\n>>- *Simple melee weapons*\n\n>>- *Martial melee weapons* with the *Light* property.\n\n>>**Benefits** (only if you are unarmed or using only Monk Weapons without armor or shield):\n\n>>- **Bonus Unarmed Strike**: Perform an unarmed strike as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>>- **Martial Arts Die** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): Replace the normal damage of your unarmed strikes and Monk Weapons with a **scaling die** starting at **1d6**. This improves at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **1d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 11**: **1d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17**: **1d12**.\n\n>>- **Dexterous Attacks**: You may use your **Dexterity modifier** instead of **Strength** for **attack rolls** and damage rolls. For **Grapple** and **Shove**, you may use **Dexterity** to determine the **save DC**.\n\n>>**Unarmed Strike Options.** **Damage**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png):\n\n>>- **Damage**: Make an **attack roll (Dexterity + Proficiency Bonus)**. On a hit, deal **Bludgeoning Damage** equal to **Martial Arts Die + Dexterity modifier**.\n\n>>- **Grapple**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is **Grappled** (requires a free hand).\n\n>>- **Shove**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is either pushed **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away or knocked **Prone**.\n\n>>**Special Properties of Light Weapons**:\n\n>>- **Dual Attack**: Perform an additional attack with another *Light weapon* as a **Bonus Action**, without adding your modifier to the damage roll (unless negative).\n\n>>**Grappling Rules**:\n\n>>- **Grappled Condition**: A **Grappled** creature cannot move unless it breaks free.\n\n>>- **Breaking Free**: A creature may make a **Strength (Athletics) check** or **Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against the **Escape DC** (**8 + Dexterity Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). The **Grapple** also ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated** or the target moves out of reach.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are not wearing armor and are not using a shield, your **base AC** is equal to **10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Monk’s Focus** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **Focus Save DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You harness an extraordinary energy called **Focus**, fueling your martial techniques. You <br>have a number of **Focus points** equal to your **Monk level**. You regain all expended **Focus points** after a **Short or Long Rest**. Some **Focus features** require a **Saving Throw**, with a <br>**Focus Save DC = 8 + Wisdom Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n> **Focus Techniques** :\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows** : Spend **1 Focus point** to perform **2 Unarmed Strikes** as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense** : You can use the **Disengage** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to use both **Disengage** and **Dodge** with a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Disengage** : Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n>- **Dodge** : Until the start of your next turn, **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage** if you can see the attacker, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** gain **Advantage**. These effects end if you are **Incapacitated** or if your **Speed** drops to **0**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind** : Use the **Dash** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to take both **Disengage** and **Dash** with a **Bonus Action**, and double your jump distance for this turn.\n\n>- **Dash** : This action doubles your **current Speed** for the turn. If you have other movement types (fly, swim, etc.), you can choose which to use.\n\n> **Uncanny Metabolism** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain all spent **Focus points** and roll your **Martial Arts Die**. You recover a number of **HP** equal to your **monk level + the die result**. You can use this feature once before finishing a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Unarmored Movement** : Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** when you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus improves at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **20' (6 m, 4 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10** : **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 14** : **40' (12 m, 8 sq)** and at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 18** : **50' (15 m, 10 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Deflect Attacks**: When an attack hits you and deals **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, use a **Reaction** to reduce the damage by **1d10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Monk level**. If the damage is reduced to **0**, you can spend **1 Focus point** to redirect part of the attack toward another target. Choose a visible creature **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away if the attack was melee, or **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** away without full cover if the attack was ranged. The target takes **2 Martial Arts dice + your Dexterity modifier** in damage of the same type as the attack, unless it succeeds on a **Dexterity Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**.\n\n> **Shadow Arts**: You master the power of the **Shadow Plane**, gaining the following benefits.\n\n>- **Darkness**: Spend **1 Focus point** to cast **Darkness** without material components. You can see in the magical darkness created, and as long as the spell persists, move the area to a visible space within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** of you at the start of each of your turns.\n\n>- **Darkvision**: You gain **Darkvision** with a range of **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. If you already have this ability, its range increases by **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**.\n\n>- **Shadowy Figments**: You learn the **Minor Illusion** cantrip. The spellcasting ability for this is **Wisdom**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4**. **Slow Fall**: Reduction: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Use a **Reaction** when falling to reduce damage taken by **5 × your Monk level**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Stunning Strike**: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a **Monk weapon** or an unarmed strike, spend **1 Focus point** to attempt to stun it. The target must succeed on a **Constitution Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**, or be **Stunned** until the start of your next turn. \n\n>- **Stunned**: You are **Incapacitated** and automatically fail **Strength and Dexterity saving throws**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n>- **Incapacitated**: You cannot take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**. Any **Concentration** is broken. You cannot speak.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Empowered Strikes**: When you deal damage with an unarmed strike, you can choose to deal **Force Damage** instead of its normal type.\n\n>**Shadow Step**: While in an area of **dim light** or **darkness**, use a **Bonus Action** to teleport up to **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** to an unoccupied space also in **dim light** or **darkness**. You then have **Advantage** on your next melee attack before the end of your turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When an effect requires a **Dexterity Saving Throw** to halve the damage taken, you instead **take no damage** if you succeed, and **only half damage** if you fail. This does not apply if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Acrobatic Movement**: As long as you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield, you can run along vertical surfaces and walk across water without falling, but only during your movement.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Heightened Focus**: Your **Flurry of Blows**, **Patient Defense**, and **Step of the Wind** techniques are improved.\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows**: Spend **1 Focus point** to make **3 Unarmed Strikes** instead of **2**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense**: When you spend **1 Focus point** to use this ability, gain **temporary hit points** equal to two rolls of your **Martial Arts die**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind**: When you use **Step of the Wind**, you can take a **willing creature** within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** (size **Large or smaller**) with you. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.\n\n> **Self-Restoration**: At the end of each of your turns, you can remove one of the following conditions affecting you: **Charmed**, **Frightened**, or **Poisoned**. Additionally, you do not suffer **exhaustion** from lack of food or water.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Improved Shadow Step**: Spend **1 Focus point** to use **Shadow Step** without the restriction of **dim light** or **darkness** as a starting or ending point. In the same **Bonus Action**, you can make an **unarmed strike** immediately after teleporting.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Deflect Energy**: You can now use **Deflect Attacks** against attacks dealing **any type of damage**, not just **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Disciplined Survivor**: You gain proficiency in all **Saving Throws**. If you fail a **Saving Throw**, spend **1 Focus point** to reroll it (you must use the new result).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Perfect Focus**: If you do not use **Uncanny Metabolism** on your **Initiative roll** and have **3 or fewer Focus points**, you regain **1 Focus point up to a maximum of 4 Focus points**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Cloak of Shadows**: As a **Magical Action**, while in an area of **dim light** or **darkness**, spend **3 Focus points** to shroud yourself in shadows for **1 minute**, until you become **Incapacitated**, or until you end your turn in **bright light**. While shrouded in shadows, you gain the following benefits:\n\n>- **Invisibility**: You gain the **Invisible** condition.\n\n>- **Partial Incorporeal**: You can move through occupied spaces as if they were **difficult terrain**. If you end your turn in an occupied space, you are pushed back to the last unoccupied space you were in.\n\n>- **Shadow Flurry**: You can use **Flurry of Blows** without spending **Focus points**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Defense**: At the start of your turn, spend **3 Focus points** to gain **Resistance to all damage**, except **Force damage**, for **1 minute** or until you become **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Blessing**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Body and Mind**: Your **Dexterity** and **Wisdom** scores increase by **4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Attributes:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Monk level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons** with the *Light* property\n- **Tools:** Choose **one artisan tool or musical instrument**: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Religion**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Martial Arts**: Master combat with your **unarmed strikes** and **Monk weapons**, which include:\n\n>>- *Simple melee weapons*\n\n>>- *Martial melee weapons* with the *Light* property.\n\n>>**Benefits** (only if you are unarmed or using only Monk Weapons without armor or shield):\n\n>>- **Bonus Unarmed Strike**: Perform an unarmed strike as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>>- **Martial Arts Die** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): Replace the normal damage of your unarmed strikes and Monk Weapons with a **scaling die** starting at **1d6**. This improves at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **1d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 11**: **1d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17**: **1d12**.\n\n>>- **Dexterous Attacks**: You may use your **Dexterity modifier** instead of **Strength** for **attack rolls** and damage rolls. For **Grapple** and **Shove**, you may use **Dexterity** to determine the **save DC**.\n\n>>**Unarmed Strike Options.** **Damage**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png):\n\n>>- **Damage**: Make an **attack roll (Dexterity + Proficiency Bonus)**. On a hit, deal **Bludgeoning Damage** equal to **Martial Arts Die + Dexterity modifier**.\n\n>>- **Grapple**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is **Grappled** (requires a free hand).\n\n>>- **Shove**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is either pushed **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away or knocked **Prone**.\n\n>>**Special Properties of Light Weapons**:\n\n>>- **Dual Attack**: Perform an additional attack with another *Light weapon* as a **Bonus Action**, without adding your modifier to the damage roll (unless negative).\n\n>>**Grappling Rules**:\n\n>>- **Grappled Condition**: A **Grappled** creature cannot move unless it breaks free.\n\n>>- **Breaking Free**: A creature may make a **Strength (Athletics) check** or **Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against the **Escape DC** (**8 + Dexterity Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). The **Grapple** also ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated** or the target moves out of reach.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are not wearing armor and are not using a shield, your **base AC** is equal to **10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Monk’s Focus** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **Focus Save DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You harness an extraordinary energy called **Focus**, fueling your martial techniques. You <br>have a number of **Focus points** equal to your **Monk level**. You regain all expended **Focus points** after a **Short or Long Rest**. Some **Focus features** require a **Saving Throw**, with a <br>**Focus Save DC = 8 + Wisdom Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n> **Focus Techniques** :\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows** : Spend **1 Focus point** to perform **2 Unarmed Strikes** as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense** : You can use the **Disengage** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to use both **Disengage** and **Dodge** with a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Disengage** : Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n>- **Dodge** : Until the start of your next turn, **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage** if you can see the attacker, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** gain **Advantage**. These effects end if you are **Incapacitated** or if your **Speed** drops to **0**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind** : Use the **Dash** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to take both **Disengage** and **Dash** with a **Bonus Action**, and double your jump distance for this turn.\n\n>- **Dash** : This action doubles your **current Speed** for the turn. If you have other movement types (fly, swim, etc.), you can choose which to use.\n\n> **Uncanny Metabolism** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain all spent **Focus points** and roll your **Martial Arts Die**. You recover a number of **HP** equal to your **monk level + the die result**. You can use this feature once before finishing a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Unarmored Movement** : Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** when you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus improves at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **20' (6 m, 4 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10** : **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 14** : **40' (12 m, 8 sq)** and at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 18** : **50' (15 m, 10 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Deflect Attacks**: When you are hit by an attack dealing **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing Damage**, use a **Reaction** to reduce the damage taken by **1d10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Monk level**. If the damage is reduced to **0**, you may spend **1 Focus point** to redirect part of the attack at another target. Choose a visible creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** if the attack was melee, or within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** without total cover if it was ranged. The target takes **2 Martial Arts Dice + your Dexterity modifier** as Damage of the same type as the original attack, unless it succeeds a **Dexterity Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**.\n\n> **Elemental Attunement**: At the start of your turn, spend **1 Focus point** to channel elemental energy for **10 minutes** or until you are **Incapacitated**. While active: Your unarmed strikes gain a **+10' (3 m, 2 sq) reach** through elemental energy, and you can change their damage type to **Acid**, **Cold**, **Fire**, **Lightning**, or **Thunder**. If you deal one of these damage types, the target must succeed a **Strength Saving Throw** or be pushed **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** away.\n\n> **Manipulate Elements**: You learn the **Elementalism** spell. **Wisdom** is your casting ability.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4**. **Slow Fall**: Reduction: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): Use a **Reaction** when falling to reduce the damage taken by **5 × your Monk level**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Stunning Strike**: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a **Monk weapon** or an **Unarmed Strike**, spend **1 Focus point** to attempt to stun them. The target must succeed on a **Constitution Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**, or be **Stunned** until the start of your next turn.\n\n>- **Stunned**: You are **Incapacitated** and automatically fail **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n>- **Incapacitated**: You cannot take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**. Any **Concentration** is broken. You cannot speak.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Empowered Strikes**: When you deal damage with an Unarmed Strike, you may choose to deal **Force Damage** instead of its normal type.\n\n> **Elemental Burst**: As a **Magic Action**, spend **2 Focus points** to unleash an explosion of elemental energy in a **20' (6 m, 4 sq) sphere** centered on a point within **120' (36 m, 24 sq)** of you. Choose a damage type: **Acid**, **Cold**, **Fire**, **Lightning**, or **Thunder**. Creatures within the sphere must make a **Dexterity Saving Throw**:\n\n>- Failure: Damage equal to **3 Martial Arts Dice**.\n\n>- Success: Half damage.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When an effect requires a **Dexterity Saving Throw** to take half damage, you **take no damage** if you succeed, and **only half damage** if you fail. This feature does not apply if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Acrobatic Movement**: While not wearing armor or using a shield, you can run along vertical surfaces and move across liquids without falling, but only during your turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Heightened Focus**: Your **Flurry of Blows**, **Patient Defense**, and **Step of the Wind** techniques are enhanced.\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows**: Spend **1 Focus point** to make **3 Unarmed Strikes** instead of **2**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense**: When you spend **1 Focus point** to use this feature, gain **Temporary Hit Points** equal to two rolls of your **Martial Arts Die**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind**: When you use **Step of the Wind**, you can take a **willing creature** within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** (size **Large or smaller**) with you. The movement of this creature does not provoke **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n> **Self-Restoration**: At the end of each of your turns, you can remove one of the following conditions affecting you: **Charmed**, **Frightened**, or **Poisoned**. Additionally, you do not suffer **exhaustion** from lack of food or water.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Stride of the Elements**: While your **Elemental Attunement** is active, you gain a **Flying and Swimming Speed** equal to your **Walking Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Deflect Energy**: You can now use **Deflect Attacks** against attacks dealing **any type of damage**, not just **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Disciplined Survivor**: You gain proficiency in all **Saving Throws**. If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you may spend **1 Focus point** to reroll it (you must use the new result).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Perfect Focus**: If you do not use **Uncanny Metabolism** on your **Initiative roll**, you may regain **1 Focus point up to a maximum of 4 Focus points**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Elemental Epitome**: While your **Elemental Attunement** is active, you may gain **Resistance** to one of the following damage types at the start of your turn: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Acid**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Cold**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Fire**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Lightning**, or ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thunder**, and you may change this choice at the start of each of your turns.\n\n>- When you use **Step of the Wind**, your **Speed** increases by **20' (6 m, 4 sq)** until the end of the turn, and any creature of your choice within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** takes damage equal to one roll of your **Martial Arts Die**. You may choose from the following damage types: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Acid**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Cold**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Fire**, ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Lightning**, or ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thunder** (only once per turn per creature).\n\n>- Additionally, once per turn, an **Unarmed Strike** deals an additional **Martial Arts Die** as extra damage.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Defense**: At the start of your turn, spend **3 Focus points** to gain **Resistance to all damage** (except **Force Damage**) for **1 minute**, or until you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Body and Mind**: Your **Dexterity** and **Wisdom** scores each increase by **4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Attributes:** **Dexterity** & **Wisdom**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Monk level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Dexterity**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons** with the *Light* property\n- **Tools:** Choose **one artisan tool or musical instrument**: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Religion**, **Stealth**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Martial Arts**: Master combat with your **unarmed strikes** and **Monk weapons**, which include:\n\n>>- *Simple melee weapons*\n\n>>- *Martial melee weapons* with the *Light* property.\n\n>>**Benefits** (only if you are unarmed or using only Monk Weapons without armor or shield):\n\n>>- **Bonus Unarmed Strike**: Perform an unarmed strike as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>>- **Martial Arts Die** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): Replace the normal damage of your unarmed strikes and Monk Weapons with a **scaling die** starting at **1d6**. This improves at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 5**: **1d8**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 11**: **1d10**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17**: **1d12**.\n\n>>- **Dexterous Attacks**: You may use your **Dexterity modifier** instead of **Strength** for **attack rolls** and damage rolls. For **Grapple** and **Shove**, you may use **Dexterity** to determine the **save DC**.\n\n>>**Unarmed Strike Options.** **Damage**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png):\n\n>>- **Damage**: Make an **attack roll (Dexterity + Proficiency Bonus)**. On a hit, deal **Bludgeoning Damage** equal to **Martial Arts Die + Dexterity modifier**.\n\n>>- **Grapple**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is **Grappled** (requires a free hand).\n\n>>- **Shove**: Force a **Saving Throw** (**Strength** or **Dexterity**, their choice; **DC = 8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, the target is either pushed **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away or knocked **Prone**.\n\n>>**Special Properties of Light Weapons**:\n\n>>- **Dual Attack**: Perform an additional attack with another *Light weapon* as a **Bonus Action**, without adding your modifier to the damage roll (unless negative).\n\n>>**Grappling Rules**:\n\n>>- **Grappled Condition**: A **Grappled** creature cannot move unless it breaks free.\n\n>>- **Breaking Free**: A creature may make a **Strength (Athletics) check** or **Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against the **Escape DC** (**8 + Dexterity Mod + Proficiency Bonus**). The **Grapple** also ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated** or the target moves out of reach.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are not wearing armor and are not using a shield, your **base AC** is equal to **10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier**.\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Monk’s Focus** Total: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **Focus Save DC**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You harness an extraordinary energy called **Focus**, fueling your martial techniques. You <br>have a number of **Focus points** equal to your **Monk level**. You regain all expended **Focus points** after a **Short or Long Rest**. Some **Focus features** require a **Saving Throw**, with a <br>**Focus Save DC = 8 + Wisdom Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n> **Focus Techniques** :\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows** : Spend **1 Focus point** to perform **2 Unarmed Strikes** as a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense** : You can use the **Disengage** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to use both **Disengage** and **Dodge** with a **Bonus Action**.\n\n>- **Disengage** : Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n>- **Dodge** : Until the start of your next turn, **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage** if you can see the attacker, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** gain **Advantage**. These effects end if you are **Incapacitated** or if your **Speed** drops to **0**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind** : Use the **Dash** action as a **Bonus Action**. Spend **1 Focus point** to take both **Disengage** and **Dash** with a **Bonus Action**, and double your jump distance for this turn.\n\n>- **Dash** : This action doubles your **current Speed** for the turn. If you have other movement types (fly, swim, etc.), you can choose which to use.\n\n> **Uncanny Metabolism** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain all spent **Focus points** and roll your **Martial Arts Die**. You recover a number of **HP** equal to your **monk level + the die result**. You can use this feature once before finishing a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Unarmored Movement** : Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** when you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus improves at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **20' (6 m, 4 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 10** : **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 14** : **40' (12 m, 8 sq)** and at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 18** : **50' (15 m, 10 sq)**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Deflect Attacks**: When hit by a ranged attack dealing **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage**, use a **Reaction** to reduce the damage taken by **1d10 + Dexterity mod. + Monk level**. If the damage is reduced to **0**, you can spend **1 Focus point** to redirect part of the attack at another target. Choose a visible creature **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away if it was a melee attack, or **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** away if it was a ranged attack. The target takes **2 Martial Arts dice + Dexterity mod.** in damage of the same type as the original attack unless it succeeds on a **Dexterity Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC**.\n\n>**Open Hand Technique**: When you hit a creature with an attack from your **Flurry of Blows**, impose one of the following effects on the target:\n\n>- **Addle**: The target cannot make **Opportunity Attacks** until the start of its next turn.\n\n>- **Push** – If you hit a creature with this attack, you can push it up to **15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)** in a straight line, provided it is **Large or smaller**.\n\n>- **Topple** – If you hit a creature with this attack, you can force it to make a **Constitution Saving Throw**. The **DC** for this save is **8 + your Proficiency Bonus + your Strength mod.** On failure, the creature is **Prone**, granting **Advantage** to melee attackers against it and imposing **Disadvantage** on ranged attacks targeting it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4**. **Slow Fall**: reduction: ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): Use a **Reaction** when falling to reduce damage taken by **5 × your Monk level**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you use the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Stunning Strike**: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a **Monk Weapon** or an **Unarmed Strike**, spend **1 Focus point** to attempt to **stun** it. The target must succeed on a **Constitution Saving Throw** against your **Focus Save DC** or be **Stunned** until the start of your next turn.\n\n>- **Stunned:** You are **Incapacitated** and automatically fail **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n>- **Incapacitated:** You cannot take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**. Any **Concentration** is broken. You cannot speak.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Empowered Strikes**: When you deal damage with an **Unarmed Strike**, you can choose to deal **Force damage** instead of its normal type.\n\n>**Wholeness of Body** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, roll your **Martial Arts die** and regain **HP** equal to the result + your **Wisdom mod.** (minimum **1 HP**). You can use this feature a number of times equal to your **Wisdom mod.** (minimum **1**), and regain all spent uses after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When an effect requires a **Dexterity Saving Throw** to halve damage, you **take no damage** on a success and **only half damage** on a failure. This feature does not work if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Acrobatic Movement**: While unarmored and not carrying a shield, you can run along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling, but only during your movement.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Heightened Focus**: Your **Flurry of Blows**, **Patient Defense**, and **Step of the Wind** techniques are improved.\n\n>- **Flurry of Blows**: Spend **1 Focus point** to make **3 Unarmed Strikes** instead of **2**.\n\n>- **Patient Defense**: When you spend **1 Focus point** for this feature, gain **temporary HP** equal to two rolls of your **Martial Arts die**.\n\n>- **Step of the Wind**: When using **Step of the Wind**, you can carry a **willing creature** **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** away from you (of **Large size or smaller**). The movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.\n\n> **Self-Restoration**: At the end of each of your turns, you can remove one of the following conditions affecting you: **Charmed, Frightened, or Poisoned**. Additionally, you do not suffer **exhaustion** from lack of food or water.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Fleet Step**: When you use a **Bonus Action** other than **Step of the Wind**, you can immediately use **Step of the Wind** without requiring an additional action.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Deflect Energy**: You can now use **Deflect Attacks** against attacks dealing **any type of damage**, not just **Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Disciplined Survivor**: You gain proficiency in all **Saving Throws**. If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can spend **1 Focus point** to reroll it (you must use the new result).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Perfect Focus**: If you did not use **Uncanny Metabolism** when rolling **Initiative** and have **3 or fewer Focus points**, you regain **1 Focus point up to a maximum of 4 Focus points**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Quivering Palm**: You master a technique that allows you to set up lethal vibrations inside a target’s body. When you hit a creature with an **Unarmed Strike**, you can spend **4 Focus Points** to initiate these imperceptible vibrations, which last for a number of **days equal to your Monk level**. The vibrations are harmless unless you take an action to end them.\n\n> **Ending the vibrations**:\n\n>- When you take the **Attack action**, you can forgo one attack to end the vibrations.\n>- You and the target must be on the **same plane of existence**.\n>- The target makes a **Constitution Saving Throw**.\n>- On a failure, it takes **10d12 Force Damage**.\n>- On a success, it takes **half damage**.\n\nYou can have only **one creature affected** by this feature at a time. You can end the vibrations harmlessly (**no action required**).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Superior Defense**: At the start of your turn, spend **3 Focus points** to gain **Resistance to all damage** except **Force damage** for **1 minute** or until you become **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain **one Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Body and Mind**: Your **Dexterity** and **Wisdom** scores each increase by **4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Rogue**\n\n**An elusive shadow and master of deception, the rogue uses agility and intellect to outmaneuver opponents.**\n\nRogues excel in the art of subtlety. Rather than facing enemies head-on, they strike where it hurts most, exploiting every weakness to gain an advantage. Their skillset includes stealth, manipulation, and ingenuity—some even weave magic into their tactics.\n\nIn combat, they prioritize precision and opportunity, turning every opening into a decisive strike. When faced with danger, they are elusive, dodging attacks with uncanny grace and vanishing before the enemy can react.\n\nWhile some rogues operate in the shadows of crime, others use their talents to foil conspiracies, protect the weak, or simply amass wealth and fame. Whatever their motivation, one thing is certain: no one masters the art of survival better than a rogue.\n\n## **Arcane Trickster**\n\n*“Magic is just another tool in my arsenal.”*<br>\n\nArcane Tricksters blend spellcasting with cunning to outsmart their foes. With a subtle mastery of magic, they manipulate their surroundings, steal from a distance, and confuse enemies before delivering precise strikes.\n\n## **Assassin**\n\n*“One strike, one chance. I never miss.”*<br>\n\nAssassins are masters of swift and silent killing. Experts in poisons, disguises, and lethal ambushes, they blend into their environment and strike without leaving a trace. Every mission is an art, every kill a masterpiece of precision.\n\n## **Soulknife**\n\n*“My thoughts are invisible blades, relentless and deadly.”*<br>\n\nSoulknives harness latent psionic power for combat and infiltration. Their psychic blades cut without leaving a mark, and their telepathic abilities let them communicate without a word. Stealthy and untouchable, they embody the ultimate unseen assassin.\n\n## **Thief**\n\n*“If it shines, it ends up in my hands.”*<br>\n\nThieves are masters of burglary and exploration. Always ready to steal an artifact or infiltrate an impenetrable fortress, they excel at climbing, disarming traps, and using magic items with astonishing ease.\n\n---\n\n# **The Rogue**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class Features                                  | Sneak<br>Attack |\n|--------|--------------------|------------------------------------------------|-------------|\n| 1      | +2                 | Expertise, Sneak Attack, Thieves' Cant, Weapon Mastery | 1d6         |\n| 2      | +2                 | Cunning Action                                | 1d6         |\n| 3      | +2                 | Rogue Archetype, Steady Aim                   | 2d6         |\n| 4      | +2                 | Ability Score Improvement                     | 2d6         |\n| 5      | +3                 | Cunning Strike, Uncanny Dodge                  | 3d6         |\n| 6      | +3                 | Expertise                                    | 3d6         |\n| 7      | +3                 | Evasion, Reliable Talent                     | 4d6         |\n| 8      | +3                 | Ability Score Improvement                     | 4d6         |\n| 9      | +4                 | Rogue Archetype Feature                       | 5d6         |\n| 10     | +4                 | Ability Score Improvement                     | 5d6         |\n| 11     | +4                 | Improved Cunning Strike                        | 6d6         |\n| 12     | +4                 | Ability Score Improvement                     | 6d6         |\n| 13     | +5                 | Rogue Archetype Feature                       | 7d6         |\n| 14     | +5                 | Devious Strike                       | 7d6         |\n| 15     | +5                 | Slippery Mind                                 | 8d6         |\n| 16     | +5                 | Ability Score Improvement                     | 8d6         |\n| 17     | +6                 | Rogue Archetype Feature                       | 9d6         |\n| 18     | +6                 | Elusive                                       | 9d6         |\n| 19     | +6                 | Epic Boon                                     | 10d6        |\n| 20     | +6                 | Stroke of Luck                                | 10d6        |\n

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Rogue level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Dexterity** and **Intelligence**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons** with the *Finesse* or *Light* property\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**\n- **Tools:** **Thieves' tools**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 4): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Perception**, **Persuasion**, **Sleight of Hand**, or **Stealth**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Sneak Attack** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Once per turn, deal **1d6 extra damage** when you hit with a **ranged weapon** or a melee weapon with the *Finesse* property, provided you have **Advantage** on the attack roll.\n\n>- **Without Advantage**: You can still apply **Sneak Attack** if an ally is within **5' (1.5m, 1sq)** of the target, is not **Incapacitated**, and you do not have **Disadvantage** on the attack.\n\n>- **Scaling Damage**: This bonus increases at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**: **2d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**: **3d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**: **4d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**: **5d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**: **6d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**: **7d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: **8d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**: **9d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**: **10d6**\n\n> **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- At ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**, choose **two additional skills** for **Expertise**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Thieves' Cant**: You understand **Thieves' Cant** and one additional language of your choice.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **two types of simple or martial weapons** you are **proficient** with to gain the **Weapon Mastery** feature. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Cunning Action**: As a **Bonus Action**, you can take the **Dash**, **Disengage**, or **Hide** action.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Steady Aim**: As a **Bonus Action**, give yourself **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** this turn. You must remain **stationary** for this turn, and your **Speed is 0** until <br>the end of the turn.\n\n> **Spellcasting (Wizard)**: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Cantrips**: You know **Mage Hand** and **two other cantrips** of your choice from the **wizard spell list**: \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>>>> ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) At level 10, you learn another **cantrip** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- **Replacing Prepared Spells**: You prepare a list of **wizard spells** you can cast. You can swap a **prepared spell** for another when you gain a rogue level. You can replace **one cantrip** when you gain a rogue level, except Mage Hand.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Intelligence**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **arcane focus** for your **wizard spells**, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Total | **Used Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Total | **Used Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Total | **Used Slots**|Spell<br>Level|
