|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3**            | 3              | 2 | — | — |—| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **4**            | 4              | 3|—| —| —|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7**            | 5              | 4| 2|—| —| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **8**            | 6              | 4 | 2 | — |—| \n |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **10**           | 7              | 4| 3|—| —| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **11**           | 8              | 4| 3|—| —|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **13**           | 9              | 4| 3| 2|—| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **14**           | 10              | 4| 3|2| —|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **16**           | 11             | 4| 3| 3|—| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **19**           | 12             | 4| 3| 3| 1|\n |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **20**           | 13             | 4| 3| 3| 1|\n\n> **Mage Hand Legerdemain**: When you cast **Mage Hand**, you can do so as a **Bonus Action**, and the spectral hand becomes **Invisible**. You can control it as a **Bonus Action** and use it for **Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability score**, or **+1 in two ability scores**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Cunning Strike** **Sneaky Save DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you deal **Sneak Attack**, you can apply a **Tactical Effect** by sacrificing a number of **damage dice** (before rolling). If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** is **8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n>- **Poison (1d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against the **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Poisoned** for **1 min** and repeat the save at the end of their turns. Requires **Poisoner’s Kit**.\n- **Trip (1d6)**: If the target is **Large or smaller**, they make a **Dexterity Save** against the **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Prone**.\n- **Withdraw (1d6)**: After the attack, you move **half your Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n> **Uncanny Dodge**: When you see a creature hit you with an **attack**, use a **Reaction** to **halve** the damage taken (rounded down).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When an effect requires a **Dexterity Saving Throw** to take half damage, you **take no damage** on a success and only **half damage** on a failure. This feature does not work if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reliable Talent**: When making an **ability check** with a **proficient skill or tool**, a **d20 roll of 9 or lower becomes a 10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Magical Ambush**: If you are **Invisible** when casting a **spell that targets a creature**, that creature has **Disadvantage** on **Saving Throws** against the spell this turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Improved Cunning Strike**: When using **Sneaky Tactics**, apply **two Tactical Effects** instead of one, paying the cost in dice for each effect.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Versatile Trickster**: When using the **Trip** option from **Sneaky Tactics**, you can also apply the effect to **another creature within 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of your **Mage Hand**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Devious Strikes**: Add the following options to **Sneaky Tactics**, paying the cost in dice.\n\n- **Daze (2d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Saving Throw** against the **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they can **only move, take an action, or a Bonus Action** on their next turn, but not all three.\n- **Knock out (6d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Saving Throw** against the **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Unconscious** for **1 min** or until they take damage. They repeat the save at the end of their turns.\n- **Blindness (3d6)**: The target makes a **Dexterity Saving Throw** against the **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Blinded** until the end of their next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Slippery Mind**: You gain proficiency in **Wisdom and Charisma Saving Throws**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Spell Thief** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When a creature casts a **spell** that targets you or includes you in its **area of effect**, use a **Reaction** to force them to make an **Intelligence Saving Throw** against your **Spell Save DC**. You can only use this ability once per **Long Rest**. On a failure:\n\n- **The spell is negated** against you.\n- **You copy the spell** if it is of a **level you can cast**, regardless of whether it’s a wizard spell.\n- **The creature cannot cast it again** for **8 hours**.\n- **You have the spell prepared** for **8 hours** and can cast it normally.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Elusive**: No **attack roll** can have **Advantage against you**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Stroke of Luck** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : If you fail a **D20 Roll**, you can turn it into a **20**. Recharge after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Rogue level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Dexterity** and **Intelligence**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons** with the *Finesse* or *Light* property\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**\n- don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Sneak Attack** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Once per turn, deal **1d6 extra damage** when you hit with a **ranged weapon** or a melee weapon with the *Finesse* property, provided you have **Advantage** on the attack roll.\n\n>- **Without Advantage**: You can still apply **Sneak Attack** if an ally is within **5' (1.5m, 1sq)** of the target, is not **Incapacitated**, and you do not have **Disadvantage** on the attack.\n\n>- **Scaling Damage**: This bonus increases at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**: **2d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**: **3d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**: **4d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**: **5d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**: **6d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**: **7d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: **8d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**: **9d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**: **10d6**\n\n> **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- At ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**, choose **two additional skills** for **Expertise**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> choice.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Weapon Master**: Choose **two types of simple or martial weapons** you are **proficient** with to gain the **Weapon Mastery** feature. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Cunning Action**: As a **Bonus Action**, you can take the **Dash**, **Disengage**, or **Hide** action.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Steady Aim**: As a **Bonus Action**, give yourself **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** this turn. You must remain **stationary** for this turn, and your **Speed is 0** until <br>the end of the turn.\n\n> **Assassinate**: You excel in the **art of ambush**, gaining the following benefits:\n\n>- **Initiative**: You have **Advantage** on **Initiative rolls**.\n>- **Surprise Strikes**: On the **first turn** of combat, you have **Advantage** on your **attack rolls** against any creature that has not yet acted. If your **Sneak Attack** lands during this turn, the target takes **extra damage** of the weapon’s type equal to your **Rogue level**.\n\n> **Assassin’s Tools**: You gain proficiency in **Disguise Kit** and **Poisoner’s Kit**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose one of the following: **+2 to one ability score**, **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Cunning Strike** **Sneaky Save DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you deal **Sneak Attack**, add a **tactical effect** by sacrificing a number of **damage dice** (before rolling them). If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** is **8 + Dexterity Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n- **Poison (1d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Poisoned** for **1 minute** and repeat the save at the end of each turn. Requires **Poisoner’s Kit**.\n- **Trip (1d6)**: If the target is **Large or smaller**, they make a **Dexterity Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Prone**.\n- **Withdraw (1d6)**: After your attack, you can move up to **half your Speed** without provoking **opportunity attacks**.\n\n> **Uncanny Dodge**: When a creature you can see hits you with an **attack**, you can use your **Reaction** to **halve the damage taken** (rounded down).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When an effect requires a **Dexterity Saving Throw** to take half damage, you instead take **no damage** on a success, and **only half damage** on a failure. This feature does not apply if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reliable Talent**: When making an **ability check** using a **proficient skill or tool**, a **d20 roll of 9 or lower becomes a 10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Infiltration Expertise**: You refine your infiltration abilities.\n\n- **Masterful Mimicry**: You can **perfectly mimic** a **person’s speech** and **handwriting** if you have studied them for at least **one hour**.\n- **Roving Aim**: Your **Speed is no longer reduced to 0** when using **Steady Aim**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Improved Cunning Strike**: When using **Sneaky Tactics**, apply **two tactical effects** instead of one, paying the cost in dice for each effect.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Envenom Weapons**: When using the **Poison** option in **Sneaky Tactics**, the target takes **2d6 Poison Damage** each time they fail their **Saving Throw**, and this damage **ignores Poison Resistance**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Devious Strikes**: Add the following effects to **Sneaky Tactics**, paying the cost in dice:\n\n- **Daze (2d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, on their next turn, they can **either move, take an action, or use a Bonus Action**.\n- **Knock out (6d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Unconscious** for **1 minute** or until they take damage. They repeat the save at the end of each of their turns.\n- **Obscure (3d6)**: The target makes a **Dexterity Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, they are **Blinded** until the end of their next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Slippery Mind**: You gain proficiency in **Wisdom and Charisma Saving Throws**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Death Strike**: When your **Sneak Attack** lands on the **first round of combat**, the target must make a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, the **attack's damage is doubled** against the target.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Elusive**: No **attack roll** can have **Advantage against you**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Stroke of Luck** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): If you fail a **d20 Test**, you can turn the roll into a **20**. Recharges after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Rogue level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Dexterity** and **Intelligence**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons** with the *Finesse* or *Light* property\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**\n- **Tools:** **Thieves' tools**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 4): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Perception**, **Persuasion**, **Sleight of Hand**, or **Stealth**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Sneak Attack** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Once per turn, deal **1d6 extra damage** when you hit with a **ranged weapon** or a melee weapon with the *Finesse* property, provided you have **Advantage** on the attack roll.\n\n>- **Without Advantage**: You can still apply **Sneak Attack** if an ally is within **5' (1.5m, 1sq)** of the target, is not **Incapacitated**, and you do not have **Disadvantage** on the attack.\n\n>- **Scaling Damage**: This bonus increases at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**: **2d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**: **3d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**: **4d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**: **5d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**: **6d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**: **7d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: **8d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**: **9d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**: **10d6**\n\n> **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- At ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**, choose **two additional skills** for **Expertise**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Thieves' Cant**: You understand **Thieves' Cant** and one additional language of your choice.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Weapon Master**: Choose **two types of simple or martial weapons** you are **proficient** with to gain the **Weapon Mastery** feature. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Cunning Action**: As a **Bonus Action**, you can take the **Dash**, **Disengage**, or **Hide** action.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Steady Aim**: As a **Bonus Action**, give yourself **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** this turn. You must remain **stationary** for this turn, and your **Speed is 0** until <br>the end of the turn.\n\n> **Psionic Power** Nb. ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Die ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You possess an **inner wellspring of psionic energy**, represented by your **Psionic Energy Dice**, which fuel the abilities granted by this subclass.\n\n>- **Psionic Energy Dice**: The table below shows the **number** and **size** of your **Psionic Energy Dice** based on your Rogue level.\n\n| **Rogue Level** | **Die Size** | **Number of Dice** | | **Rogue Level** | **Die Size** | **Number of Dice** |\n|----------------------|--------------------|-------------------|------|----------------------|--------------------|-------------------|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 3                   | d6                 | 4                 ||![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 5                   | d8                 | 6                 |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 9                   | d8                 | 8                 ||![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 11                  | d10                | 8                 |\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 13                  | d10                | 10                ||![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) 17                  | d12                | 12                |\n\n>- **Using the Dice**: Some abilities consume **one Psionic Energy Die**, as specified in their descriptions. You cannot activate an ability that requires a die if all of your **Psionic Energy Dice** are **expended**.\n\n>- **Regaining Dice**: You regain **one expended Psionic Energy Die** at the end of a **Short Rest** and all of them at the end of a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Enhanced Talent**: If you fail a **skill check** using a **proficient skill** or **tool**, roll a **Psionic Energy Die** and add the result to the check. The die is only expended if the roll succeeds.\n\n>- **Psychic Whispers**: You can establish **telepathic communication** between yourself and other creatures. As a **magical action**, choose a number of visible creatures equal to your **proficiency bonus**, then roll **a Psionic Energy Die**. For a number of hours equal to the result, the chosen creatures can communicate **telepathically** with you (and vice versa) without requiring an action, as long as they are within **1 mile (1.5 km)** of each other. A creature can end the connection at any time (no action required). The **first use** after a **long rest** does not expend a **Psionic Energy Die**. All subsequent uses consume a die.\n\n> **Psychic Blades**: You can summon **shimmering psychic blades** in your free hands to attack. \n\n>- **Creation**: Whenever you take the **Attack action** or make an **opportunity attack**, you can manifest a **psychic blade** in your free hand and attack with it. The blade vanishes after hitting or missing and leaves no physical wound.\n\n>- **Blade Properties**:\n\n>- **Weapon Category**: Simple melee weapon.\n\n>- **Damage**: **1d6 psychic + your attack ability modifier**.\n\n>- **Properties**: **Finesse** – When attacking with this weapon, you can choose to use your **Strength** or **Dexterity modifier** for the **attack and damage rolls**. The same modifier must be used for both. **Thrown** – You can throw the blade to make a ranged attack. Its normal range is **60' (18m, 12sq)**, and its long range is **120' (36m, 24sq)**. Attacking beyond the normal range imposes **Disadvantage** on the attack roll. \n\n>- **Weapon Mastery Benefit**: **Vex** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you gain **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** against that creature before the end of your next turn. *(This Weapon Mastery benefit does not count toward your Weapon Mastery limit.)*\n\n>- **Bonus Attack**: If your other hand is free, after attacking with a **psychic blade** during your turn, you can create a **second psychic blade** and make a melee or ranged attack with a **Bonus Action**. The damage die for this bonus attack is **1d4** instead of **1d6**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 to one ability score**, **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Cunning Strike** **Sneaky Save DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you deal **Sneak Attack** damage, add a **tactical effect** by sacrificing a number of **damage dice** (before rolling them). If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** is **8 + Dexterity Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n- **Poison (1d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Poisoned** for **1 minute** and repeats the save at the end of its turns. Requires **Poisoner’s Kit**.\n- **Trip (1d6)**: If the target is **Large or smaller**, it makes a **Dexterity Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Prone**.\n- **Withdraw (1d6)**: After the attack, move **half your Speed** without provoking **opportunity attacks**.\n\n> **Uncanny Dodge**: When a creature you can see hits you with an **attack**, use a **Reaction** to **halve the damage** taken (rounded down).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When subjected to an effect requiring a **Dexterity Saving Throw** for half damage, you take **no damage** on a success and **half damage** on a failure. This ability does not work if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reliable Talent**: When making an **ability check** with a **proficient skill or tool**, any **d20 roll of 9 or lower becomes a 10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Soul Blades**: Your **psychic blades** gain new powerful enhancements.\n\n- **Guided Strikes**: When you miss a target with your **psychic blade**, roll a **Psionic Energy Die** and add the result to your **attack roll**. If the attack hits because of this bonus, the die is expended.\n\n- **Psychic Teleportation**: As a **Bonus Action**, manifest a **psychic blade**, expend a **Psionic Energy Die**, roll it, then throw the blade to an unoccupied space within **10' (3m, 2c × the result)**. You teleport to that space, and the blade disappears.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Improved Cunning Strike**: When using **Cunning Strike**, apply **two tactical effects** instead of one, paying the required dice cost for each.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Psychic Veil** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You can create a **psychic veil** to become **Invisible**. As a **magical action**, you become **Invisible** for **1 hour** or until you end this effect (no action required). The invisibility ends prematurely if you deal **damage** or force a creature to make a **Saving Throw**. Once used, this ability requires a **long rest** to be used again, or you can expend **1 Psionic Energy Die** to restore it (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Devious Strikes**: Add the following effects to your **Cunning Strike**, paying the required dice cost.\n\n- **Daze (2d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, during its next turn, it can **either move, take an action, or a Bonus Action**.\n- **Knock out (6d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Unconscious** for **1 minute** or until it takes **damage**. It repeats the save at the end of its turns.\n- **Obscure (3d6)**: The target makes a **Dexterity Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Blinded** until the end of its next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Slippery Mind**: You gain proficiency in **Wisdom and Charisma Saving Throws**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Rend Mind** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you deal **Sneak Attack** damage with your **psychic blades**, force the target to make a **Wisdom Saving Throw** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, the target is **Stunned** for **1 minute**. The target can repeat the **Saving Throw** at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. Once used, this ability requires a **long rest** to be used again, unless you expend **3 Psionic Energy Dice** to restore it (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Elusive**: No **attack roll** can have **Advantage against you**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Stroke of Luck** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : If you fail a **D20 roll**, you can turn the roll into a **20**. Recharge after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d8** per **Rogue level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Dexterity** and **Intelligence**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons** with the *Finesse* or *Light* property\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**\n- **Tools:** **Thieves' tools**\n- **Skill Proficiencies** (choose 4): **Acrobatics**, **Athletics**, **Deception**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Investigation**, **Perception**, **Persuasion**, **Sleight of Hand**, or **Stealth**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD2.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Sneak Attack** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Once per turn, deal **1d6 extra damage** when you hit with a **ranged weapon** or a melee weapon with the *Finesse* property, provided you have **Advantage** on the attack roll.\n\n>- **Without Advantage**: You can still apply **Sneak Attack** if an ally is within **5' (1.5m, 1sq)** of the target, is not **Incapacitated**, and you do not have **Disadvantage** on the attack.\n\n>- **Scaling Damage**: This bonus increases at the following levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**: **2d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**: **3d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**: **4d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**: **5d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**: **6d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**: **7d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**: **8d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**: **9d6**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**: **10d6**\n\n> **Expertise**: Choose **two proficient skills** to double your proficiency bonus.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- At ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**, choose **two additional skills** for **Expertise**.\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Thieves' Cant**: You understand **Thieves' Cant** and one additional language of your choice.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n> **Weapon Master**: Choose **two types of simple or martial weapons** you are **proficient** with to gain the **Weapon Mastery** feature. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Cunning Action**: As a **Bonus Action**, you can take the **Dash**, **Disengage**, or **Hide** action.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Steady Aim**: As a **Bonus Action**, give yourself **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** this turn. You must remain **stationary** for this turn, and your **Speed is 0** until <br>the end of the turn.\n\n>**Fast Hands**: As a **Bonus Action**, perform one of the following **actions**:\n\n>- **Sleight of Hand**: Make a **Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check** to pick a lock, disable a trap with thieves’ tools, or pickpocket an item.\n\n>- **Use an Object**: Take the **Use an Object action** to interact with an item or a **Magical Action** to activate a magic item requiring this **action**.\n\n> **Second-Story Work**: You excel at reaching difficult places.\n\n>- **Climber**: You gain a **Climb Speed** equal to your **Speed**.\n\n>- **Enhanced Jump**: You can use **Dexterity** instead of **Strength** to determine your jumping distance.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability score**, or **+1 in two ability scores**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Cunning Strike** **Sneaky Save DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png): When you deal **Sneak Attack** damage, add a **tactical effect** by sacrificing a number of **damage dice** (before rolling them). If an effect requires a **Saving Throw**, the **DC** is **8 + Dex Mod + Proficiency Bonus**.\n\n>- **Poison (1d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Poisoned** for **1 minute** and repeats the save at the end of its turns. Requires **Poisoner’s Kit**.\n>- **Trip (1d6)**: If the target is **Large or smaller**, it makes a **Dexterity Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Prone**.\n>- **Withdraw (1d6)**: After the attack, you move up to **half your Speed** without provoking **opportunity attacks**.\n\n> **Uncanny Dodge**: When you see a creature hit you with an **attack**, use a **Reaction** to **halve** the damage taken (rounded down).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Evasion**: When an effect requires a **Dexterity Save** to reduce damage, you **take no damage** if you succeed, and only **half damage** if you fail. This does not apply if you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reliable Talent**: When making an **ability check** using a **proficient skill or tool**, a **d20 roll of 9 or lower becomes a 10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Supreme Sneak**: Add the following new option to **Sneaky Tactics**.\n\n- **Hidden Strike (Cost: 1d6)**: If you are **Invisible** due to the **Hide action**, this attack does not end your invisibility if you finish your turn behind **three-quarters or total cover**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Improved Cunning Strike**: When using **Sneaky Tactics**, apply **two tactical effects** instead of one, paying the cost in dice for each effect.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Use Magic Device**: You master the use of magical items.\n\n- **Charges**: When using a magic item ability that consumes charges, roll **1d6**. On a **6**, the use **does not consume a charge**.\n\n- **Scrolls**: You can **use any spell scroll**, using **Intelligence** as your spellcasting ability.\n\n>- If the spell is a **cantrip** or **1st-level spell**, you automatically succeed.\n\n>- For a **higher-level spell**, make an **Intelligence (Arcana) check** (**DC 10 + spell level**). On success, you cast the spell. On failure, the scroll is destroyed.\n\n- **Magical Affinity**: You can attune to **4 magical items simultaneously**.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Devious Strikes**: Add the following effects to **Sneaky Tactics**, paying the cost in dice.\n\n- **Daze (2d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, on its next turn, it can **either move, take an action, or a Bonus Action**.\n- **Knock out (6d6)**: The target makes a **Constitution Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Unconscious** for **1 minute** or until it takes damage. It repeats the save at the end of its turns.\n- **Obscure (3d6)**: The target makes a **Dexterity Save** against your **Sneaky Save DC**. On a failure, it is **Blinded** until the end of its next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Slippery Mind**: You gain proficiency in **Wisdom and Charisma Saving Throws**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Thief’s Reflexes**: You excel at ambushes and quick reflexes. In the **first round of combat**, you take **two turns**. The first follows your **normal Initiative**, while the second is at **Initiative -10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Elusive**: No **attack roll** can have **Advantage against you**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: Gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Stroke of Luck** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): If you fail a **d20 test**, you can turn the roll into a **20**. Recharge after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

nom: **Barbarian**
nom 1: **Barbarian**
type: Class
recto: arriere_plan/classe.png
symbole 1: symbole/vide.png
symbole 2: symbole/vide.png
symbole 3: symbole/vide.png
symbole 4: symbole/vide.png
image: image/Classe/Barbare/vide.png
nivimage: symbole/vide.png
dvimage: symbole/vide.png
dv:
charge:
niveau:
DD5: 5e 2024 Compatible
DD5-2: 5e 2024 Compatible
sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br> \n\n# **Barbarian**\n\n**Forged by instinct and the chaos of battle, the barbarian is a raw force that unleashes primal fury on the battlefield.**\n\nBarbarians embody pure rage, a power that transcends mere anger to become a force of nature. Whether rooted in ancestral ties, spiritual connection, or untamed instinct, <br>their fury grants them unmatched resilience and terrifying strength. Each barbarian experiences rage differently. Some see it as a communion with their ancestors, while others perceive it as an echo of the wild world's fury.\n\nTribes and clans often revere these warriors as protectors, hunters, or champions. However, on the roads of the world, barbarians are also wanderers, adventurers driven by an insatiable thirst for conquest and ever-greater trials.\n\n## **Path of the Berserker**\n\n*“Battle is my release, and rage is my most faithful ally.”*<br>\n\nThe berserker barbarian lives for combat, surrendering to a destructive frenzy. Amidst the turmoil of battle, they become a whirlwind of violence, pushing the limits of endurance and carnage. These warriors know no respite, and every drop of spilled blood fuels their insatiable thirst for destruction.\n\n## **Path of the Wildheart**\n\n*“I am the child of the wind and the earth, as free as the storm and as fierce as the beast.”*<br>\n\nBarbarians of the Wildheart draw strength from nature itself. They walk alongside animals, understand their instincts, and gain supernatural abilities from them. In their rage, they become unstoppable predators, embodying the spirit of the pack or the solitary fury of untamed beasts.\n\n## **Path of the World Tree**\n\n*“The great tree has taken me under its care, and through its branches, I travel the worlds.”*<br>\n\nThose who follow this path tap into the magic of Yggdrasil, the World Tree that connects all realities. Their rage is an echo of the cosmic power flowing through the universe's branches. These barbarians are supernatural wanderers, capable of manipulating space around them and channeling the vitality of the great tree.\n\n## **Path of the Zealot**\n\n*“I am the armed hand of my god, and my rage is their will incarnate.”*<br>\n\nZealot barbarians fight with divine fervor, transforming their rage into a sacred fire that consumes them and elevates them as champions of a faith or deity. Nothing can stop them, for even death recoils before their devotion and relentless fury. Their body becomes a living temple, and every battle is a prayer offered to their god.\n\n---\n\n# **The Barbarian**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class Features                                      | Rages | Rage<br>Damage | Weapon<br>Mastery |\n|--------|--------------------|--------------------------------------------------|-------|------------|----------------|\n| 1      | +2                 | Rage, Unarmored Defense, Weapon Mastery         | 2     | +2         | 2              |\n| 2      | +2                 | Danger Sense, Reckless Attack                   | 2     | +2         | 2              |\n| 3      | +2                 | Primal Path, Primal Knowledge                   | 3     | +2         | 2              |\n| 4      | +2                 | Ability Score Improvement                       | 3     | +2         | 3              |\n| 5      | +3                 | Extra Attack, Fast Movement                     | 3     | +2         | 3              |\n| 6      | +3                 | Path Feature                                    | 4     | +2         | 3              |\n| 7      | +3                 | Feral Instinct, Instinctive Pounce              | 4     | +2         | 3              |\n| 8      | +3                 | Ability Score Improvement                       | 4     | +2         | 3              |\n| 9      | +4                 | Brutal Strike                         | 4     | +3         | 3              |\n| 10     | +4                 | Path Feature                                    | 4     | +3         | 4              |\n| 11     | +4                 | Relentless Rage                                 | 4     | +3         | 4              |\n| 12     | +4                 | Ability Score Improvement                       | 5     | +3         | 4              |\n| 13     | +5                 | Improved Brutal Strike                        | 5     | +3         | 4              |\n| 14     | +5                 | Path Feature                                    | 5     | +3         | 4              |\n| 15     | +5                 | Persistent Rage                                 | 5     | +3         | 4              |\n| 16     | +5                 | Ability Score Improvement                       | 5     | +4         | 4              |\n| 17     | +6                 | Improved Brutal Strike                        | 6     | +4         | 4              |\n| 18     | +6                 | Indomitable Might                               | 6     | +4         | 4              |\n| 19     | +6                 | Epic Boon                                       | 6     | +4         | 4              |\n| 20     | +6                 | Primal Champion                                | 6     | +4         | 4              |\n
