pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Strength**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d12** per **Barbarian level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Proficient Skills** (Choose 2): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Intimidation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Rage** Max Uses ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Bonus ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You can enter a **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, unless you are wearing Heavy Armor. \n\n>>You can use this ability **2** times. This number increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 3** : **3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **4**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 12** : **5**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17** : **6**.\n\n>>You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**. While in **Rage**, you gain the following benefits: \n\n>>- **Damage Resistance**: **Resistance** to **Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing Damage**.\n- **Rage Damage Bonus**: When attacking with **Strength** (weapon or unarmed strikes), add a **bonus to Damage** of **+2**. This bonus increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 9** : **+3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 16** : **+4**.\n- **Advantage on Strength Checks**: **Advantage** on **Strength Checks** and **Strength Saving Throws**.\n- **No Concentration or Magic**: You **cannot cast spells** or maintain **Concentration**.\n- **Duration**: **Rage** lasts until the **end of your next turn**, and ends if you wear **Heavy Armor** or become **Incapacitated**. You can **extend** your **Rage** **up to 10 minutes** by doing **one of the following** each turn:\n\n>>>- **Make an attack** against an enemy.\n- Force an enemy to make a **Saving Throw**.\n- Spend a **Bonus Action** to extend the **Rage**.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are **not wearing armor**, your **Armor Class (AC) = 10 + Dexterity + Constitution**. You can **use a shield** and still gain this benefit.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 4 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Danger Sense**: You have a **sixth sense** warning you of danger. You gain **Advantage** on **Dexterity Saving Throws**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reckless Attack**: You can **sacrifice your defense** to strike with greater ferocity. During your **first attack** on your turn, you can make a **Reckless Attack**, granting you **Advantage on all Strength-based attacks** until the start of your next turn. Enemies have **Advantage on attack rolls against you** until the start of your next turn.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Primal Knowledge**: You gain **proficiency** in one skill of your choice from those available at **Barbarian level 1** <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- **Channeling Primal Power**: While your **Rage** is active, you can use **Strength** instead of the usual ability score for the following skills: **Acrobatics, Intimidation, Perception, Stealth, Survival**.\n\n>**Frenzy** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you use **Reckless Attack** while your **Rage** is active, you deal **additional damage** to the first target hit by a **Strength-based attack** on your turn. Determine the extra damage by rolling a **number of d6 equal to your Rage Damage Bonus**. The damage is of the **same type as the weapon or Unarmed Strike** used for the attack.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Fast Movement**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** as long as you are **not wearing Heavy Armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Mindless Rage**: While your **Rage** is active, you are **immune** to the **Charmed** and **Frightened** conditions. If you are already **Charmed** or **Frightened** when you enter **Rage**, those conditions immediately **end**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Feral Instinct**: Your sharpened reflexes give you **Advantage** on **Initiative rolls**.\n\n> **Instinctive Pounce**: When you activate your **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, you can immediately move **half your Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Brutal Strike** Damage ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you use **Reckless Attack**, you can forgo **Advantage** on **one Strength-based attack roll** of your choice during your turn. The chosen attack must not have **Disadvantage**.\n\nIf the attack hits, the target takes **1d10 additional damage** of the same type as your weapon or **Unarmed Strike**, and you can apply **one Brutal Strike effect** from the following:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Powerful Blow**: The target is **pushed 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)**. You can then move **half your Speed** towards them without provoking **Attacks of Opportunity**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Tendon Strike**: The target’s **Speed is reduced by 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)** until the start of your next turn. A target can only be affected by **one Tendon Strike** at a time, with the most recent effect taking precedence.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Retaliation**: When you **take damage** from a creature within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you, you can use a **Reaction** to make a **melee attack** against them. This attack can be made with **a weapon or an Unarmed Strike**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Relentless Rage**. **DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Bonus **HP** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you drop to **0 HP** during your **Rage** without dying outright, make a **Constitution Saving Throw (DC 10)**. On a success, you drop to **2 × your Barbarian level in HP** instead. Each subsequent use increases the **DC by +5**. The DC resets to **10** after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Improved Brutal Strike**: You gain two new **Brutal Strike effects**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dazing Strike**: The target has **Disadvantage** on their next **Saving Throw** and cannot make **Opportunity Attacks** until the start of your next turn.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Devastating Strike**: Before the start of your next turn, the next **attack roll** against the target gains **+5**. An **attack roll** can only benefit from **one Devastating Strike** at a time.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Intimidating Presence** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Bonus Action**, you can **terrify** your enemies. **Each creature of your choice** within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** must make a **Wisdom Saving Throw** (**DC 8 + Strength modifier + proficiency bonus**) or be **Frightened** for **1 minute**. At the end of each of its turns, the **Frightened** creature can **repeat the Saving Throw** to end the effect. You can only use this ability again after a **Long Rest**, unless you **spend one use of your Rage** to restore it (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Persistent Rage** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain **all your Rage uses** (once per **Long Rest**).\n\n>- Your **Rage** is so intense that it lasts **10 minutes** without needing any action to extend it. It only ends if you become **Unconscious** or if you **wear Heavy Armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Improved Brutal Strike**: Your **bonus damage increases to 2d10**. You can apply **two Brutal Strike effects** simultaneously.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Indomitable Might**: If the total of a **Strength check or Saving Throw** is **lower than your Strength score**, use your **Strength score instead**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Primal Champion**: Your **Strength** and **Constitution** scores increase by **+4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

nom: **Barbarian** Path of the Wild Heart

charge: <br><br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)

sauv: Death Saving Throw
pv: symbole/pv.png

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Strength**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d12** per **Barbarian level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Proficient Skills** (Choose 2): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Intimidation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Rage** Max Uses ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Bonus ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You can enter a **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, unless you are wearing Heavy Armor. \n\n>>You can use this ability **2** times. This number increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 3** : **3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **4**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 12** : **5**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17** : **6**.\n\n>>You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**. While in **Rage**, you gain the following benefits: \n\n>>- **Damage Resistance**: **Resistance** to **Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing Damage**.\n- **Rage Damage Bonus**: When attacking with **Strength** (weapon or unarmed strikes), add a **bonus to Damage** of **+2**. This bonus increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 9** : **+3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 16** : **+4**.\n- **Advantage on Strength Checks**: **Advantage** on **Strength Checks** and **Strength Saving Throws**.\n- **No Concentration or Magic**: You **cannot cast spells** or maintain **Concentration**.\n- **Duration**: **Rage** lasts until the **end of your next turn**, and ends if you wear **Heavy Armor** or become **Incapacitated**. You can **extend** your **Rage** **up to 10 minutes** by doing **one of the following** each turn:\n\n>>>- **Make an attack** against an enemy.\n- Force an enemy to make a **Saving Throw**.\n- Spend a **Bonus Action** to extend the **Rage**.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are **not wearing armor**, your **Armor Class (AC) = 10 + Dexterity + Constitution**. You can **use a shield** and still gain this benefit.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 4 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Danger Sense**: You have a **sixth sense** warning you of danger. You gain **Advantage** on **Dexterity Saving Throws**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reckless Attack**: You can **sacrifice your defense** to strike with greater ferocity. During your **first attack** on your turn, you can make a **Reckless Attack**, granting you **Advantage on all Strength-based attacks** until the start of your next turn. Enemies have **Advantage on attack rolls against you** until the start of your next turn.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Primal Knowledge** : You gain **proficiency** in one skill of your choice from those available at **Barbarian level 1**. <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- **Channeled Primal Power** : While your **Rage** is active, you can use **Strength** instead of the usual ability score for the following skills: **Acrobatics, Intimidation, Perception, Stealth, Survival**.\n\n> **Animal Speaker** : You can cast the spells **Beast Sense** and **Speak with Animals**, but only as a **Ritual**. **Wisdom** is your spellcasting ability for these spells.\n\n> **Rage of the Wilds** : Your **Rage** is infused with primal animal power. Each time you activate it, choose **one of the following options**:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Bear** : **Resistance** to **all damage**, except **Force, Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant**.\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Eagle** : When activating Rage, you can use **Disengage** and **Dash** in the same **Bonus Action**. While **Rage** is active, you can use a **Bonus Action** to do this again.\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Wolf** : Your allies have **Advantage** on their **attack rolls** against enemies within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement** : Choose one: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack** : When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Fast Movement** : Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** as long as you **aren’t wearing heavy armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Aspect of the Wilds** : You gain **one trait of your choice** from the options below. You can change it after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Owl** : **Darkvision** of **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**. If you already have it, your range extends by **60' (18 m, 12 sq)**.\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Panther** : Your **Climb Speed** equals your **Walking Speed**.\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Salmon** : Your **Swim Speed** equals your **Walking Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Feral Instinct** : Your heightened reflexes grant you **Advantage on Initiative rolls**.\n\n> **Instinctive Pounce** : When you activate your **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, you can immediately move **half your Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Brutal Strike** Damage ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you use **Reckless Attack**, you can forgo **Advantage** on **one Strength-based attack roll** of your choice on your turn. The attack must **not have Disadvantage**.\n\nIf the attack hits, the target takes **1d10 extra damage** of the same type as your weapon or **Unarmed Strike**, and you can apply one of the following **Brutal Strike effects**:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Powerful Blow** : The target is **pushed 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)**. You can then move **half your Speed** towards them without provoking an **Attack of Opportunity**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Tendon Slash** : The target’s **Speed is reduced by 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)** until the start of your next turn. A target can only be affected by one tendon slash at a time, the most recent one.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Nature Speaker** : You can cast **Commune with Nature**, but only as a **Ritual**. **Wisdom** is your spellcasting ability for this spell.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Relentless Rage**. **DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Bonus **HP** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you drop to **0 HP** while in **Rage** but aren’t killed outright, make a **Constitution Saving Throw (DC 10)**. On success, you drop to **2 × your Barbarian level in HP** instead. Each use increases the **DC by +5**. The DC resets to **10** after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Improved Brutal Strike** : You gain two new **Brutal Strike effects**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Staggering Strike** : The target has **Disadvantage** on its next **Saving Throw** and cannot make **Opportunity Attacks** until the start of your next turn.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Devastating Blow** : Before the start of your next turn, the next **attack roll** against the target gains **+5**. An **attack roll** can only benefit from one **Devastating Blow** at a time.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Power of the Wilds** : Each time you activate your **Rage**, choose **one of the following options**:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Hawk** : You gain a **Flying Speed** equal to your **Walking Speed** if you are not wearing armor.\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Lion** : All enemies within **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you have **Disadvantage** on their **attack rolls** against any creature other than you (or another **Barbarian** with this active option).\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Ram** : When you hit a creature of **Large size or smaller** with a **melee attack**, you can **knock them prone**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Persistent Rage** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)  : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain **all your Rage uses** (once per **Long Rest**).\n\n>- Your **Rage** lasts for **10 minutes** without requiring any action to extend it. It ends if you become **Unconscious** or if you **wear Heavy Armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Improved Brutal Strike** : Your **bonus damage increases to 2d10**. You can apply **two Brutal Strike effects** simultaneously.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Indomitable Might** : If the total of a **Strength Check** or **Saving Throw** is **less than your Strength score**, use your **Strength score instead**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon** : You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Primal Champion** : Your **Strength** and **Constitution** scores increase by **+4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

sauv: Death Saving Throw
pv: symbole/pv.png
nivimage: symbole/niveau.png
pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Strength**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d12** per **Barbarian level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Proficient Skills** (Choose 2): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Intimidation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Rage** Max Uses ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Bonus ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You can enter a **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, unless you are wearing Heavy Armor. \n\n>>You can use this ability **2** times. This number increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 3** : **3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **4**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 12** : **5**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17** : **6**.\n\n>>You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**. While in **Rage**, you gain the following benefits: \n\n>>- **Damage Resistance**: **Resistance** to **Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing Damage**.\n- **Rage Damage Bonus**: When attacking with **Strength** (weapon or unarmed strikes), add a **bonus to Damage** of **+2**. This bonus increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 9** : **+3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 16** : **+4**.\n- **Advantage on Strength Checks**: **Advantage** on **Strength Checks** and **Strength Saving Throws**.\n- **No Concentration or Magic**: You **cannot cast spells** or maintain **Concentration**.\n- **Duration**: **Rage** lasts until the **end of your next turn**, and ends if you wear **Heavy Armor** or become **Incapacitated**. You can **extend** your **Rage** **up to 10 minutes** by doing **one of the following** each turn:\n\n>>>- **Make an attack** against an enemy.\n- Force an enemy to make a **Saving Throw**.\n- Spend a **Bonus Action** to extend the **Rage**.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are **not wearing armor**, your **Armor Class (AC) = 10 + Dexterity + Constitution**. You can **use a shield** and still gain this benefit.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 4 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Danger Sense**: You have a **sixth sense** warning you of danger. You gain **Advantage** on **Dexterity Saving Throws**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reckless Attack**: You can **sacrifice your defense** to strike with greater ferocity. During your **first attack** on your turn, you can make a **Reckless Attack**, granting you **Advantage on all Strength-based attacks** until the start of your next turn. Enemies have **Advantage on attack rolls against you** until the start of your next turn.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Primal Knowledge** : You gain **proficiency** in one skill of your choice from those available at **Barbarian level 1**. <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- **Channeled Primal Power** : While your **Rage** is active, you can use **Strength** instead of the usual ability score for the following skills: **Acrobatics, Intimidation, Perception, Stealth, Survival**.\n\n> **Vitality of the Tree** : Your **Rage** channels the life force of the **World Tree**, granting you the following benefits:\n\n>- **Vitality Surge** : When you activate your **Rage**, you gain **temporary HP** equal to your **Barbarian level**.\n>- **Life-Giving Force** : At the start of each of your turns during **Rage**, choose a creature within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of you to gain **temporary HP**. Roll **a number of d6s equal to your Rage Damage bonus**, and the target gains HP equal to the total. Any **remaining temporary HP** disappear when your **Rage** ends.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement** : Choose one: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack** : When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Fast Movement** : Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** as long as you **aren’t wearing heavy armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Branches of the Tree** : When a creature starts its turn within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** of you while your **Rage** is active, you can use a **Reaction** to summon **spectral branches** around them. The target must succeed on a **Strength Saving Throw** (**DC = 8 + Strength modifier + Proficiency Bonus**) or be **teleported** to an unoccupied space **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** of you. If teleported, its **Speed is reduced to 0** until the end of the turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Feral Instinct** : Your heightened reflexes grant you **Advantage on Initiative rolls**.\n\n> **Instinctive Pounce** : When you activate your **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, you can immediately move **half your Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Brutal Strike** Damage ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : When you use **Reckless Attack**, you can forgo **Advantage** on **one Strength-based attack roll** of your choice on your turn. The attack must **not have Disadvantage**.\n\nIf the attack hits, the target takes **1d10 extra damage** of the same type as your weapon or **Unarmed Strike**, and you can apply one of the following **Brutal Strike effects**:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Powerful Blow** : The target is **pushed 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)**. You can then move **half your Speed** towards them without provoking an **Attack of Opportunity**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Tendon Slash** : The target’s **Speed is reduced by 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)** until the start of your next turn. A target can only be affected by one tendon slash at a time, the most recent one.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Battering Roots** : During your turn, your **melee reach** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** when using a **Heavy** or **Versatile** melee weapon. When you **hit** with such a weapon, you can apply **Push** or **Trip** in addition to any **Weapon Mastery benefit**.\n\n>- **Push** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can push it up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** in a straight line, provided it is **Large or smaller**.\n\n>- **Trip** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force it to make a **Constitution Saving Throw**. The **DC** for this save is **8 + your Proficiency Bonus + your Strength modifier**. On a failure, the creature is knocked **Prone**, giving **Advantage** to melee attackers against it and imposing **Disadvantage** on ranged attacks against it.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Relentless Rage** **DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **Bonus HP** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you drop to **0 HP** during your **Rage** but aren’t killed outright, make a **Constitution Saving Throw (DC 10)**. On success, you drop to **2 × your Barbarian level in HP** instead. Each use increases the **DC by +5**. The DC resets to **10** after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Improved Brutal Strike** : You gain two new **Brutal Strike effects**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Staggering Strike** : The target has **Disadvantage** on its next **Saving Throw** and cannot make **Opportunity Attacks** until the start of your next turn.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Devastating Blow** : Before the start of your next turn, the next **attack roll** against the target gains **+5**. An **attack roll** can only benefit from one **Devastating Blow** at a time.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Travel along the Tree** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Bonus Action** while your **Rage** is active, you can **teleport** up to **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** to an unoccupied space you can see.\n\n>- **Once per Rage**, you can extend this **teleportation to 150' (45 m, 30 sq)** and **bring up to six willing creatures** within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of you. Each creature is teleported to an **unoccupied space** of your choice within **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** of your destination.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Persistent Rage** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)  : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain **all your Rage uses** (once per **Long Rest**).\n\n>- Your **Rage** lasts for **10 minutes** without requiring any action to extend it. It ends if you become **Unconscious** or if you **wear Heavy Armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Improved Brutal Strike** : Your **bonus damage increases to 2d10**. You can apply **two Brutal Strike effects** simultaneously.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Indomitable Might** : If the total of a **Strength Check** or **Saving Throw** is **less than your Strength score**, use your **Strength score instead**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon** : You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Primal Champion** : Your **Strength** and **Constitution** scores increase by **+4** (maximum **25**).\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Primary Ability:** **Strength**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d12** per **Barbarian level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple Weapons** and **Martial Weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light Armor**, **Medium Armor**, and **Shields**\n- **Proficient Skills** (Choose 2): **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **Intimidation**, **Nature**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Rage** Max Uses ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Bonus ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You can enter a **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, unless you are wearing Heavy Armor. \n\n>>You can use this ability **2** times. This number increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 3** : **3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 6** : **4**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 12** : **5**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 17** : **6**.\n\n>>You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**. While in **Rage**, you gain the following benefits: \n\n>>- **Damage Resistance**: **Resistance** to **Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing Damage**.\n- **Rage Damage Bonus**: When attacking with **Strength** (weapon or unarmed strikes), add a **bonus to Damage** of **+2**. This bonus increases at the following Levels: at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 9** : **+3**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **level 16** : **+4**.\n- **Advantage on Strength Checks**: **Advantage** on **Strength Checks** and **Strength Saving Throws**.\n- **No Concentration or Magic**: You **cannot cast spells** or maintain **Concentration**.\n- **Duration**: **Rage** lasts until the **end of your next turn**, and ends if you wear **Heavy Armor** or become **Incapacitated**. You can **extend** your **Rage** **up to 10 minutes** by doing **one of the following** each turn:\n\n>>>- **Make an attack** against an enemy.\n- Force an enemy to make a **Saving Throw**.\n- Spend a **Bonus Action** to extend the **Rage**.\n\n> **Unarmored Defense**: If you are **not wearing armor**, your **Armor Class (AC) = 10 + Dexterity + Constitution**. You can **use a shield** and still gain this benefit.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose 2 types of *Martial or Simple Weapons* **you are proficient with** to gain the **Weapon Mastery benefit**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 4 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Danger Sense**: You have a **sixth sense** warning you of danger. You gain **Advantage** on **Dexterity Saving Throws**, unless you are **Incapacitated**.\n\n> **Reckless Attack**: You can **sacrifice your defense** to strike with greater ferocity. During your **first attack** on your turn, you can make a **Reckless Attack**, granting you **Advantage on all Strength-based attacks** until the start of your next turn. Enemies have **Advantage on attack rolls against you** until the start of your next turn.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Primal Knowledge**: You gain **proficiency** in one skill of your choice from the **Barbarian Level 1 skill list**.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- **Channeling Primal Power**: While your **Rage** is active, you can use **Strength** instead of the usual ability score for the following skills: **Acrobatics, Intimidation, Perception, Stealth, Survival**.\n\n> **Divine Fury** Damage ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : While your **Rage** is active, the first creature you **hit** with a weapon or an **Unarmed Strike** takes **extra damage** equal to **1d6 + half your Barbarian level** (rounded down). The Damage type is **Necrotic** or **Radiant** (your choice).\n\n> **Warrior of the Gods** Total dice: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) : A divine entity supports your battle. You have a **pool of d12 dice** to heal yourself. As a **Bonus Action**, you can spend one or more dice, roll them, and regain a number of **Hit Points** equal to the total result.\n\n>- **Initial Pool**: **4d12**.\n>- **Increase**: At ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**: **+1 die**, at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 12**: **+1 die**, and at ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**: **+1 die**. (max **7d12**).\n>- **Recharge**: The entire pool is restored after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 8, 12, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose **+2 in one ability**, or **+1 in two abilities**, or **one Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you use the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n> **Fast Movement**: Your **Speed** increases by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** as long as you **are not wearing heavy armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 6**. **Fanatical Focus** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : **Once per Rage**, if you **fail** a **Saving Throw**, you can **reroll it** with a **bonus** equal to your **Rage Damage bonus**. You must use the **new roll**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Feral Instinct**: Your sharpened reflexes grant you **Advantage on Initiative rolls**.\n\n> **Instinctive Pounce**: When you activate your **Rage** as a **Bonus Action**, you can immediately move **half your Speed**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Brutal Strike** Damage ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you use **Reckless Attack**, you can forgo **Advantage** on a **Strength-based attack roll** of your choice during your turn. The chosen attack must not have **Disadvantage**.\n\nIf the attack hits, the target takes **1d10 additional Damage** of the same type as your weapon or **Unarmed Strike**, and you can apply **one Brutal Strike effect** from the following:\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Mighty Blow**: The target is **pushed 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)**. You can then move **half your Speed** toward it without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Tendon Slash**: The target’s **Speed is reduced by 15' (4.5 m, 3 sq)** until the start of your next turn. A target can only be affected by one **Tendon Slash** at a time, with the most recent one taking effect.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Zealous Presence** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Bonus Action**, you unleash a divine war cry. Up to **10 creatures of your choice** within **60' (18 m, 12 sq)** gain **Advantage** on **attack rolls** and **Saving Throws** until the start of your next turn. This feature recharges after a **Long Rest**, or by spending **one use of your Rage** (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Relentless Rage** **DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) **HP Bonus** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : If you drop to **0 HP** while in **Rage** and are not killed outright, make a **Constitution Saving Throw (DC 10)**. On success, you return to **2 × your Barbarian level in HP**. Each use increases the **DC by +5**. The DC resets to **10** after a **Short or Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Improved Brutal Strike**: You gain two new **Brutal Strike effects**.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Staggering Blow**: The target has **Disadvantage** on its next **Saving Throw** and cannot make **Opportunity Attacks** until the start of your next turn.\n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Devastating Strike**: Before the start of your next turn, the next **attack roll** against the target gains **+5**. An **attack roll** can only benefit from **one Devastating Strike bonus** at a time.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 14**. **Rage of the Gods** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **activate your Rage**, you can take on the appearance of a **divine warrior**. This state lasts **1 minute** or until **you drop to 0 HP**. You gain a **Flying Speed** equal to your **walking Speed** and can **hover**. You gain **Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant Damage**. When a creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** of you drops to **0 HP**, you can use a **Reaction** and **spend one use of your Rage** to restore **HP equal to your Barbarian level**. This feature is reusable after a **Long Rest**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Persistent Rage** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : When you **roll Initiative**, you regain **all your Rage uses** (once per **Long Rest**).\n\n>- Your **Rage** lasts **10 minutes** without requiring any action to maintain it. It ends if you are **Unconscious** or if you **wear Heavy Armor**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 17**. **Improved Brutal Strike**: Your **bonus Damage increases to 2d10**. You can apply **two Brutal Strike effects** simultaneously.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Indomitable Might**: If the total of a **Saving Throw** or **Strength Check** is **lower than your Strength score**, use your **Strength score instead**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Primal Champion**: Your **Strength** and **Constitution** scores increase by **+4** (maximum **25**).<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

sauv:
pv: symbole/vide.png
pv2:
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n### **VARIOUS RULES**\n\n**D20 Test**: Attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws follow these steps:\n\n**1. Roll a d20.** With **Advantage** or **Disadvantage**, roll **2d20** and keep the **highest** (**Advantage**) or **lowest** (**Disadvantage**) result.\n\n**2. Add modifiers:** **Ability modifier**, **Proficiency bonus** (if applicable), and **situational modifiers** (features, spells, items, rules).\n\n**3. Compare to the target number.** If the total meets or exceeds the target, the check succeeds; otherwise, it fails. The **Difficulty Class (DC)** applies to **ability checks** and **saving throws**, while **Armor Class (AC)** applies to attack rolls.\n\n**Heroic Inspiration**: Immediately reroll a die after making a roll. If you gain Inspiration while already having it, you can give it to another player.\n\n**Saving Throw (ST)**: A roll to resist or avoid an effect, which can be failed voluntarily. Without proficiency in the relevant ability, the save automatically fails.\n\n**Ability Check**: Measures skill or training against an uncertain challenge. Named according to the **ability used** (**Strength, Intelligence, etc.**).\n\n**Proficiency Bonus**: Added to checks when proficient in a relevant skill or tool.\n\n**Difficulty Class (DC)**: Indicates the challenge difficulty. The **higher** the DC, the harder the task.\n\n**Attack Roll**: Determines if an attack hits by rolling **equal to or higher than the target's AC**. Uses **Strength** (melee), **Dexterity** (ranged), or the **spellcasting ability** for spell attacks. The **Proficiency bonus** applies if proficient with the weapon or spell used.\n\n**Cover**: Provides protection at three levels: **Partial Cover** (**+2 AC and Dexterity STs**), **Significant Cover** (**+5 AC and Dexterity STs**), and **Total Cover** (**untargetable**).\n\n**Darkness**: An area of darkness is **completely obscured**. You are considered **Blinded** while trying to see inside it.\n\n**Short Rest**: **1 hour** of rest without exertion, spellcasting, or combat. Allows spending **Hit Dice** to regain **HP** and refreshes certain abilities.\n\n**Long Rest**: **8 hours** (6 hours sleeping, 2 hours light activity). Restores **all HP**, **Hit Dice**, and reduces **Exhaustion by 1**. Interrupted by damage or spellcasting (except cantrips).\n\n**Reach**: The distance a creature can make melee attacks, usually **5' (1.5 m, 1 sq)** around them.\n\n**Melee Attack**: Attacks within **reach** using a **melee weapon** or **Unarmed Strike**. Some monsters use claws, fangs, or other body parts, and some spells involve melee attacks.\n\n**Opportunity Attack**: You can make a **Reaction** to attack a visible creature leaving your **reach** with a **melee attack**.\n\n**Avoiding Opportunity Attacks**: No **Opportunity Attack** occurs if using **Disengage**, **teleporting**, or being moved **without using your movement, Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction** (e.g., explosion, fall).\n\n**Hit Points (HP)**: Represent your endurance and will to survive. Your maximum HP is your full total when uninjured.\n\n**Bloodied**: If you fall to **half or fewer HP**, which may trigger effects but has no direct impact.\n\n**Temporary HP**: Absorbs damage before HP. They **don’t stack**—you keep either the **old** or **new** total. They aren’t **real HP**, can’t be restored, and don’t restore consciousness.\n\n
don: <br>\n\n### **ACTIONS**\n\nActions represent specific tasks performed on your turn. You can take **one action** per turn unless a rule states otherwise. Here are the main ones:\n\n- **Attack**: Make an **attack roll**. You can **equip/unequip** a weapon and **move between multiple attacks**.\n\n- **Dash**: Doubles one of your **Speeds** for this turn.\n\n- **Disengage**: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke **opportunity attacks**.\n\n- **Dodge**: Until your next turn, if you have **Speed**, are not **Incapacitated**, and can see the attacker, all **attack rolls** against you have **Disadvantage**, and your **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Help**: Grants **Advantage** to an ally’s **ability check** before your next turn or to their **first attack roll** against a creature **within your reach**.\n\n- **Hide**: While out of sight, in **darkness**, behind **significant cover**, or **total cover**, succeed on a **Dexterity (Stealth) check DC 15** to become **Invisible**. Your result becomes the **DC** for a creature’s **Perception check** to detect you. The effect ends if you **make noise**, **are spotted**, **attack**, or **cast a verbal spell**.\n\n- **Influence**: To persuade a creature, the DM determines if it is **willing** (no check needed), **unwilling** (impossible), or **hesitant** (requires a check: **DC 15 or the creature’s Intelligence, whichever is higher**). The check depends on the method: **Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion (Charisma)**, or **Animal Handling (Wisdom)**. On failure, you must wait **24 hours** or as decided by the DM before retrying.\n\n- **Cast a Spell**: Cast a spell that requires an **action**. If the spell has a longer duration, you must repeat this action each turn until completion.\n\n- **Ready**: Define a **trigger** and an **action** to take when it occurs. If readying a spell, you must maintain **Concentration**.\n\n- **Search**: Make a **Wisdom or Intelligence check** to find hidden clues or details (**Perception**, hidden objects, **Medicine**, cause of death, etc.).\n\n- **Study**: Make an **Intelligence check** to gain information in a relevant field (**Arcana** for magic, **History** for lore, etc.).\n\n- **Use an Object**: Required for activating or using specific items.\n\n- Other actions may be improvised or granted by class abilities.\n\n**Bonus Actions**: You can take **only one Bonus Action** per turn and only if a rule allows it.\n\n**Reactions**: A special action triggered by a specific event (e.g., **Opportunity Attack**). Only one Reaction per turn, taken **immediately after** the trigger.\n\n**Conditions**:\n\n- **Prone**: You **crawl** (**double movement cost**) or use **half your Speed** to stand up (**impossible if Speed is 0**). Your **attacks have Disadvantage**. Melee attacks against you have **Advantage**, while ranged attacks have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Deafened**: You can’t hear and automatically fail checks requiring hearing.\n\n- **Blinded**: You can’t see, fail checks relying on sight, **attack rolls have Disadvantage**, and attack rolls against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Charmed**: You can’t attack or harm the charmer, who has **Advantage** on social interactions with you.\n\n- **Grappled**: **Speed is 0**, **Disadvantage on attacks** except against the grappler, who can move you at **double the cost**. Ends if the grappler is **Incapacitated**, moves away, or you succeed on a **Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check** against their **Escape DC** (**8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength modifier**).\n\n- **Poisoned**: **Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks**.\n\n- **Restrained**: **Speed is 0**. Attacks against you have **Advantage**, your attacks have **Disadvantage**, and **Dexterity Saving Throws** have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Stunned**: **Incapacitated**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, and attacks against you have **Advantage**.\n\n- **Unconscious**: **Incapacitated and Prone**, drop everything held. **Speed is 0**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**. Unaware of surroundings.\n\n- **Invisible**: You can’t be targeted by attacks requiring sight unless the enemy senses you. Your **attacks have Advantage**, while attacks against you have **Disadvantage**.\n\n- **Incapacitated**: You can’t take **Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions**, lose **Concentration**, and can’t speak.\n\n- **Paralyzed**: **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**, and melee hits are **critical hits**.\n\n- **Petrified**: Turned to solid material, **weight ×10**, stops aging. **Incapacitated, Speed is 0**, automatically fails **Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws**, attacks against you have **Advantage**. **Resistant to all damage, Immune to Poison**.\n\n- **Frightened**: **Disadvantage on all rolls** while the source of fear is visible. You can’t willingly move closer to it.\n\n- **Exhaustion**: Each level reduces all **D20 rolls by 2 × exhaustion level** and **Speed by 5' (1.5 m, 1 sq) × exhaustion level**. At **6 levels**, you die. A **long rest** reduces Exhaustion by **1**.\n\n**Damage and Resistances**: A **damage roll** combines **damage dice, modifiers, and penalties**. A **critical hit (20)** doubles the **damage dice**. Damage from a **Saving Throw** is the same for all targets. A successful **Saving Throw** often halves damage (**rounding down**). Each damage type (**slashing, fire, etc.**) interacts with **Resistance (half damage), Vulnerability (double damage), and Immunity (no damage)**. Multiple resistances or vulnerabilities of the same type **do not stack**.\n\n**Damage Application Order**: 1. **Bonuses/penalties and multipliers**. 2. **Resistance (half damage)**. 3. **Vulnerability (double damage)**.\n\n**Healing**: Magic and rest restore **HP** but cannot exceed your maximum HP.\n\n**0 Hit Points**: You become **Unconscious** or **die instantly** if remaining damage after dropping to **0 HP** is **equal to or greater than your HP max**.\n\n**Death Saving Throws**: At **0 HP**, roll **1d20** at the start of each turn: **10+ is a success, 9- is a failure**. **3 successes** = **Stable**. **3 failures** = **Dead**. A natural **1** counts as **2 failures**, while a natural **20** grants **1 HP**. A **critical hit** or damage **equal to your HP max** kills instantly.\n\n**Stabilizing**: A **Wisdom (Medicine) check DC 10** stabilizes a creature at **0 HP**, stopping death saves. A stable creature regains **1 HP after 1d4 hours** if untreated.
donsuite: <br><br><br><br> \n\n# **Fighter**\n\n**A master of combat and strategy, the fighter embodies martial prowess in all its forms. Their body is a weapon, their mind a fortress of steel, and their battlefield experience makes them unstoppable.**\n\nEvery battlefield bears the mark of a fighter’s presence. Whether they are an honored knight, a hardened mercenary, or a gladiator, they have honed their skills through years of discipline and war. Unlike mages and clerics, fighters do not rely on magic or divine blessings; their power lies in their technique, endurance, and unwavering will.\n\nFighters are proficient with all **weapons** and **armors**, but what makes them truly formidable is their ability to push their bodies beyond normal limits. They execute complex maneuvers, parrying, striking, and dodging with deadly precision. On the battlefield, they are the pillars that hold the line, the storms of steel that cut through enemy ranks, the walls of flesh and iron that shield their allies.\n\n## **Warlord**\n\n*“Steel alone does not make a warrior, but the mind that wields it.”*<br>\n\nThe warlord is a Tactical Master, a **fighter** whose every move is calculated to dominate the opponent. Combining martial skill and battlefield intelligence, they control the fight, guiding allies and neutralizing enemies with surgical precision. Every strike is a lesson carved into flesh, every battle a preparation for the next.\n\n## **Champion**\n\n*“I seek neither glory nor fortune. Only the perfection of combat matters.”*<br>\n\nThe champion embodies physical and martial excellence. Surpassing human limits through training and endurance, they master the art of combat in all its forms. Their strikes are more precise, their reflexes sharper, and their endurance in battle makes them indomitable. Where others tire, they persist; where others hesitate, they strike without flaw.\n\n## **Eldritch Knight**\n\n*“Steel and magic are not enemies but allies in my hands.”*<br>\n\nBlending raw strength with arcane power, the Eldritch Knight shapes their own destiny through blade and spell. They shield themselves with magical barriers, smite their foes with lightning, and bind their weapons to their very soul. Their mystical power enhances their martial prowess, making them as unpredictable as they are devastating.\n\n## **Psi Warrior**\n\n*“Willpower is the ultimate weapon, and mine can break steel.”*<br>\n\nGifted with psionic abilities, the Psi Warrior transcends the limits of body and mind. They manipulate pure force to push back enemies, create invisible shields, and strike with superhuman power. A true **fighter** of the mind, they bend the laws of physics to their will and transform the battlefield into their personal domain.\n\n---\n\n# **Fighter Progression Table**\n\n| Level | Proficiency<br>Bonus | Class Features | Second Wind | Weapon Mastery |\n|--------|--------------------|------------------------------------------------|--------------|----------------|\n| 1      | +2                 | Fighting Style, Second Wind, Weapon Mastery   | 2            | 3              |\n| 2      | +2                 | Action Surge (1), Tactical Mind               | 2            | 3         | 5              |\n| 12     | +4                 | Ability Score Improvement                     | 4            | 5              |\n| 13     | +5                 | Indomitable (2), Studied sauv: Death saving throw
pv: symbole/pv.png
