pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Main Attributes:** **Strength** or **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Fighter level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**, **medium armor**, **heavy armor**, and **shields**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat**, which you can change at each **Fighter level**, choosing from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 to AC** while wearing *light, medium, or heavy armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand without another weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling for **damage** with a two-handed weapon, **1s and 2s** on a die become **3s**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce damage taken by a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield, simple, or martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack against a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** while holding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** on ranged attacks made with weapons that have the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of the off-hand attack with a **Light** weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength modifier** **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if holding no weapons or shields). At the start of your turn, a **Grappled** creature takes **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage**.\n\n> **Second Wind** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, draw upon your **physical and mental resilience** to regain **1d10 + your Fighter level** in **HP**. You can use this ability **2 times**. This number improves at the following Levels: **3** at Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **4** at Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **3 types** of Simple or Martial weapons you are proficient with to use their **Weapon Mastery Properties**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 10 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 16 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Action Surge** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You push beyond your limits to take one additional action on your turn <br>(except **Magic Action**). Once used, this ability recharges after a **Short or Long Rest**. Starting at level 17, you can use it **twice**, but only once per <br>turn.\n\n> **Tactical Mind**: You apply your strategic intellect to every situation. When you fail an **ability check**, you can spend a use of **Second Wind** to add **1d10 to the check**. If the check still fails, the **Second Wind** use is not expended.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Martial Disciple**: You gain proficiency with **one type of artisan’s tools** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) and gain proficiency in **one skill** of your choice ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) from the options available at **Fighter level 1** \n\n> **Combat Superiority: DS** ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Maneuver DC** ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : Your battlefield experience allows you to perform **special maneuvers** using **Superiority Dice (DS)**. You learn **three maneuvers** of your choice from the **maneuver options** in this subclass. **Only one maneuver** can be applied per attack. Whenever you learn a new maneuver, you may replace one known maneuver. You have **four DS** (**d8**). A **DS** is **used** to activate a maneuver, and its result is generally added to the maneuver’s effect. All **expended DS** are recovered after a **Short or Long Rest**. You gain **one additional die** at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 7** and **one additional die** at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 15**. If a maneuver requires a **saving throw**, the **Maneuver DC** is **8 + your Strength or Dexterity modifier + your Proficiency Bonus**.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)<br> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 7 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 10 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 15 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) \n\n||Maneuver Options||\n|-----|-----|-----|\n| **Ambush**: **Dexterity (Stealth, Initiative) checks + 1 DS** | **Commander’s Strike**: Replace an attack to command an ally to strike. **Damage + 1 DS** | **Rallying Cry**: **Charisma (Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion) checks + 1 DS** |\n| **Lunging Attack**: **Bonus Action**, move **5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** in a straight line before attacking, **Damage + 1 DS** | **Disarm**: **Damage + 1 DS**. The target succeeds on a **Strength saving throw** or drops an item | **Distracting Strike**: **Damage + 1 DS**. **An ally gains Advantage** on their next **attack roll** against this target |\n| **Defensive Footwork**: **Bonus Action**, Dodge and **AC + 1 DS** until your next turn |  **Tactical Assessment**: **Intelligence (History, Investigation)** or **Wisdom (Insight) checks + 1 DS** | **Goading Attack**: **Damage + 1 DS**. The target succeeds on a **Wisdom saving throw** or has **Disadvantage** against other targets |\n| **Attack and Switch**: Swap places with a willing ally **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)**. You or they gain **AC + 1 DS** until your next turn | **Attack and Maneuver**: **Damage + 1 DS** and an ally moves **without Opportunity Attacks** | **Menacing Attack**: **Damage + 1 DS**. The target succeeds on a **Wisdom saving throw** or is **Frightened** until the end of your next turn |\n| **Parry**: **Reaction**, reduce damage from a melee attack by **1 DS + Strength/Dexterity mod** | **Precise Attack**: After a missed attack roll, add **+ 1 DS** to the **attack roll** to potentially succeed | **Pushing Attack**: **Damage + 1 DS**. The target succeeds on a **Strength saving throw** or is **pushed 15' (4.5m, 3 sq)** |\n| **Rallying Cry**: **Bonus Action**, A nearby ally **within 30' (9m, 6 sq)** gains **Temporary HP = 1DS + half your Fighter level** | **Feinting Attack**: **Bonus Action** grants **Advantage** on your next attack this turn against a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)**. **Damage + 1 DS** if successful | **Sweeping Attack**: If another creature is **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** of your target and within your reach, it takes **1 DS damage** |\n| **Riposte**: **Reaction**, after a melee attack misses you, counterattack, **Damage + 1 DS** | **Trip Attack**: **Damage + 1 DS**. If the target is **Large or smaller** and fails a **Strength saving throw**, they are **Prone** |\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Levels 4, 6, 8, 12, 14, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability**, or **+1 to two abilities**, or **a feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n>**Tactical Shift**: When you activate **Second Wind** as a **Bonus Action**, you can move up to half your **Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Enemy Analysis** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, you analyze a visible creature **within 30' (9m, 6 sq)** to discern its strengths and weaknesses. You learn if it has any **immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities**, and which ones. Once used, this ability is **unavailable until a Long Rest**, unless you spend **a Superiority Die** to restore its use (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Indomitable** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your **Fighter level**. You must use the new roll. This ability recharges after a **Long Rest**. You can use this feature **twice** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 13**, and **three times** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 17**.\n\n> **Tactical Master**: When attacking with a weapon that benefits from a **Weapon Mastery Property**, you can replace that property with **Push, Sap, or Slow** for that attack.\n\n>- **Push** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can push it up to **10' (3m, 2 sq)** in a straight line, as long as it is **Large or smaller**.\n\n>- **Sap** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, it suffers **Disadvantage** on its next **attack roll** before the start of your next turn.\n\n>- **Slow** – If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage, you can reduce its **Speed** by **10' (3m, 2 sq)** until the start of your next turn. This effect does not stack with other slowing effects.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Improved Combat Superiority**: Your **Superiority Die** increases to **1d10**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **three times**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Studied Attacks**: When you miss an **attack roll** against a creature, you gain **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** against that creature before the end of your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Relentless**: Once per turn, when you use a **maneuver**, you can roll **1d8** and use the result instead of **spending a Superiority Die**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Supreme Combat Superiority**: Your **Superiority Die** increases to **1d12**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **four times**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Main Attributes:** **Strength** or **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Fighter level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**, **medium armor**, **heavy armor**, and **shields**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat**, which you can change at each **Fighter level**, choosing from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 to AC** while wearing *light, medium, or heavy armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand without another weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling for **damage** with a two-handed weapon, **1s and 2s** on a die become **3s**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce damage taken by a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield, simple, or martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack against a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** while holding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** on ranged attacks made with weapons that have the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of the off-hand attack with a **Light** weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength modifier** **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if holding no weapons or shields). At the start of your turn, a **Grappled** creature takes **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage**.\n\n> **Second Wind** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, draw upon your **physical and mental resilience** to regain **1d10 + your Fighter level** in **HP**. You can use this ability **2 times**. This number improves at the following Levels: **3** at Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **4** at Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **3 types** of Simple or Martial weapons you are proficient with to use their **Weapon Mastery Properties**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 10 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 16 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Action Surge** Max Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You push beyond your limits to take an additional action on your turn <br>(except for **Magic Action**). Once used, this ability recharges after a **Short or Long Rest**. Starting at level 17, you can use it twice, but only once per <br>turn.\n\n> **Tactical Mind**: You apply your strategic intelligence to every situation. When you fail a **Skill Check**, you can expend one use of **Second Wind** to add **1d10** to the check. If the check still fails, the use of **Second Wind** is not expended.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Improved Critical**: Your **attack rolls** with weapons and **Unarmed Strikes** score a **critical hit** on a roll of **19 or 20** on the **d20**.\n\n>**Remarkable Athlete**: You gain **Advantage on Initiative Rolls** and **Strength (Athletics) Checks**. Additionally, after scoring a **critical hit**, you can move up to half your **Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4, 6, 8, 12, 14, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack Action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n>**Tactical Shift**: When you activate **Second Wind** as a **Bonus Action**, you can move up to half your **Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Additional Fighting Style**: You gain a **second Fighting Style Feat** of your choice.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Indomitable** Max Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your **Fighter level**. You must use the new roll. This ability recharges after a **Long Rest**. You can use this feature **twice** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 13**, and **three times** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 17**.\n\n> **Tactical Master**: When attacking with a weapon that has a **Weapon Mastery Property**, you can replace that property with **Push, Sap, or Slow** for that attack.\n\n>- **Push** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can push it up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** straight away, provided it is **Large or smaller**.\n\n>- **Sap** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, it suffers **Disadvantage** on its next **attack roll** before the start of your next turn.\n\n>- **Slow** – If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage, you can reduce its **Speed** by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** until the start of your next turn. This effect does not stack with other slowing effects.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Heroic Warrior**: You thrive in the heat of battle. **At the start of each of your turns**, if you do not already have **Heroic Inspiration**, you gain it automatically.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack Action**, you can attack **three times**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Studied Attacks**: When you miss an **attack roll** against a creature, you gain **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** against that creature before the end of your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Superior Critical**: Your **attack rolls** with weapons and **Unarmed Strikes** score a **critical hit** on a roll of **18 to 20** on the **d20**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Survivor**: You reach the **peak of battlefield endurance**, granting you these benefits: \n\n- **Defy Death**: You gain **Advantage on Death Saving Throws**. If you roll an **18 to 20** on a **Death Saving Throw**, it counts as a **natural 20**.\n\n- **Heroic Rally**: **At the start of each of your turns**, if you are **bloodied** (at half **HP** or lower) and have **at least 1 hit point**, you regain **HP equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack Action**, you can attack **four times**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Main Attributes:** **Strength** or **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Fighter level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**, **medium armor**, **heavy armor**, and don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat**, which you can change at each **Fighter level**, choosing from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 to AC** while wearing *light, medium, or heavy armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand without another weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling for **damage** with a two-handed weapon, **1s and 2s** on a die become **3s**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce damage taken by a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield, simple, or martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack against a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** while holding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** on ranged attacks made with weapons that have the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of the off-hand attack with a **Light** weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength modifier** **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if holding no weapons or shields). At the start of your turn, a **Grappled** creature takes **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage**.\n\n> **Second Wind** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, draw upon your **physical and mental resilience** to regain **1d10 + your Fighter level** in **HP**. You can use this ability **2 times**. This number improves at the following Levels: **3** at Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **4** at Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **3 types** of Simple or Martial weapons you are proficient with to use their **Weapon Mastery Properties**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) donsuite: <br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Action Surge** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You can push yourself beyond your limits to take one additional action on your turn <br>(except for a **Magic Action**). Once used, this feature recharges after a **Short or Long Rest**. At level 17, you can use it **twice**, but only once per <br>turn.\n\n> **Tactical Mind**: You apply strategic intelligence to every situation. When you fail an **Ability Check**, you can expend a **Second Wind** use to add **1d10** to the check. If the check still fails, the **Second Wind** use is not consumed.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Arcane Spellcasting (Wizard)** : ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Concentration**. All **spell slots** are regained after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Cantrips**: You know two **Cantrips** of your choice from the **Wizard spell list**: \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>>>> ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) At **level 10**, you learn one additional **Cantrip** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n>- **Rearrange Prepared Spells**: You prepare a list of **Wizard spells** you can cast. You can swap a **prepared spell** for another when you gain a **Fighter level**. You can replace **one Cantrip** when you gain a **Fighter level**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Ability**: **Intelligence**.\n\n>- **Spellcasting Focus**: You can use an **Arcane Focus** for your **Wizard spells**, replacing non-costly material components.\n\n|Spell<br>Level| Total | **Expended Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Total | **Expended Slots** |Spell<br>Level| Total | **Expended Level** | Prepared Spells | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 |\n|--------|-------|-------|--------|-----|--------|----|--------|-------|-------|--------|-----|--------|\n |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3**            | 3              | 2 | — | — |—| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **4**            | 4              | 3|—| —| —|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **7**            | 5              | 4| 2|—| —| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **8**            | 6              | 4 | 2 | — |—| \n |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **10**           | 7              | 4| 3|—| —| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **11**           | 8              | 4| 3|—| —|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **13**           | 9              | 4| 3| 2|—| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **14**           | 10              | 4| 3|2| —|\n|![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **16**           | 11             | 4| 3| 3|—| |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **19**           | 12             | 4| 3| 3| 1|\n |![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **20**           | 13             | 4| 3| 3| 1|\n\n> **War Bond**: You can bind to a weapon by performing a **1-hour ritual**, which can be done during a **Short Rest**. The weapon must remain within reach throughout the **ritual**. Once bound, it can no longer be disarmed unless you have the **Incapacitated** condition. If it is on the **same plane of existence**, you can **summon** it as a **Bonus Action**, instantly teleporting it into your hand. You can have up to **two bound weapons**, but you can only summon **one at a time**. If you attempt to bond with a **third weapon**, you must **break the bond** with one of the previous ones.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4, 6, 8, 12, 14, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 to one ability score**, or **+1 to two ability scores**, or **one feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you use the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n>**Tactical Shift**: When you activate **Second Wind** as a **Bonus Action**, you can move up to half your **Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **War Magic**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can replace one of your attacks with the **casting** of a **Wizard spell** with a **casting time of one action**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Indomitable** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your **Fighter level**. You must use the new roll. This feature recharges after a **Long Rest**. You can use this feature **twice** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 13**, and **three times** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 17**.\n\n> **Tactical Master**: When attacking with a weapon that benefits from the **Weapon Mastery** feature, you can replace its property with **Push, Sap, or Slow** for this attack.\n\n>- **Push** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can push it up to **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** in a straight line, provided it is **Large or smaller**.\n\n>- **Sap** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, it has **Disadvantage** on its next **attack roll** before the start of your next turn.\n\n>- **Slow** – If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage, you can reduce its **Speed** by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** until the start of your next turn. This effect does not stack with other slowing effects.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Eldritch Strike**: When you **hit** a creature with a **weapon attack**, it suffers **Disadvantage** on the next **Saving Throw** it makes against a **spell you cast** before the end of your **next turn**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Extra Attack**: When you use the **Attack action**, you can attack **three times**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Studied Attacks**: When you miss an **attack roll** against a creature, you gain **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** against that creature before the end of your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Arcane Charge**: When you use your **Action Surge**, you can **teleport up to 9 meters** to an **unoccupied space** you can see. You can teleport **before or after** the **additional action**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Improved War Magic**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can replace **two attacks** with the **casting** of a **Wizard spell** of **level 1 or 2** with a **casting time of one action**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Extra Attack**: When you use the **Attack action**, you can attack **four times**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)

pv2: &nbsp;&nbsp; Hide<br>&nbsp;   &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Initiative&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HP &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Speed&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AC<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp&nbsp;&nbsp;Max&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Temp<br>&nbsp;Inspiration<br><br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp; XP<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1"> &nbsp; Save&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 1<sup>st</sup> hand&nbsp;&nbsp;Reach 2<sup>nd</sup> hand<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Passive Wisdom<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; death&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Perception)
caracteristiques: \n\n---\n\n**Main Attributes:** **Strength** or **Dexterity**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Hit Dice:** **1d10** per **Fighter level**\n\n**Proficiencies:**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Saving Throw Proficiencies:** **Strength** and **Constitution**\n\n- **Weapons:** **Simple weapons** and **martial weapons**\n- **Armor:** **Light armor**, **medium armor**, **heavy armor**, and **shields**\n\n**Skill Proficiencies** (choose 2): **Acrobatics**, **Animal Handling**, **Athletics**, **History**, **Insight**, **Intimidation**, **Persuasion**, **Perception**, or **Survival**<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)
don: ### **Class Features**\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 1**. **Fighting Style**: You gain a **Fighting Style Feat**, which you can change at each **Fighter level**, choosing from the following options:  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Archery**: **+2 to attack rolls** with *ranged weapons*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Blind Fighting**: **Blindsight** within **10' (3m, 2 sq)**.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Defense**: **+1 to AC** while wearing *light, medium, or heavy armor*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Dueling**: **+2 to damage rolls** when wielding a melee weapon in one hand without another weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Great Weapon Fighting**: When rolling for **damage** with a two-handed weapon, **1s and 2s** on a die become **3s**. The weapon must have the *Two-Handed* or *Versatile* property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Interception**: As a **Reaction**, reduce damage taken by a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** by **1d10 + your Proficiency Bonus**. Requires a *shield, simple, or martial weapon*.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Protection**: As a **Reaction**, impose **Disadvantage** on an attack against a creature **within 5' (1.5m, 1 sq)** while holding a shield.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Thrown Weapon Fighting**: **+2 to damage rolls** on ranged attacks made with weapons that have the **Thrown** property.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Two-Weapon Fighting**: Add your **ability modifier** to the damage of the off-hand attack with a **Light** weapon.  \n\n>- ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Unarmed Fighting**: Deal **1d6 + Strength modifier** **Bludgeoning Damage** with unarmed strikes (**1d8** if holding no weapons or shields). At the start of your turn, a **Grappled** creature takes **1d4 Bludgeoning Damage**.\n\n> **Second Wind** Total uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): As a **Bonus Action**, draw upon your **physical and mental resilience** to regain **1d10 + your Fighter level** in **HP**. You can use this ability **2 times**. This number improves at the following Levels: **3** at Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png), **4** at Level 10 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png). You regain **one use** after a **Short Rest** and **all uses** after a **Long Rest**.\n\n> **Weapon Mastery**: Choose **3 types** of Simple or Martial weapons you are proficient with to use their **Weapon Mastery Properties**. You can change one of these choices after a **Long Rest**: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 4 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Level 10 ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)  ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png) Level 16 ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)\n\n **Feats** \n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
donsuite: <br><br>\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 2**. **Action Surge** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You can push beyond your limits to take an additional action on your turn <br>(except for **Magical Action**). Once used, this feature recharges after a **Short or Long Rest**. Starting at level 17, you can use it **twice**, but only once per <br>turn.\n\n> **Tactical Mind**: You apply strategic intelligence to any situation. When you fail an **ability check**, you can spend a use of **Second Wind** to add **1d10** to the check. If the check still fails, the **Second Wind** use is not expended.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 3**. **Psionic Power** Nb. ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) Dice ![Case!](symbole/caseD.png) : You possess **psionic energy**, represented by **Psionic Energy Dice**, which fuel the **features of this subclass**. You gain these dice according to the table below:\n\n|**Fighter Level**| **Die Size** | **Total Dice** || **Fighter Level** | **Die Size** | **Total Dice** |\n|----------------|-------------|------------|-----------|-------------|-------------|------------|\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **3**  | D6  | 4  || ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **5**  | D8  | 6  |\n| ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **9**  | D8  | 8  || ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **11** | D10 | 8  |\n | ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **13** | D10 | 10 || ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **17** | D12 | 12 |  |\n\n>You recover **one expended Psionic Energy Die** after a **Short Rest**, and **all** after a **Long Rest**.\n\n>- **Protective Field**: As a **Reaction**, when you or a creature within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** takes damage, you can **expend a Psionic Energy Die**, roll it, and **reduce the damage taken** by the result **+ your Intelligence modifier** (**minimum 1**).\n\n>- **Psionic Strike**: Once per turn, immediately after **hitting a target** within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** with a weapon attack, you can **expend a Psionic Energy Die**, roll it, and deal additional **Force Damage** equal to the result **+ your Intelligence modifier**.\n\n>- **Telekinetic Movement** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Magical Action**, you can **move a free object** (size **Large or smaller**) or a **willing creature** (**other than yourself**) within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)**, up to **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** into an **unoccupied space** you can see. If the target is a **small object**, you can **teleport it into your hand**. Once this **Magical Action** is used, you cannot use it again until a **Short or Long Rest**, unless you **expend a Psionic Energy Die** to restore its use (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 4, 6, 8, 12, 14, and 16**. **Ability Score Improvement**: Choose: **+2 in one ability score**, or **+1 in two ability scores**, or **a Feat**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 5**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **twice**.\n\n>**Tactical Shift**: When you activate **Second Wind** as a **Bonus Action**, you can move up to half your **Speed** without provoking **Opportunity Attacks**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 7**. **Telekinetic Adept**: You master new ways to use your **telekinetic abilities**.\n\n>- **Psi-Powered Leap** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Bonus Action**, you gain a **Flying Speed** equal to **twice your Speed** until the end of your turn. You cannot use this ability again until a **Short or Long Rest**, unless you **expend a Psionic Energy Die** to restore its use (no action required).\n\n>- **Telekinetic Thrust**: When you deal damage with **Psionic Strike**, you can force the target to make a **Strength Saving Throw** (**DC 8** + **Intelligence modifier** + **Proficiency Bonus**). On a failure, you can **knock the target Prone** or **move it 10' (3 m, 2 sq)** horizontally.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 9**. **Indomitable** Total Uses: ![case!](symbole/caseD.png) Used: ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png)![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png): If you fail a **Saving Throw**, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your **Fighter level**. You must use the new roll. This ability recharges after a **Long Rest**. You can use this feature **twice** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 13**, and **three times** starting at **![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) level 17**.\n\n> **Tactical Master**: When attacking with a weapon that has **Weapon Mastery**, you can replace that property with **Push, Sap, or Slow** for that attack.\n\n>- **Push** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can push it **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** straight back, provided it is **Large or smaller**.\n\n>- **Sap** – If you hit a creature with this weapon, it suffers **Disadvantage** on its next **attack roll** before the start of your next turn.\n\n>- **Slow** – If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage, you can reduce its **Speed** by **10' (3 m, 2 sq)** until the start of your next turn. This effect does not stack with other slow effects.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 10**. **Guarded Mind**: You gain **Resistance to Psychic Damage**. If you start your turn under the **Charmed or Frightened** condition, you can **expend a Psionic Energy Die** to end the condition (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 11**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **three times**.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 13**. **Studied Attacks**: When you **miss** an **attack roll** against a creature, you gain **Advantage** on your next **attack roll** against that creature before the end of your next turn.\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 15**. **Bulwark of Force** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : As a **Bonus Action**, you can choose a number of creatures within **30' (9 m, 6 sq)** up to your **Intelligence modifier** (**minimum 1**), including yourself. Each chosen creature gains **Half Cover** (**+2 AC, +2 Dexterity Saving Throws**) for **1 minute** or until you become **Incapacitated**.\n\n>>>> ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until a **Long Rest**, unless you **expend a Psionic Energy Die** to restore its use (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 18**. **Telekinetic Master** ![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) : You always have the **Telekinesis** spell prepared, and you can cast it **without using a spell slot** or material components. **Intelligence** is your spellcasting ability for this spell. While maintaining **Concentration** on this spell (including the turn you cast it), you can make **a weapon attack as a Bonus Action**. Once cast this way, you cannot use it again until a **Long Rest**, unless you **expend a Psionic Energy Die** to restore its use (no action required).\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 19**. **Epic Boon**: You gain an **Epic Boon** or another **Feat** of your choice: ![Ligne!](symbole/LigneD1.png)\n\n![Case!](symbole/caseD2cocher.png) **Level 20**. **Extra Attack**: When you take the **Attack action**, you can attack **four times**.\n\n---\n\n<br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)<br><br>![Ligne!](symbole/Ligne2010.png)
